1.content:
It was a standard day in the WWE locker room before a show. The men and women were preparing for the night and doing what was necessary to put on a great show.

However, in a corner in the women's locker room, something was slightly different. Unbeknownst to almost everyone, but somehow, a strange device was laying on a table in the locker room. What everyone failed to realize was that this innocent looking, T.V. remote shaped device was actually an extremely powerful weapon, a shrink ray to be exact.

The shrink ray would've gone unnoticed, if not for a woman wandering the locker room. The curious woman walked towards the device. "What the hell is that?" she whispered to herself, and reached out her hand, lifting up the shrink ray.

The woman lifting it was....
1.title: At the outset....

11.content:
Bayley smiled as she walked around the locker room with her earbuds in. She was scheduled to have a match tonight with her storyline and real life best friend Sasha Banks. After that she had plans to meet her close friend Finn Balor for a drink afterword.

Tonight was supposed to be a great night for the plucky babyface Bayley. When she looked in the corner of the locker room she saw what looked like a strange remote control sitting in the corner.

"What's this," she mumbled to herself, as she bent down to pick it up, all while showing off her voluptuous ass. Lifting it up in her hand, Bayley assumed it must be for a T.V.

Bayley shrugged. "Whatever, I'll give it to production when I see them." She then turned up the music on in her earbuds and proceeded to start stretching. When she was about to do this, she dropped the remote onto a nearby chair, thinking nothing of it.

When this happened the remote landed with the shrink button down, causing a bright flash. In an instant someone was shrunk to 1 inch tall in the woman's locker room, but who?
11.title: Bayley

111.content:
A bright flash went off as a result of the size guns shrinking button being accidentally pressed. Almost instantaneously Bayley was shrink to an inch tall...uh oh. The bright flash had temporarily blinded Bayley so her eyes were still adjusting to the light, after a few moments she opened them and found herself in a familiar place...except it was absolutely massive.

“Oh my God! What the hell happened! Why is everything so big?”

Bayley’s Question would be answered almost immediately as the locker room door opened and in walked her best friend Sasha, Bayley was stunned to see that she was an absolute giantess! She was huge! Bayley was still in shock and wondered what I thought was that could’ve made her shrink in the first place. But her thoughts were but off once she heard some more booming footsteps approaching the locker room.

Not wanting to end up a stain on one of her fellow women’s feet Bayley ran and hid behind her bag that was still tucked away on the corner of the room. She then watched with both fear and curiosity as the rest of the Raw women’s division filled the locker room. Bayley was terrified, she had all of a sudden been shrunk and now she was at risk of being crushed by any of her fellow wrestlers! Luckily for Bayley her best friend Sasha offered her a glimmer of hope.

“Hey has anyone seen Bayley? I coulda sworn I saw her walk in here earlier” Sasha asked.

“Nope haven’t seen her” Alicia Fox responded.

“Hey isn’t that her bag over there?” Mickie James chimed in.

“Yeah it is, well she must be around her somewhere then” Sasha replied.

Bayley sighed a breath of relief as she heard this, she was so glad her best friend was concerned for her and this could mean she could mean get some much needed help! However she was a little wary of who found her, could she really trust just any of her fellow women to help her?

Her thoughts were interrupted as the familiar sound of booming footsteps filled the air, Bayley leaked out from behind her bag as she saw__________ approaching it.

Who was it?
111.title: Bayley Downsized

choices: Yes- she thinks Bayley is a bug
1111.content:
Bayley breathed out in relief, extremely relieved to see the giant feet of bee best friend, Sasha were approaching her bag. "If anyone will help me out, it's her," bayley whispered to herself.

Sasha decided she would simply do Bayley a favor and get her bag off the floor. Not really thinking anything of it, she thought she would just be a good friend.

As she walked closer, Sasha feet began tomcause tremors for her tiny friend. Looking up in amazement, Bayley was awestruck at she looking shadow of her giant friend. Peaking her head out from the safety the gym bag provided, Bayley nearly screamed as she was greeted by the massive view of Sasha's bare foot. She had not expected Sasha to be that close already.

"Hey Sasha down here!" Bayley screamed as she waves her arms. She knew she had to get the giant woman's attention somehow.

"HUH, I WONDER WHERE SHE WENT," Sasha whispered to herself, and slowly lifted the titanic bag up over her shoulder.

Bayley knew this was bad news as her own shelter and her safe haven was now being taken away. She began to run towards Sasha in a pathetic attempt to get her attention.

As Ms. Banks turns around, does anything on the floor catch her eye?
1111.title: Sasha Banks

11112.content:
Bayley ran as fast as her tiny legs could take her after her titanic friend Sasha who was getting further and further away. She couldn’t let her get away she was her only hope of being at least saved from the dangers of being a 1inch tall woman in a normal sized world. Bayley was worried that at her size she would be out the door before she could even make 10 feet. Full of desperation Bayley did the only thing she could think of and started yelling at the top of her lungs.

“SASHA!!!!!!!! IT’S ME BAYLEY!!!!!!!!! TURN AROUND PLEASE!!!!!!!!!” Bayley yelled.

Thst last outburst was all she could muster as she ran out of breath. Almost on cue however she felt the tremors stop and looked up to see thst Sasha had stopped walking! Bayley stood staring up at her friends collossal (but nice) ass as she awaited the boss’s next movement.

Sasha meanwhile was halfway to the door when she heard the faintest of squeaks coming from behind her. Turning around she looked back on the direction she had just been and saw nothing, confused she almost turned away again but then something on the floor caught her eye. Taking a step closer and causing another mild tremor for Bayley she got a little closer as she looked down on her friend, her gigantic shadow cast over her enveloping her in darkness for the time being. Bayley was elated and began jumping up and down in excitement. Meanwhile Sasha got down on one knee and inspected the mysterious “bug” at he feet.

“What the hell is that? Wait...no...it couldn’t be, Bayley!? Is that you?” Sasha asked bewildered.

Bayley was over the moon a speck her collossal friend had recognised her. Sasha then lowered her huge hand into the ground and invited Bayley to climb onto it, which she happily obliged to. Bringing her slowly and carefully up to her massive face Sasha addressed her inch tall best friend.

“Bayley? Oh my God what happened to you? Why are you so small???”

Bayley yelled up to Sasha who tilted her head so her ear was level with Bayley as she explained her unusual situation. After a few seconds Bayley finshed her story and Sasha began to digest this new information, however she forgot she was still in the middle of a fairly crowded women’s locker room.

“Yo Sasha what are you doing over there?” Mickie James asked.

“Yeah you’ve been crouched there for a while now, I thought you wanted to find Bayley?” Alicia Fox chimed in.

Thinking on her feet Sasha carefully and quickly close down her hand over Bayley to keep her hidden from view as she answered her colleagues.

“Oh nothing just thought I saw something on the ground haha”

The other women merely shrugged and went back to their own business as Sasha breathed a huge sigh of relief. Opening her hand Sasha spoke to her tiny friend once more.

“Sorry about that Bayley, I couldn’t risk them seeing you at this size. I think I’m gonna need to find a safe way of moving you about...” whispered Sasha

After a few seconds of contemplation Sasha decided the safest place to hide Bayley was in her...
11112.title: Boss N Hug Connection Reunited!

1112.content: How about any other female superstars
1112.title: Mickie James

11121.content:
Bayley looked out and saw Carmella walking towards her own bag which was
right next to Bayley's. She sat by her bag as the rest of the women in the room
made their way out for their match and she was left alone. Bayley then made a
decision to step out from behind her bag into Carmella's view so she could help
her.

"HEY CARMELLA, DOWN HERE"! Bayley shouted at the top of her voice, Carmella
looked to her right to see a shrunken Bayley calling her. "Oh my god Bayley, what
happened to you", Carmella said shocked. "I shrunk after hitting myself with the shrink
ray over there". Bayley pointed to the shrink ray and Carmella picked it up and looked
at it properly. She realised that it was set to shrink.

"Great set it to grow and grow me back to my normal size" Bayley told Carmella. Does
Carmella help her former friend grow back to her normal size?
11121.title: Carmella

112.content:
Being careless was dangerous when dealing with such a powerful device. As Bayley had casually dropped the shrink ray down onto a chair, it landed in the perfect position for it go activate.

This happened simultaneously as Bayley's good friend in both storyline and real life, Sasha, walked into the locker room.

"Hey girl," Sasha said, before being struck by the shrink ray. In a bright flash, Sasha was cut down to size, way down. She now stood a measly 1/2 inch tall, and was still stuck on the floor of the women's locker room.

Meanwhile, did Bayley see what had happened to her best friend?
112.title: Sasha gets smaller

113.content:
A bright flash enmitied from the shrink ray in Bayley's hands. She was not sure what was going on at first but it soon became very clear to her.

A female janitor had been cleaning up some trash in the locker room when the shrink ray discharged. Bayley watched in amazement as the woman was struck by the device and rapidly dwindled down. By the time the shrink ray had stopped firing, the poor woman now stood only 1 inch tall.

In shock, Bayley walked over to the tiny panicking woman. "Oh my god," she whispered, as she bent down and picked the tiny woman up.

The woman was screaming as Bayley's fingers wrapped around her body. She had no idea how this was possible and was absolutely terrified at what the giantess could do to her.

Seeing how frightened the tiny woman was, Bayley felt guilty. "Hey you're gonna be alright," she said, trying to reassure the shrunken woman.

Bayley walked over to a bench and placed the tiny woman down on it. She then sat on the floor next to her, so she could hear the woman better. "I'm really sorry about this, let me take a look at this thing. Then we'll figure out how to get you back to normal."

This seemed to relax the janitor. Bayley inspected the device when suddenly her phone went off. She stood up to grab it and smiled. It was her number one fan, Izzy, se don her an email.

Bayley then remembered that Izzy had a guest pass and would be showing up at the live event. "Who are you coming with???" Bayley texted back with a smile.

Distracted by this, Bayley lowered herself down to sit on the bench. The janitor screamed but it was too late. The poor woman was flattened into a pulp under Bayley's giant ass.

As soon as she sat down, Bayley hurt it. It was a wet splat. Bayley turned around and looked in horror at the remains of the janitor. She then wiped the back of her pants and noticed the small bloodstain.

"Oh my god," she whispered, covering her mouth. Before she could do anything else, another email popped back up on her phone.

Izzy mentioned that she was coming to the show with....
113.title: A janitor

1131.content:
Bayley smiled at her phone, she realized that Izzy was showing up with her parents, Jenny and Cody. The only problem was that Izzy had lost their guest passes so they would be unable to go backstage.

It was them Bayley glanced down at the shrink ray and smiled. An idea crept into her mind as she realized she could get them into the show after all. Replying to Izzy, she typed "tell your parents to go to the back parking lot. I'll meet you there, I know how to get you in."

After sending that, Bayley grabbed the shrink ray and began walking towards the back parking lot, now with what she thought was a great plan to get her number one fan and her parents into the arena.

--

Entering the parking lot, Bayley smiled and waved as she saw Izzy and her parents standing outside their car. Izzy ran up to her and embraced Bayley with a big hug. Bayley then proceeded to exchange pleasantries with both of Izzy's parents, hugging them as well.

"So what's the problem, why can't you get in?" Bayley asked the family.

Jenny rolled her eyes while Izzy looked dejected. Cody looked rather embarrassed. "Well we had passed," Jenny said. "But somebody forgot them on the counter," she said, shooting Cody an annoyed look.

Bayley felt bad for her biggest fan and the girl's parents, she knew how badly they wanted to go backstage.

"What if I told you I had a way to get you in?" Bayley said, as the family perked up.

After explaining the shrink ray to them, the family were still very skeptical but decided to give it a shot.

"Okay, whenever you're ready," Cody yelled out through the car window. Bayley smiled and pulled the trigger, shrinking the car and three occupants down to the size of a small hot wheels car.

The passengers could not believe their surroundings, they were amazed that it worked. They were even more shocked as they were lifted in front of Bayley's massive face.

"Okay, let's sneak you in," she laughed and slipped the car into her pocket.

-

Afte Bayley walked back into the locker room, she put the tiny car on the bench. As she prepared to restore the family, a stage hand entered and asked for her.

Lifting up the tiny car, Bayley smiled. "Don't move, I'll be right back," she said before exiting the locker room.

Not even a minute had passed when a shadow surprised all the passengers in the car. They screamed, as several giant fingers wrapped around it.

"WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?" a giant, terrifying voice asked. The family screamed as they were brought in front of the giant face of....
1131.title: Her parents (reserved)

11311.content:
The family screamed as several giant fingers wrapped around the car as it was lifted up towards the sky. Through the windshield the family saw the terrifyingly gigantic face of one of Bayley’s biggest rivals. Alexa Bliss.

“WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?” Alexa asked as the booming sound if her voice shook the family down to their very foundations.

As Izzy started crying her parents tired their best to console her despite the fact that they too were seconds away from crying themselves. What kind of idiots were that they let Bayley shrink them in the first place? They were in a car th size of a hot wheels and had to be less than an inch tall! And why the hell had Bayley just left them out in the open like this? Now they were in the grasp of a giant woman who hated Bayley and by proxy them!

Alexa brought the car right up to her face admiring what she suspected to be a simple toy left on the bench. She had no idea thst there was a tiny family of three inside hoping to not be discovered. After a few seconds Alexa shrugged and lowered the car back down to the bench. She then took out her phone and turned to leave.

The family breathed a sigh of relief as Alexa placed them back onto the bench. Maybe they would be ok after all, no sooner than they had been placed on the bench however the father celebrated a little bit prematurely as he hit the steering wheel in excitement. To his and the family’s horror he accienelty struck the horn letting out a loud honk (to the at least)

Sweat dripping from their foreheads the family sat scared as they awaited to see if Alexa heard the honk. In fact...
11311.title: Unlucky Moment of Bliss

choices: Take the family out of the car
Take some of the family members out of the car
113111.content:
The family sat in the car in horror, refusing to move or give any sign that they were living, breathing people. They could only watch as Alexa's massive body stopped walking away and turned around. Izzy let out s nervous cry as Alexa reached down and lifted up the tiny car.

"DID THIS CAR JUST HONK?" Alexa said to herself, lifting the toy sized car up to her face to examine it again. Alexa was still in street clothes and not wearing her usual makeup, though she still looked very impressive.

Alexa examined the tiny vehicle, trying to figure out what it was. Her eyes widened in amazement as she saw something she did not expect inside of the car. She had initially thought that the three tiny people in the car were figureines, just to make the car look more realistic. Now one of them had moved.

"OH MY GOD," Bliss said in disbelief. "YOU'RE ALL REAL!"

A feeling of terror creptnover all three of the passengers. This would only amplify by what the goddess said next.

"OH SHIT," she laughed. "AREN'T YOU THE NUMBER ONE BAYLEY FAN?" There was a pause as Alexa drank in the situation. "THIS IS TOO FUCKING FUNNY," she laughed.

She tossed the car up and down in her palm, causing the terrified family of three to scream. Alexa then gave a devious smile, as she decided she was going to....
113111.title: Alexa heard it!

choices: Bayley noticed her but dropped the gun!
Bayley fired and shrunk Alexa.....and the family
1131112.content:
Alexa had stumbled upon something strange yet wonderful. She had just came into the Locker room to get ready for that nights Raw, but now she had discovered a tiny hot wheels sized car and what was more amazing was that the car contained Bayley’s number one fan Izzy and her parents. Truly this was too good to be true for Alexa who had a lot of ideas for the teeny tiny family.

“Holy shit I can’t believe this is happening. You guys are actually tiny and totally at my mercy haha! Now what should I do with you little bugs hmmm...” Alexa pondered as she continued to toss the boat up and down in her hand.

In the car the family were screaming as they were being flung through the air with no end in sight. Izzy was even sick as the momentum of being thrown up and down took its toll on the super fan. The parents couldn’t even pretend like they were ok as they began crying and screaming at their predicament. After a minute or two an idea had popped into Alexa’s head, so she stopped tossing the car and brought it up to her huge face as she looked in and addressed the tiny family.

“Ok little bugs if you want to love you’re going to do exactly what I say. If you don’t I’ll crush you and you’re car into dust. Now honk if you understand me.” Alexa sternly told the family.

After a few seconds the sound of the car horn Honking could be faintly heard by Alexa who smiled devilishly as a result.

“Ok bugs now out of the car and onto my hand right now!” Alexa demanded.

The family didn’t hesitate, within seconds they were out of the car and onto the huge yet soft hand of Alexa who stared down at them menacingly, when the addresses them with her booming voice terrifying the tiny family.

“Ok bugs I’m only gonna ask this once. How did you get so small?” Alexa asked.

The dad of the family began talking so Alexa brought her hand up to her ear as the dad shouted his story into her gigantic ear. Alexa was just able to make out his voice and listened to his explanation. After a few minutes Alexa brought the hand back to in front of her face and smiled.

She then took a small empty perfume bottle out of her bag and poked a few holes in the lid. She then deposited the screaming family into it before placing the bottle between her enormous tits. Alexa had learned that Bayley was in possession of a shrink ray, now all she had to do was take it from her.

Placing the car back where she found it on the bench, Alexa hid in one of the lockers and waited for Bayley to return. After a few minutes the locker room door opened and in walked Bayley, she immedietly headed over to the bench and was delighted to see the car was still there.

“Hey guys sorry about that, now cmon hop out of the car and I’ll grow you back to normal size...guys? Cmon get out or do you like being small haha.” Bayley laughed.

Bayley then took out the shrink ray and approached the car, leaning down so she could see why the family were taking so long. Meanwhile Alexa saw the shrink ray and slowly crept out of the locker and approached Bayley determined to steal the gun.

Alexa slowly approached Bayley and...
1131112.title: Alexa’s Interrogation

11311121.content:
As quietly as she could, Alexa started to approach Bayley. She only had a few seconds to make this work. She saw that Bayley was so transfixed on the tiny vehicle waiting for Izzy and her parents to exit.

"Everything all right in there?" Bayley asked down to the tiny car. She was starting to suspect that something was wrong but hadn't put it together yet that the family was no longer in there. Then she felt a forceful push strike her back.

Alexa had rushed Bayley with all the force she could generate and send the hugger tumbling face first towards the floor. Bayley hit the floor and was temporarily fazed and confused. This was all the time Alexa needed to grab the shrink ray and hold the confused Bayley at gunpoint.

"Well that was easier that I thought," Alexa laughed. "Now what should I do with this cool toy you've got."

Bayley was panicking. She knew Alexa had done something with Izzy and her family, but had no idea what. All she knew now was this short bitch was now holding her up with her own shrink ray. "Alexa what did you do?" Bayley asked in a panic. "Where's Izzy?"

Alexa gave a wicked smirk. "Don't worry, she and her parents are fine in here," she saw, pulling the small perfume bottle out from between her tits. She then put it back as Bayley reached out for it.

"How about we trade," Bayley reasoned. "I let you keep the shrink ray, and you give me them?"

"Problem is Bayley, that I already have the shrink ray. Let's see how it works on you!" Alexa said.

Bayley's eyes widened as she realized what was about to happen. "Wait no!" she yelled.

It was too late. The shrink ray struck Bayley directly, instantly reducing her to the size of an ant. Alexa reached down and picked up the tiny, terrified wrestler. "WELL BAYLEY, HAVE FUN....
11311121.title: Alexa grabbed the gun!

choices: Keeps them small, plays with them
Keeps them small, bring them to the ring for her match
113112.content:
The family of three froze in their seats. None of them wanted to take a chance at making the slightest sound. Not when there was a giant woman who did not care for them so close.

In the backseat, Izzy was doing her absolute best not to break down into tears. Her parents were not doing much better. They could only let their imagination run wild as to what the giantess that was Alexa Bliss would do to their tiny bodies if she found them.

There was a collective exhale as Alexa stood up, eyes still fixated on her phone stood up and walked out of the locker room.

"Thank god," the father said as Izzy reared up in relief. The family proceeded to sit in their cars for an additional five minutes before the locker room door opened again. The family held their breaths, anxious to see which giantess would enter the locker room.

They were all extremely relived to see it was Bayley. She looked much different than before, now in full ring gear with her hair tied up in the traditional ponytail off to the side.

"I'M BACK!" she called out cheerfully, happy to see the car was still sitting on the bench. She kneeled down next to it, letting the family get a great view of Bayley's giant face, and unintentionally, her massive cleavage.

"HOW'RE YOU ALL DOING?" Bayley said with a laugh, as she lifted the tiny car up into her hand. Despite the fact that these people were her fans and also her friends, there was a certain power of them that she loved having. Not only that, but it was very addictive.

"READY TO GROW BACK?" Bayley asked and lifted the car up to her ear. She could hear them all collectively yell yes, and placed the bar back down onto the bench.

As she grabbed the shrink ray, Bayley prepared to grow her fans back. However, she began to have second thoughts.

What does Bayley end up doing?
113112.title: Alexa didn't hear it

choices: A harmless game of hide and seek
She wanted to be a rampaging monster
1131122.content:
Bayley examines the shrunken trio of her fans inside the car and bit her lip. This opportunity that presented itself was just too tempting. “Actually, I have another plan,” she said, and began to lower the shrunken car down into her pocket. She left the locker room to let management know she wasn’t feeling well and would be heading back to her hotel.

Inside the pocket, the shrunken family were all extremely confused inside the car. “Why isn’t she growing us back?” Jenny asked nervously.

“I’m sure everything is fine,” Cody responded. “I’m sure she’s planning a big surprise for Izzy.” Realistically, he was also quite worried but did not want to show it. In the back seat, Izzy was silent just starring out the window.

Bayley’s hotel was just down the block, and she arrived very soon. She nearly ran to her room and locked the door. She pulled the car out of her pocket and sat down on the floor. “Alright, come on out,” she said with a smile. The family tentatively exited the vehicle.

Bayley smiled down at her new toys. “So the reason I brought you back here is that I want to play a game with you!”

The shrunken family all looked at each other in confusion again. “A game?” Jenny yelled out. “Please just grow us back!”

“Relax everything will be fine,” Bayley said.

What game did she want to play?
1131122.title: Keeps them small, plays with them

11311222.content:
“Well everyone, the game I’m playing is that I’m gonna be a giant monster, and you’re all gonna run,” Bayley said with giddiness in her voice. Looking down at her three “friends” she couldn’t help but get excited at the sheer power she had over them.

Down below, Izzy and her family were terrified. “Daddy, what’s she mean by that?” Izzy whimpered.

Izzys father looked at his daughter and wife with concern. “I’m sure it’ll be fine,” he said, though his tone was not convincing at all.

Suddenly, Bayley slammed her massive, bare foot down on the family’s car, crushing it instantly. The family screamed in horror at what this massive foot had done.

“NOW RUN!” Bayley laughed. This psychotic giantess was having the time of her life, all at the expense of three of her biggest fans.

Izzy’s mom, Jenny, grabbed her daughters hand and began to run on the hotel carpet, followed directly by Cody, Izzys father. Izzy was sobbing the whole time, terrified that she would be crushed just like the car.

“HEY! I WANT YOU TO SPLIT UP!” Bayley demanded. To prove this, she slammed her bare foot again behind the trio.

“Izzy, run under the bed,” Jenny said, pulling her daughter in and planting a kiss on her forehead. The parents watched as Izzy ran towards the bed and nodded. Jenny and Cody both took off in other directions.

Looking down with a playful smile, Bayley raised her foot again. “Hmmmm, with giantess wants a foot rub,” she laughed. She raised up her foot and brought it down on....
11311222.title: She wanted to be a rampaging monster

113112222.content:
Things had taken a surprisingly turn. Bayley has decided instead of growing her friends back to normal size, she wanted to play with them. This would be fine if she had asked them first, no instead she had virtually kidnapped and was now playing the role of a rampaging monster!

Now here they were trapped in Bayley’s hotel room whilst this restaurant supposed friend lived out this fantasy. Cody and Jenny were smart enough to send Izzy to hide under the bed whilst Bayley stomped around.

Bayley meanwhile was loving this, she still considered these tiny people her friends, but this was too a good chance to pass up. Maybe she had taken things a little too far by crushing their family car under her foot, but she could always just buy them a new one.

Now she has stomped her foot down for one of the parents to rub. She pinned one of them under it as she felt them squirm!

“Mmmmm looks like the big bad giantess has caught herself a foot rubber, and the lucky winner is...oh will you look at that it’s jenny! Hihi Ok I can work with this, whilst your down there rub my foot would ya?” Bayley says giggling.

Jenny meanwhile was punching and kicking at the giant wall of flesh that was covering her entire body. She could feel the surprisingly soft foot of Bayley trap her and grind her slightly as she tried screaming, only to get a mouth full of foot instead!

“Bay...ley! Get yo...ur...fucking...foot off of me!” Jenny yelled.

Izzy meanwhile had to watch from her hiding place under the bed as her mom calls out in fear and pain. She wanted to run out and shield her from harm but what could she do? She what Bayley did to her car, so what could she do to her? Explode her into a tiny red stain under her foot that’s what!

Bayley was loving the tiny woman under her foot. She couldn’t believe she had a shrink ray, she could live out all her fantasies with this, and she could punish anyone that deserved it. The likes of Nia, Charlotte and Shayna would never wrong her again.

“Hihi c’mon Jenny rub my foot better than that. Or do you just like feet? Hihi if you wanted to stay under their I cha out you in my sock it’s no problem!” Bayley teased.

Jenny almost choked on Bayley’s foot flesh as she heard this, she did not want to spend any more time with Bayley’s foot. Doing the only thing she could she yelled for her husband to help.

“CODY! Help me useless bastard!” Jenny yelled.

Cody, who has been watching like a coward the entire time, snapped back into as he ran over to the massive building that was Bayley’s foot and started pounding away at it.

“Get your god damn foot off my wife you giant bitch!” He shouted in an almost manly fashion.

Bayley watched the tiny man run over to her foot and start hitting her foot, she was amused by his bravery, someone so small was still trying to act fierce, it made her feel excited in a way.

She reached down and with very little effort plucked him from the floor. Cody stopped fighting immediately as he came face to face with Bayley. Her billboard sized face and gigantic white teeth were blue off-putting and made Cody feel as small as she actually was.

“Hihi, hiya Cody. You know I was gonna let you rub my other foot. But since you’re such a man I’m gonna give you a much better place.” Bayley said smiling.

Cody gulped as Bayley planned to put him where?
113112222.title: Bayley’s Foot Rub

1131123.content:
The scene in the locker room was a strange one, the most normal aspect about it being that it contained wwe superstar Bayley dressed and ready for another exciting episode of Monday night raw. The peculiar parts were the fact she had what looked like a child’s toy in her hand, that was in actuality a shrink ray. And then there was the case of the shrunken family in their hot wheels sized car resting on a bench in front if her. It was a strange day indeed.

Now Bayley was friends with the tiny family as they were (ironically) her biggest fans whom she had snuck into the building in the first place. But now was the time to unshrink the family who had just had a rather terrifying close call with Alexa Bliss, but the power Bayley felt when she looked at and felt the tiny family was addictive, so addictive in fact that she wasn’t sure she was ready to unshrink her fans. That’s when the next words out of Bayley’s mouth scared the tiny family.

“Actually on second thought guys I don’t think I’m gonna unshrink you just yet. I mean this is just too good an opportunity to waste. You guys can have an up and close personal view of my match tonight that no other fans will ever get! So sit tight because we’re going for a little ride to the ring hihi” Bayley giggled as she made to pick up the tiny car once more.

The family were beside themselves in a panic. After narrowly avoiding the terror that was a gigantic Alexa Bliss now they were feeling threatened by their best friend in wwe and the woman who had done this to them in first place. The gigantic Ruby left, taking off after Bayley. "Okay, we have to get out and get back under the turnbuckle." Helen said, trying to remain calm and turning to Izzy who was petrified. "Okay sweetie, unbuckle and lets head back to the corner." Liam turned to her "What? Leave the safety of the car? Are you insane!?" He stared at her wide eyed as she raised her voice, "Does this really seem safe anymore? Look where we are! We're practically in the middle of the ring! Move!" Liam grabbed her by the arm, "Helen, we are not leaving the safety of the Big. Metal. Box" She sneered, "Fine, you stay in your precious metal box! Izzy and I are going back to the turnbuckle. Izzy, let's go!" Liam didn't even look at her, "Fine, go! But go now while they're still far away." Helen slammed the door shut behind her and made her way to the turnbuckle with Izzy.

Helen muttered under her breath, "Stubborn bastard." before turning to Izzy, "Okay honey, let's just try and enjoy the match now, okay?" Izzy looked up at her mum and nodded before turning back to the match and despite everything, looked up at her giant idol, halfway across the ring, with awe. It was hard to tell exactly what was going on from their tiny heights but it looked like Bayley was starting to get the upper hand, the crowd was going wild and the argument from earlier was starting to ease from their minds. At that moment, Liv Morgan and Sarah Logan slipped into the ring. Sarah Logan ran at Bayley who ducked the clothesline and spun off to hit the ropes. Liv Morgan had come in the ring much closer to them and the giant woman with her candy floss pink hair turned towards them, she ran towards the turnbuckle with ideas of climbing it. Izzy and Helen looked on in horror as the house sized blue sole of Liv's white and blue Jordan crashed down on top of the tiny, insignificant car that Brian was still inside. Helen froze in place as Izzy let out a guttural roar of a scream and ran out towards the now crushed, compacted car as Liz reached the top rope and turned waiting for her opportunity to soar through the skies at Bayley but Bayley had already dealt with Sarah Logan and tossed her back out of the ring. She sprinted towards the balancing Liv Morgan and knocked her backwards, off of the top turnbuckle and down to ringside. Izzy didn't even register the gigantic multi-coloured boot slam down next to her as she knelt down next to the wreck of her dads car and wept. Bayley spun, the heel of her boot briefly passing over her almost microscopic fan and settling back down on the other side of the tiny girl. During the commotion Ruby Riott had regained her composure and charged at Bayley in the corner once more, this time connecting with a clothesline. Bayley's legs flew off the ground. Izzy finally noticed what was happening and looked up to the sky to see the colossal ass of her idol free falling towards her. Helen finally snapped out of her trance and screamed, "IZZY! MOOOOOVE!" Izzy was transfixed on the gargantuan red spandex covered Bayley booty that was racing towards her, "Bay-" was all she could choke out before SLAM! Bayley's ass smashed into the ground and she didn't even notice as she pulverized her biggest fan. Helen screamed as she looked on and could do nothing but back away from the horror that had just played out in front of her.

All of the Riott Squad rushed the ring and began to pummel the dazed Bayley, trying to injure her. After dealing some lasting damage, Liv and Sarah lifted Bayley up and Ruby Riott delivered a devastating Riott Kick. They stood over the downed Bayley but they clearly weren't done. Ruby directed Liv and Sarah to the outside of the ring as she rolled Bayley back to the corner. She rolled out the ring and barked orders, Liv grabbed Bayley's legs and Sarah grabbed her arms then Ruby screamed for them to pull her into the ring post. Helen was stood against the ring post, staring at the toned stomach of her daughter's idol, the same idol that had just sat on and crushed her little girl to a pulp. "No... Please, no! NOT LIKE THIS! PLEASE! OH GOD, NO!" Helen screamed and pleaded to Bayley, to the Riott Squad, to God but she was helpless. All she could do was watch as the humongous form of Bayley sped towards her. The ability to scream left her and all she could do was whimper as the toned stomach muscles and soft, smooth flesh of Bayley's stomach smashed against the ring post. Helen was consumed as her body exploded between them. The Riott Squad's music hit and they made their way back up the ramp. Bayley started to stir and in a panic moved out of the corner and looked frantically for the tiny car only to see it, no crushed with a small spec of a blood stain next to it along with blood splattered across her stomach. She cried, both in pain and in horror as she ran up the ramp to the back. She had to do something so she...
11311232.title: The Riott Squad

113112321.content:
With tears in her eyes and blood on her hands (well on her stomach...and ass...) Bayley ran towards the women’s locker room. She couldn’t believe what she had done, accident or not she had crushed and killed her biggest fans! Even if it wasn’t her intention she had still been the one to cause their deaths. If she hadn’t found the stupid gun, if she hadn’t decided to shrink them in the first place, if she hadn’t brought them out to the ring with her for her match with the Riott Squad! It all came back to her and her stupid and selfish decisions. She was a monster and she had to find a way to atone for her sins.

Bursting through the door Bayley slammed it shut behind her as she stood crying and panting heavily. She was ashamed and disgusted if her self and she needed to pay for her actions. Walking over to her bag she pulled out everything in it before losing her patience and simply tipping it upside down and allowing the contents to fall to the floor with a thud. That’s when she found it. The tool of all this destruction, the cause of her guilt...and the means for her penance.

Shaking slightly she took the gun between her fingers as she adjusted the settings. She had to put herself in the same situation she had put that poor poor family in, she had to shrink herself and allow the world to swallow her however it saw fit.

“G-g-guys. F-f-friends...I’m so sorry. I-I-I did this to you. B-but you won’t be alone...I’ll be there with you soon enough...in the big squared circle in the sky!” Bayley spluttered.

Taking the gun she finshed messing with it and turned it so that the barrel was facing her. Taking a deep breath as single tear rolled down her cheek Bayley pulled the trigger. A bright light shone as a beam fired from the gun and struck Bayley dead on. On seconds Bayley started to dwindle down in size as she shrunk from the size of a normal person to that of something much smaller. As she shrunk Bayley dropped the size gun ensuring it remained at regular size. The same couldn’t be said for Bayley to continued shrinking until she was no bigger than a mere ant on the locker room floor. The same size that poor family had been when they had met their end.

Taking a moment to admire her surroundings Bayley tried wiping away the tears to no avail. Each time she did she just cried even harder as more and more tears erupted from her eyes. Accepting her fate Bayley decided to just curl up into a ball on the locker room floor and wait for the first person to enter and...put her out of her misery.

“I deserve this...I deserve to be a bug on the floor...I even deserve to be crushed like one...I’m sorry Izzy.”

This was all Bayley could muster as she simply let all her emotions out at once and cried with all her might. A waterfall of tears poured from her eyes as Bayley started to shut down emotionally, in fact she was so enveloped in guilt and despair she didn’t even hear the locker room door start to open.

As Bayley lay at the size of an ant with the size gun mere inches from her she was completely oblivious to the fact that__________ entered the locker room. Who was it?
113112321.title: Bayley’s Final Atonement

choices: The Riott Squad were all tiny
Bayley had managed to shrink herself by accident
113112322.content:
Bayley pushed past everyone who tried to speak to her backstage and burst into the locker room which, thankfully, was empty. She stood in the middle of the locker room in shock as she pictured the tiny car wreck that had been obliterated underneath the weight of one of the giant women. She imagined what it must have been like inside the car as the roof came caving in. She pictured the entire family screaming for each other in their final moments but she knew that wasn't how it happened, the blood stain on the canvas and on her stomach meant that at least one of them had got out of the car and been crushed by her body, maybe two or even all of them had been. She ran her fingers across her toned stomach and wiped the blood off onto her fingers and stared at it for almost a minute. She panicked and ran over to her bag in the corner to rub the blood off on to her towel. Bayley stared at herself in the mirror then rubbed the tears from her eyes. Her hands continued down the length of her body, over the stomach that she knew had killed another person and onto her legs before she moved round and brought her hands back up over her ass to rest on her lower back. As her hands skimmed over her ass she felt an odd feeling in the fabric, a tear? She turned, presenting her rear end to the mirror to look. Well it's not a rip... Bayley moved her hand back over the anomaly and peeled it off of her skin tight wrestling gear and brought it round to her face. What the hell is th- It hit her "Oh my god!" she threw her other hand up and over her mouth it was a tiny, almost indistinguishable, blood stained purple t-shirt with big yellow letters that said "I'm a hugger". Bayley finally broke down and fell to her knees and wept.

Bayley had knelt on the floor for what felt like an eternity as she cried for what she had done and processed what had happened in the ring. They did this, Ruby wanted this to happen. She must be behind all of this! Bayley shot up to her feet and grabbed the shrinking device, They're going to pay for this! She thought to herself as she stormed out through the door and made her way to the Riott Squads locker room.

The door to the Riott Squads locker room crashed open as Bayley kicked it in. "WHAT THE HELL!?" the three women screamed in unison from inside. "Bayley?" Ruby said, "What are you doing?" Bayley just stood there, silent, staring down the three members before her. "You're not pissed about what happened out there, are you?" Ruby asked, quizzically. "Yeah," Liv chimed in, "We've got a reputation to keep up. It's not that personal, 'kay?" She finished with a cheeky grin. Bayley was breathing heavily, the look she gave them could have killed them all on its own, "You..." She started. "You monsters." Tears welled in Bayleys eyes once more. Ruby, Liv and Sarah shared looks between each other and mouthed What the fuck? "Why? Why did you have to kill them?" Bayley almost whispered. The three women's eyes all shot wide open, "Wait, what d-" Bayley interrupted her with a scream, "SHUT UP!" and raised the remote, pointing it into the locker room. "Woah. WOAH! Bayley what the hell is that thing?!" All Bayley did was laugh and the Riott Squad were terrified, "Oh, you're about to find out." Ruby stepped forward, "Bayley. Just calm do-" That was all she managed before Bayley pressed down on the remote and a bright flash enveloped the room.

When the light receded and their vision returned...
113112322.title: Vengeance is a Riott

"WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?" a giant, terrifying voice asked. The family of three screamed as they were brought in front of the massive face of Nia Jax.

"Oh god, not her," Izzy's mother cried, as the titanic woman lifted the car to her eye and studied it.

"WHY WOULD SOMEONE JUST LEAVE THIS HERE?" Nia whispered to herself, unaware that everyone inside the car could hear her.

Then the absolute worst case scenario happened for the family inside of the vehicle: Nia saw movement.

"WAIT, WHAT'S THAT?" the Samoan giantess asked. She placed her chubby fingers on the driver's side door and easily tore it off of the vehicle. She then turned the vehicle on it's side and shook it a few times. Soon, all three occupants of the car tumbled out into Nia's fat hands.

"WAIT, ARE YOU ALL REAL PEOPLE?" Nia asked bringing the shrinkees up to her face. She studied them and soon concluded that these were absolutely real people. Not only that but it soon dawned on her WHO exactly they were. This was Bayley's biggest fan, and these must've been her parents as well.

"SAY, AREN'T YOU BAYLEY'S NUMBER ONE FAN," Nia said, reveling in the power she felt over these tiny humans.

She did not even bother to wait for a response. She simply laughed and dropped the three tiny people onto her extended tongue. She milked in their screams, almost becoming aroused by them, and retracted her tongue back into her mouth.

What Nia really wanted now was to find Bayley and show her the tiny victims before she swallowed. Is Nia able to find Bayley?

113131.content:
Nia Jax felt a Rush of incredible power as she had three tiny 1/4 inch tall humans on the tip of her tongue. If she wanted to she could swallow them whole and let them dissolve in the pit of her stomach. But that would be too easy.

Nia decided to have a little fun first. She swished the tiny family around inside her massive mouth as they all screamed and begged for Nia to stop. The mighty Samoan didn’t let up as she kept on torturing the people in her mouth.

After a few more minutes of this Nia opened her mouth and spat the saliva drenched family onto her large meaty palm. Izzy and her parents all gasped for air as they held eachother tightly as Nia’s huge intimidating face came closer to them.

“Now if you guys don’t want it end up as three tiny red stains on my hand, then you’re going to tell me how you all ended up so small. So what’s it gonna be bugs?” Nia threatened.

Nia looked down with her huge menacing eyes as Izzy’s dad nervously stepped forward to answer the giantess.

“It was Bayley...she had some kind of shrink ray...she shrunk us so we could sneak into the show and she was supposed to grow us back! But she had to take a phone call or something and left us here!” Izzy’s dad explained.

Nia listened intently to the dads explanation before she cracked a massive smile. The irresistible force began to laugh maniacally as Izzy’s family resumed their hug and prayed for their safety.

“Well thank you guys you’ve been very helpful. Now a promise is a promise I won’t crush you...yet. But I’ll need to keep you somewhere for a little while so...” Nia started.

Nia then moved her hand and dumped the family back onto her outstretched tongue as the family screamed. She then retracted her tongue trapping the family inside the dark damp cave that was her mouth. Nia then say down and waited for Bayley to return as she had a plan for how to deal with her.

10 minutes later

The locker room door opened and in walked a jubilant Bayley who was down with her phone call and was ready to us shrink her biggest fans. To her surprise she found Nia sat on the locker room bench. Feeling slightly worried Bayley have an awkward greeting before heading over to the bench where she left the car. To her horror she saw it was missing!

“Oh my god.” Bayley whispered.

She then turned to Nia who was nonchalantly texting on her phone.

“Erm Nia you didn’t see a toy car when you walked I did you?” Bayley asked nervously.

Nia simply nodded her head gesturing to the bench on the other side of the room. Bayley turned and saw the toy car and breathed a sigh of relief before she headed over to check on her friends. That’s when she realized the car was empty and was missing a door.

Panicked Bayley quickly put two and two together and went over to Nia demanding answers.

“Where are they Nia! And don’t play games with me I know you did something!” Bayley shouted.

Nia simply smiled before she struck her tongue out showing the family who all yelled for Bayley to save them. Bayley instinctively reached out for them before Nia pulled her tongue back in and closed her mouth. She then wagged her finger at Bayley who got angry immediately.

Whipping out the shrink ray she pointed at Nia like she was holding a gun.

“Nia you spit them out right now or I’ll shrink you done even smaller than them! So give them to me now!” Bayley yelled.

Nia just smiled as she slowly stood up to her full intimidating height.

“I don’t think so Bayley. If you shrink me I’ll have no choice but to swallow your little friends and let them digest in my stomach. So I think I’ll make you a little counter offer. You give me that shrink ray and I’ll spare them. If you don’t maybe I’ll just chew them like bubblegum!”

Bayley stood silent with the shrink ray pointed at Nia. She was incredibly conflicted. On one hadpnd she wanted to do whatever it takes to get her friends back, but is she gives up the shrink ray she might as well say goodbye to her size. It was an incredibly thought decision.

“Well Bayley What’s it gonna be?” Nia asked.

Baylor decided to....

Bayley was panicking. She felt absolutely defeated as this seemed to be a no win situation for her. If she refused to hand over the shrink ray, Nia would surely swallow her three friends alive, or even chew them. With an anxious sigh, Bayley realized what she had to do. “Alright Nia, you win,” she said, extending her hand with the shrink ray. “I know you’re going to shrink me, please just let them go,” Bayley said. A tear trickled down the face of the hugger as she felt her fate was sealed.

“Okay Nia, I’m yours! Now let them go!” Bayley screamed, hoping the giant would hold up to her word.

Sasha has even more fun with Nia at her current size
1213.content:
Nia Jax walked into the locker room, finding it vacant. Upon further inspection, she noticed a strange remote abandoned. Upon closer inspection, she noticed several buttons labelled in a way she'd not seen on any kind of remote before. Curiosity overtaking her, she pressed one of the buttons at random.

She suddenly felt compelled to squeeze her eyes shut as a strange sensation overtook her. It was like nothing she'd ever felt before, and after a few seconds the feeling left her again. When she opened her eyes, she gasped in shock. Everything seemed bigger! Looking around, the table that she had towered over was now at her eye level. That's when she realised. That damn remote had shrunk her!

Nia was examining the remote more closely when the locker room door burst open. Nia then heard a loud gasp. Turning her head, she was shocked to see Sasha Banks standing in the open doorway, peering at her like an animal at a zoo. Nia then watched in horror as the Boss approached her, with a sadistic smug smirk that Nia didn't like one bit. The Boss came close enough to make Nia's new size crystal clear.

Usually even when Sasha was wearing heels, the Irresistible Force still towered over her. But now? She barely made it to Sasha's crotch.

From Sasha's perspective, she was just about ready to burst into laughter. When she'd opened the locker room door, the last thing she'd expected to see was a two foot high Nia Jax. The Samoan Behemoth was truly a force to be reckoned with, but now? Sasha could do anything with her.

"Haha!" Sasha cackled, unable to hold in her laughter any longer. "What happened to you Nia?" Nia opened her mouth to try to explain, only for Sasha to clamp two fingers over the Samoan's mouth, preventing her from speaking. That was all she needed at that size. "Ah-bu-bu-bu-bu, I don't actually care. What I do care about, is seeing how much fun I can have with you now," Sasha grinned, causing Nia to gulp.

At a size meaning that she tended to intimidate almost everybody else, Nia wasn't used to feeling truly vulnerable, the way she was now. She'd spent years terrorising Sasha inside the ring. Now it seemed she was going to regret throwing her weight around.

Without any warning, Sasha grabbed hold of Nia and tossed her across the room with all the strength she could, sending Nia flying until she collided with a steel locker. Nia yelped in pain at the impact, crumbling to a heap. Sasha stalked closer, bending down to look Nia in the face. "Not so powerful now are you? Now I see why you spent so many our matches tossing me around the ring." She giggled. "It's really fun!"

Nia didn't have much time to recover before Sasha picked her up, hoisting her up on her shoulders in a Fireman's Carry position. Sasha then began to squat with Nia on her shoulders, revelling in the power she now held over her enemy. Having previously been six feet tall and nearly three hundred pounds, Nia had been reduced to a third of her size, making it perfectly easy for Sasha to toss and carry her around with ease.

"Fourteen, fifteen, sixteen..." Sasha continued to count her squats, a wide smile on her face at the fact that she was now able to carry such a large woman as much as she liked instead of the other way around. She couldn't blame Nia for having treated her the same way in all of their matches; Sasha was having the time of her life!

Eventually Sasha grew bored and decided to switch it up. She walked over to a wooden bench and unceremoniously tossed the shrunken Nia onto it, causing the small Samoan to groan in pain. Sasha fired off a text to her Four Horsewomen group chat to meet her in the locker room, before she decided to take on a seat on the small woman's belly.

Nia grunted in discomfort as Sasha plopped her toned but curvy rear down onto her stomach. Only because of the height disparity, Sasha's butt now also covered her chest as well, sitting sideways on the Samoan. Nia gasped in pain as Sasha swivelled round to look down at her. She couldn't believe how heavy Sasha felt on her.

"I'm really glad you ended up at this size Nia, your ego definitely deserved to be taken down a peg or two," Sasha smiled at the stare of hatred Nia shot back at her in response. She was certainly going to have fun with a woman who'd caused her no end of pain in their brutal matches over the years. "I'm going to have lots of fun with you, and you're going to take every second of it!"

Nia's panic surged at the evil glint in Sasha's eyes, knowing that she was powerless against the now much larger woman.

What happens next?
