"YOU'RE SO TEENY! TEENY AND NAKED! LOOK AT YOU, ITTY BITTY BLISSY! I MUST LOOK SOOO HUUUUUUUUGE!" Alexa is getting sick of the size comparisons and goes to kick at Nikki's giant finger. Nikki responds with a giggle and says "That tickled, buggy bliss. You shouldn't hit people when they're so much bigger than you..." To show off her power, Nikki takes a big inhale and curls her lips, blowing a burst of minty scented air into Alexa's puny body. Alexa goes flying back landing on her ass, screaming in frustration as Nikki laughs at her little partner's plight. Nia lets out a small laugh of her own as she reaches down to the bed and picks up the remote. Nikki sees Nia going for the remote out of the corner of her eye and stand up to her full height again. "Is... is that what made her so tiny?" Nia just nods and stands with her arms crossed, waiting for the scottish girl to make her next move. To everyone's surprise though, Nikki just holds her arms out and says "Do Nikki."

Nia and Alexa both do a double take as Nikki repeats herself. "Do Nikki! Do Nikki! I want to be little too! Shrink me! SHRINK NIKKI!" Nia is dumbfounded but nonetheless does exactly as nikki asks. She presses a button on the remote and in a flash, Nikki is replaced by a pile of clothing on the ground where she once stood. Nia crouches down over the pile and scans the fabric until she sees a tiny little bump moving it’s way underneath the shirt. She pulls it aside, revealing the shrunken Nikki Cross to the world, who lets out a squeal of joy. “Big Nia’s even bigger! Nikki’s sooo little now!” Nia lets Nikki enjoy herself for a few seconds as she stares up with awe and looks around the whole room spinning in circles. “Soo Tiny! So Tiny! So Tiny!” She is loving the feeling of being so insignificant in such a new environment, she doesn’t even seem to notice that she’s not wearing any clothes. Or if she is, she clearly doesn’t care. Nia places her hand down on the ground facing up, inviting the shrunken girl to climb aboard. “Happy now, Nikki? I made you tiny just like you wanted. Now in return, you’re gonna help us fix Alexa.” Nikki suddenly remembers her shrunken friend and says “Ooh! Lexi! I forgot about her! She’s tiny too! Let me see her!” With much enthusiasm, Nikki scales Nia’s massive fingertips and walks into the center of her palm, sitting indian style. Nia carefully lifts Nikki off the ground and lowers her to the desk, genuinely enjoying the rush of carrying another shrunken person in her hands. “I could get used to this feeling”, both of them seem to say to themselves. Climbing off of Nia’s fingertips, Nikki looks around but doesn’t see her friend at all. Maybe she’s hiding behind the lamp on the desk, or Nia picked her up or… maybe she’s right in front of her.

Nikki’s gaze slowly drops down and Alexa is still there, backing away slowly, the size of a doll at her feet. Even though Nikki was shrunk, Nia must have messed around with the controls and lowered the amount she would be reduced by. Nikki was only five inches tall to Nia… which mean that Alexa still only came up to Nikki’s ankles. The diminutive scot looked down at her even tinier friend and laughed at her situation. “HA! Nikki is tiny but Lexi is littler! I almost stepped on you, didn’t I?!” Alexa is terrified of the scottish giant above her and turns around to run away from her on the desk. Nikki simply drops to her knees and reaches out, clutching Alexa in one hand. Alexa squirms in her fist, but Nikki just brings her up to her face and teases her. “Teeny, dolly Lexi in my hands! Let’s play dolls, Lexi. LET’S PLAY!” As Nikki begins stroking Alexa’s hair and prodding her with her free fingertips, Alexa squeaks up at Nia “Don’t just stand there! Do something!” Nia just smiles at the scene unfolding before her, and puts the remote down on the table so that she can act accordingly.
14111233211.title: Shrinking the Scot

choices: Nikki wants a Royal Rumble match!
141112332111.content:
Nia is either ignoring Alexa’s cries or can’t hear her over the sound of Nikki’s gleeful squeaks. Either way, Alexa is pretty much on her own as Nikki crouches down and places the tiny girl between her feet. While still crouched, Nikki tilts her head and puts her hands on her knees, still enjoying the view of the little Alexa under her control. “Ya know what’s funny, Lexi? You and me? We’ve NEVER fought.” Alexa thinks back and she’s right. Aside from random house shows and the occasional appearance in a rumble match, the two have never faced off in the ring. Alexa puts the two and two together in her head, and figures it out with a stunned gasp before Nikki says “Let’s change that! You and me! Let’s wrestle! Right now!” Alexa starts to back away from Nikki, who gets on her hands and knees to get closer to Alexa’s level. But even if she laid herself down completely, the top of Nikki’s head would still be a few times Alexa’s size. Alexa speaks up and says “Uh… How about later? It’s completely unfair with you being so big. And me so… short.” Nikki just giggles as she crawls closer and closer to the retreating Bliss. “But Lexi… you’ve always been short! That never stopped you from fighting! Come on, it’ll be fun!” Alexa is terrified by Nikki’s persistance and continues backing away, until she finds herself backed into a corner. She doesn’t know how this is possible, she was on the desk and far enough away from any edges or walls… but then she feels that the surface she’s backed into is relatively soft and warm… and smells faintly of peaches. She turns to face the wall and sees that Nia has placed her hand on the table behind her ant sized friend, preventing her from escaping. Nia’s face hovers overhead like an all-seeing omnipitent figure and she speaks down to her subjects “AS MUCH AS I’D LIKE TO SEE THAT, A WRESTLING MATCH DOES SEEM A LITTLE ONE SIDED. SO WHY DON’T YOU TWO PLAY A DIFFERENT SORT OF GAME?” Nikki looks up at Nia and sits back on her heels, still smiling up at the massive woman. “You have a better idea? And we still get to play? Oooh, Nikki wants to play… what do you think we should play, NIa?” Alexa can’t believe her ears. Her tag partner is looking to play around with her like a toy, and her god-sized friend is right beside them approving of everything! “Nia, come on! This is crazy! How can i do anything to her if i don’t even reach her shins?” Nia looks down at the two of them and ponders her options for a second. With a new idea in mind, she says down to them “NIKKI… ALEXA’S ABOUT THE SIZE OF YOUR FOOT, RIGHT?” Alexa looks up in horror as Nikki adjusts her position on the table and places her feet right in front of Alexa, her toes pointed to the sky. The ant sized girl is mortified to see by direct comparison that her head just comes up to the ball of Nikki’s foot, with her toes wiggling joyously above her. Nikki giggles and says “Give or take. She’s a wee bit smaller than them!” Nia grins and puts her other hand on the table just a few yards behind Nikki’s seated body. In a booming voice she says down to the little people between her hands “THEN MY IDEA IS A GAME CALLED ‘MOUSE HUNT’. AND IT’S VERY SIMPLE. NIKKI, YOU HAVE TWO MINUTES TO TRY AND STEP ON LITTLE ALEXA THERE. IF YOU GET HER UNDER YOUR FOOT, YOU WIN. IF SHE ESCAPES, SHE WINS. WINNER GETS ANYTHING THEY WANT. DO WE UNDERSTAND THE RULES?” Nikki claps wildly at the news and scrambles up to her feet, while Alexa just stands in complete disbelief at her friend’s idea. Was she actually expecting Nikki to snuff her out under her toes like a bug? All while Nia just stood there and cheered it on?”

Alexa shouts up “Nia, are you insane?! She’ll kill me! How is this any better than her trying to wrestle me?” Nia rolls her eyes and says “SHE’S NOT GONNA KILL YOU. SHE’LL JUST STEP ON YOU TO TRAP YOU, SHE WON’T ACTUALLY SQUISH YOU.” She shoots a glance down to Nikki and says “RIGHT?!” Nikki just nods and says “No squishing. No squishing Lexi. Just chasing and stomping!” Nia beams with happiness and says “GOOD. THEN YOU CAN START RIGHT ABOUT… NOW.” Nikki wastes no time and stomps her feet mockingly, sending shockwaves into the much smaller Alexa’s frame. “Watch out, Lexi! HERE COMES NIKKI!” Nikki screams as she barrels towards her. Alexa screams and immediately runs in a different direction, chased closely by the enormous naked scot. Nia stares down at them with uninhibited interest, loving the sight of her bug sized friend being chased around by her tag team partner. All the while, Nia has her hands on either side of them to prevent escape, and her excitement grows a little bit as she slowly brings her hands a little closer together, giving them even less room to play around in. Nikki is gaining on Alexa by this point and stomps a bare foot directly behind her which sends the little girl flying. Alexa lands hard on her stomach, only to turn around and be faced with the massive sole of Nikki Cross coming down towards her. “Stomp Stomp, Lexi!” Nikki shouts through giggles of pure happiness as she brings her foot down HARD. Alexa has enough sense to roll out of the foot’s way, feeling a powerful smack of skin against wood as her foot smashes to the ground. Alexa picks herself up and gets to her feet, only to be met with a familiar sight as Nikki raises her other foot. Alexa manages to dodge yet again as Nikki steps down, and runs in a straight line underneath Nikki’s gigantic body. Seeing the tiny girl scampering between her legs, Nikki puts her head down between her legs and catches a glimpse of the Alexa running away from her… only upside-down. “Oh no you don’t buggy. I'm gonna get ya under my toes if it's the last thing i do!” Alexa takes off running yet again, attempting to gain even the smallest amount of ground between her and the crazy giant that wants to keep her underfoot. In the distance she sees the largest hand she’s ever laid eyes on, held open to trap anything that runs into it. Out of the corner of her eye she catches from above Nia’s shining eyes and large toothy grin, and she can’t help but get lost in the vision of it all as she runs. “My god… She’s so huge compared to us… So big and so beautiful...I really am nothing to her at this size...” And it’s that split second of distraction that costs Alexa everything, as she feels a wall of warm, smelly flesh push down against her back and pin her to the ground. Unable to move her arms and legs, Alexa just wiggles for dear life under Nikki’s foot, while screaming “Gahh! Get off me Nikki! Get! Off! Me!” Nikki doesn’t hear her though, her screams muffled under the soft skin of her giant feet. Instead she just enjoys the feeling of her friend squirming under her toes and lets out a loud laugh saying ‘Got her Nia! She tickles under there! Lexi tickles so much!”


Nia looks at the two of them with a mock disapproval draped across her face and says “COULDN’T EVEN LAST THIRTY SECONDS. HOW PITIFUL. WELL I GUESS THAT MEANS THE PRIZE GOES TO NIKKI, GUESS SHE DECIDES WHAT HAPPENS NEXT.” Nikki slowly lifts her foot off of Alexa, who simply rolls onto her back and stares up at the ceiling, enjoying the breaths of fresh air while she still has them. From her prone position, Alexa can clearly see Nikki’s relatively towering form rising above her, hands clapping in delight, while Nia’s god-like visage looks down at her and waits to hear her reply. Nikki waves up at the enormous amazon and says loud enough for her to hear “Ooh! I know! Make Nikki and Alexa the same size! That way we can play more games together!!” Nia just laughs at her request and says “WHAT AN EXCELLENT SUGGESTION, NIKKI. ALRIGHT THEN, WE’LL HAVE TO MAKE SOME ADJUSTMENTS IF WE’RE GOING TO KEEP PLAYING…” Nia reaches down with the remote and a blinding light shoots out from it, temporarily dazing the ant-sized Alexa. When the flash of the remote subsides, Alexa is rushed by the feeling of someone her height giving her a huge hug. “Alexa! That was so much fun! And now we get to play together at the same size!” Alexa sighs in relief for a second, glad that Nia may have finally come to her senses and returned at least some of her size to her, but one glance upwards at the humongous woman’s hand is enough to tell her that Nia didn’t make her bigger… she made NIkki smaller. Alexa’s joy is completely erased and she finds herself shaking with rage at the fact she’s still the size of an insect. Not helped by the fact that Nikki points at the two of them and laughs as she releases the hug and says “Now we’re both really really itty bitty!! Nia’s so big and we’re so teeny! I love being shrunk, don’t you?!!” Alexa is convinced none of Nikki’s gimmick is made up at this point. She is full on crazy if she’s actually enjoying being so powerless and insignificant like this. Nia looms like a powerful monument over the two bug sized athletes, and says “ALRIGHT THEN, I THINK WE'RE READY FOR THE NEXT MATCH. NIKKI, SINCE YOU WON THE LAST ONE, WHY DON'T YOU PICK THE STIPULATION?” Nikki thinks for a second, she didn't really have anything in mind, she was just happy to be so small. But she looks at her surroundings, including her equally sized partner, then looks up at the giant NIa and says with a beaming grin...
141112332111.title: Little Nikki Gets to Play

choices: Alexa manages to get the victory
1411123321111.content:
Hearing the suggestion, Nia bites her lip excitedly thinking about the possibility of seeing two bug sized wrestlers fight in a small cage. She thinks out loud for a second and says “WE”RE GONNA NEED A CAGE FOR YOU TWO TO FIGHT IN. I SHOULD CHECK DOWNSTAIRS, MAYBE THE HOTEL STAFF HAS AN OLD HAMSTER CAGE, OR AN AQUARIUM… SOMETHING YOU WON’T BE ABLE TO SQUEEZE YOUR WAY OUT OF. I GOTTA CHECK ON THAT SO IN THE MEANTIME….” Nia reaches down and removes from her bag her smelly wrestling boot and holds it next to the table. She slams a huge hand behind Alexa and Nikki who squeak in surprise as they are scraped off the countertop. They hear Nia say “YOU STAY HERE FOR NOW, KAY?” as they fall off the edge of the table and slide against the wall of the boot all the way down, landing with a sloppy thud at the bottom, but surprisingly… they land on their feet. Alexa just stands there in disbelief with her hands down by her sides and says “Oh god… this is so gross…” She can feel the humid smelly air all around them, feeling trapped in a fog bank of Nia’s foot sweat. Just when she thinks it can’t get worse, Nia’s powerful laughter fills the opening of the shoe and booms down on the two little woman as she tilts the shoe slightly forward, causing them to slide down to the toe section, where there’s even less light and fresh air.. When the shoe finally rights itself and is placed down on the ground, the two girls are disoriented but for the most part unhurt. Nia smiles at her handiwork and steps out of the room for a second, leaving her friends in her boot while she looks for something to continue her fun. Inside the shoe, Alexa is almost gagging from the smell and on the verge of tears from feeling so pitiful, but Nikki on the other hand, doesn’t seem to have the same reaction at all. Alexa walks over to her tag partner and stares down in disbelief as she seems to be making a snow angel in the indent of Nia’s big toe and giggling maniacally as she does it. “Nikki’s so small… Smaller than a toe… Smaller than Nia’s tallest toe…” “Nikki likes the smell… Nikki likes the feeling… Nikki likes being tiny. Don’t you, Lexi? Even a little?” Alexa looks around at her situation and says “N… NO! Of course not! I don’t like… being here… at all…” She meant that she’s not happy about the situation but in her heart, Alexa did have to admit that a part of this was exciting. There’s a bit of her that loves looking up at Nia’s glory and being so small in her beautiful towering presence… but she hates the humiliation. And the smell’s not helping either. Nikki on the other hand is loving every second of this and says “Well maybe later you get big and i stay small. Spend some time under your toes instead” Alexa wants to say something snotty in response but is caught off guard by the feeling that having Nikki play around under her feet could actually be pretty exhilirating… and judging by Nikki’s constant glances down to Alexa’s bare toes, she’s down for the same thing.

The girls’ fantasizing is interrupted by the sound of Nia’s footsteps re-approaching the shoes on the ground. She leans down over the opening and commands her friends “ALRIGHT, GET BACK TO THE HEELS FOR ME. CAN’T SEE YOU WHEN YOU’RE ALL THE WAY DOWN BY THE TOES.” Nikki and Alexa make their way towards the end of the shoe they started in, enjoying a slightly less dense cloud of air and also a visible view of the opening high above where Nia has stuck her face in to take a strong smell. Her face contorts as she says “WHOOF. THAT’S ROUGH. HOW’S IT GOING LITTLE BOOTY BABES? IT SMELLS PRETTY STRONG FROM HERE, I CAN’T IMAGINE WHAT IT’S LIKE WHEN YOU’RE ALL BITE SIZED!” Nikki puts her hands behind her back and stares up at Nia’s huge visage, giggling out “Hehehe.. Nikki doesn’t mind…” Alexa stomps her feet against the soggy soles and squeaks up at her “Well, I do!! It reeks down here! Did you find a cage or something, i’ll fight anywhere as long as we can get out of this stinky shoe!” Nia’s lip curls up into a wicked smile as she hears her friend’s pleas and says “WELL THEY DIDN’T HAVE A CAGE OR ANYTHING… NO PETS ALLOWED IN THE HOTEL… BUT I THINK YOU’VE JUST GIVEN ME AN IDEA. TURNS OUT WE DON’T NEED A CAGE AFTER ALL. YOU SEEM TO BE PRETTY CONTAINED RIGHT WHERE YOU ARE…” Alexa’s face drains of color as she just manages to get out “No. You can’t mean…” Nia nods down at her tiny captives in her shoe and sits up straight on the bed, hovering her feet above the opening. “I’M GOING TO JUST SIT HERE AND CATCH UP ON MY INSTAGRAM FOR A WHILE. IN THE MEANTIME, YOU TWO ARE GONNA HAVE A MATCH. FIRST ONE TO ESCAPE AND GET MY ATTENTION BY TOUCHING MY TOES WILL WIN! THE LOSER HAS TO SPEND THE REST OF THE NIGHT UNDER MY TOES. SOUND GOOD TO YOU?" Alexa shakes her head and says "Nia, you've got to be kidd.." Before she can finish the thought, she hears a crazed yell from beside her and Nikki jumps on Alexa's back, placing an arm under her chin in an attempt to bring her down. Nia laughs and says “OH WOW! LOOKS LIKE WE’VE ALREADY STARTED! DING DING DING!” Alexa flails wildly trying to get the crazed naked woman off her back, running with all her strength into the walls of the shoe to try and shake her off. However the lining is too soft, and Nikki just bounces right off unscathed, even laughing at her attempts. The thick, moist air in the shoe is hard to breathe even without Nikki trying to block her windpipe, but Alexa is somehow able to reverse the hold, grab Nikki’s head and pull her forward into a snapmare. Nikki tumbles on the soft, wet soles of the boot, rolling out of it and getting back to her feet. Her arms are stretched out ready to fight Alexa again as she shouts with a wild laugh “Hehehe… Big lady says we need to fight! Let’s fight Lexi! Let’s fight!”
1411123321111.title: A Cage Match In A Boot!

choices: The remote brings Alexa back to normal size!
The remote brings Alexa back... to only a few inches tall!
The remote malfunctions... and Nia gets shrunk down!
141112332112.content:
Nikki’s wild brown eyes shoot up and down the little doll she’s holding in her hand, while her fingers continue to stroke her. “I used to play with dolls of wrestlers all the time, but it was never like this!” She looks up for a second of self realization and says “Nia must feel the same way! Twice the fun!!” Alexa tries in vain to push Nikki’s fingers out of her face, trying to keep the probing digits from touching her most sensitive areas. “Nikki! Stop it right now! I’m not a fucking Barbie!” Nikki just laughs at her little friend’s plight and says “You’re right! Nikki’s the dolly! You’re wayyyy smaller than a doll! But small enough for me to play with you! Let’s play Lexi! Show me a super high Twisted Bliss!” Alexa just looks up confused and says “Twisted Wha?” Without warning, Nikki throws her hands high into the air and releases Alexa, who screams for dear life as she is launched airborne. Alexa spins in the air and flails her arms and legs wildly, trying to grasp onto anything to catch her fall, only to land back in Nikki’s waiting palms a second later. Alexa catches her breath and says “What… was… That?” Nikki laughs again and says “Higher this time! Higher!” She throws alexa back into the air over and over like a rag doll, disregarding her screams of terror as she enjoys herself. However after one too many throws, Alexa falls back to earth, only to land on a much softer, larger surface than she was accustomed to. Sitting up on her hands, she sees Nia’s familiar planet like face beaming down at her as she says “I THINK THAT’S ENOUGH FOR NOW.”

With a sigh of relief, Alexa sits patiently while Nia lowers her back to the table, and titls her hand just enough to climb off safely from. Meanwhile with her free hand, Nia slides her thumb and forefinger under Nikki’s arms, effortlessly plucking her off the surface and raising her to her face. “SORRY NIKKI, CAN’T LET YOU HAVE ALL THE FUN. BESIDES, I THINK IT’S TIME WE MADE YOU GUYS BIG AGAIN.” But to her surpirse, Nikki’s laughter continues and she looks up at Nia’s face with an expression of barely-contained anticipation. “Don’t you want to play with NIkki first? Nikki got to play with her dolly… doesn’t Nia want to play with hers?” Nia lets out a startled laugh and says “YOU WEREN’T KIDDING DOWN THERE… YOU ACTUALLY LIKE BEING SHRUNK LIKE THIS?” Nikki’s little legs kick in the air as she dangles in the air, and she rubs her hands over Nia’s powerful fingers holding her in place. She bites her lip and says up at Nia “Everything’s so big now… YOU’RE so big now… Nikki likes being little in the big world… As long as she gets to play…” Nia was expecting everyone who shrunk to hate the situation they were in, it never occured to her that someone would be willing to be played with. She’d be able to dominate the tiny person, and at the same time she’d know that it was EXACTLY what they wanted as well. This was definitely a win-win. Nia smiles down at Nikki and says “DON’T YOU WORRY. WE’RE GONNA HAVE A PLAY TIME LIKE YOU’VE NEVER EXPERIENCED BEFORE. BUT WHY DON’T YOU STAY HERE FOR A MINUTE WHILE I MAKE ALEXA BIG AGAIN.” Nia shifts her hand over her bountiful cleavage, and releases her grip on the tiny scot. She drops and lands with a soft slap directly in between Nia’s waiting breasts, cackling with excitement the entire time. With just her head peeking out from the gap in the giantess’s massive mammories, Nikki is in seventh heaven. Nia taps the little girl on the head with her fingertip and says “UH UH UH… NO PEEKING.” and pushes her gently deeper down.

With the feeling of Nikki snuggling herself in between her tits, Nia lets out a small giggle of satisfaction. She looks down at the bug sized blonde waiting for her at the table and says “NOW WHY COULDN’T YOU BE THAT EAGER TO PLAY AROUND?” Alexa crosses her arms and says “Not in the mood, Nia!” Nia sticks her tongue out at the miniscule Miss Bliss and reaches down to grab the remote. Alexa wanders over to the edge of the table and sits on it, admiring the distance down and getting a small rush out of feeling her legs dangle from such a high off ledge. Looking up at Nia she says “Well i guess the remote works fine if Nikki was shrunk too. Go ahead and reverse it. I’m tired of living like an ant.” Nia points the remote at her and says “ALRIGHT, THREE… TWO… ONE…” Nia holds her finger over the remote, but pauses for a second, which alarms Alexa. She sits there awkwardsly waiting as Nia raises an eyebrow and says “YOU SURE YOU DON’T WANT TO STAY ALL CUTE AND TINY FOR ME?” Alexa slams her fists on the countertop and sqeaks up “Hit the damn button, Nia!” Nia laughs and presses down on the remote, causing a familiar bright light to shoot out from the front.
141112332112.title: Time to Grow Alexa Back

14111233212.content: Leaving the option open here in case there was somebody else Nia could have been approached by...
14111233212.title: Or possibly someone else?

choices: "She left a few minutes ago" Nia says trying to get Bayley to leave
"She's having a meeting downstairs" Nia said, setting a trap
"She's in between my tits!"  Nia says as she shrinks Bayley down too!
141112332121.content:
Nia is startled and involuntarily puts the remote in front of her, letting it go with a wild flash. She sees a pile of clothing drop to the ground and catches her breath, a litle mad at herself that she didn’t show more control. Surveying the damage, she looks at the clothing and sees a bedazzled black and blue outfit, a series of fancy rings and jewels, and dead in the center is a pair of sunglasses with the word “BOSS” printed clearly on the front of them. Nia laughs to herself as she realized she just accidentally turned one of her biggest rivals into a much SMALLER problem. She crouches down and starts to feel through the clothing for any sign of life, but doesn’t see anything. “Maybe the setting was too high and she got turned microscopic.” The thought of that was slightly satisfying, but Nia wanted Sasha big enough where she could at least see her. She had almost given up when out of the corner of her eye she sees a figure no bigger than a mouse running frantically down the hallway. Little Sasha took one look at the gigantic Nia and turned to flee, tears streaming down her face as she tried to escape this situation. “She’s so big! I’m so small! This can’t be happening!” Sasha recants to herself over and over again as she runs as far as she can from the all powerful amazon. Nia just smiles and rises to her full height, raising her feet to slowly stomp behind the sprinting Sasha, covering way more distance than the shrunken woman’s little legs can carry her. As she stomps, Nia steps down hard onto the floor, enjoying her role as the giant to this tiny woman. “FEE. FI. FO. FUM. I FOUND A BOSS THAT’S AS SMALL AS MY THUMB.” Nia has always loved looking down on Sasha, and now she gets to do it in a way where if she steps one foot too far, she could snuff out her life in an instant. However that’s not what Nia wants to do, and she closely plants her feet behind the tiny girl running for her life. Sasha only stops running when she slightly turns her head and sees a dark, imposing shadow crawl over her, releasing a squeak of a shriek as Nia bends down to collect her.

“Going somewhere, little Sasha? I don’t think so.” Sasha cowers in fear as Nia’s huge fingers wrap around her and lift her off the ground. Nia holds the little woman in her hands, feeling every sensation of the shrunken lady’s movement. Her miniature breasts pushed up against her fingers, her little arms and legs struggling to move within her grasp, or just the look of sheer terror on her face as she looks up at her captor. P...Please Nia! I’m so little...Change me back!” Nia just strokes the bright blue hair of the shrunken woman and condescnedingly says down to her “Why would i change you back? This is the first time i’ve played with dolls since i was a teenager. And it’s even better now because my doll is you.” Sasha’s world crumbles and she breaks down crying into Nia’s skin, not even fighting the giantess’s actions anymore. Nia has never felt more alive than she does right now. And as long as she has the remote, she’s going to make it her goal to make everyone as miniscule as Sasha is now. Before she could enjoy it for long, she hears a voice from behind her say “Hey Nia, you got a minute?” NIa’s cheerful expression immediately changes to one of panic, and she quickly pushes her hand down into her bountiful cleavage, shoving the shrunken woman in there. “Make a sound and i’ll squish you in there.” She warns as she releases her grip, trapping a crying Sasha between her massive boobs. Nia turns around to acknowledge the inquiring voice, and she sees Bayley stepping up towards her. A small smile starts to creep on Nia’s face as she realizes if anything goes wrong, she can just make her as insignificant as her friend. Bayley is not exactly confrontational, and simply asks “I haven’t seen Sasha in a while. Do you know where she is?” Nia holds the remote behind her back and starts twirling it in her grasp as she says “Actually, i know EXACTLY where she is…”
141112332121.title: Shrunken Little Sasha

choices: Bayley didn't trust you - She's the only one there
Bayley mentioned it to a few people - The roster of one show is there.
Bayley got the word out - The ENTIRE WWE women's roster shows up
1411123321212.content:
Resisting the urge to turn Bayley into a bug, Nia has a sudden strike of inspiration and she tries to hold back her excitement as she says "Yes actually... I think she wanted all the women downstairs for a few. Something important." Bayley raises an eyebrow and says "Really? She never mentioned anything like that to me." Nia covers by saying 'It was pretty sudden! She said something just came up and she needed to talk to absolutely everyone on the roster." Bayley looked around for a second and said "When you say everyone, you mean..." Nia stresses her point "EVERYONE. Raw. Smackdown. NXT. She wanted everyone to meet her in the big conference room downstairs in an hour, and she'd explain everything." All the while stomping her bare feet into the carpet in frustration. “UGH. She’s gotta be around here somewhere. You blocked the door right?” Nia looks back at the door, which causes Becky to fall flat onto her stomach to hide, and Nia responds “Yeah, it’s closed. She’s not leaving this room unless we open that door.” Becky is lucky she dropped down so suddenly, since Nia pushes herself off the ground and returns to a standing position. With two fistfulls of fabric, Becky feels her world shift and gravity return to the space beneath her dangling legs. More determined than ever, Becky climbs Nia’s back and shoulderblades, using the mesh of her top to secure easier footing. Nia continues her search while standing, kicking through the group of clothes she collected from Becky when she first shrunk, and even stepping into it to see if anything moves. Alexa spots her friend and says “Hey! Don’t squash her! It’s no fun if she just pops like a grape!” To which Nia replies “I don’t know… i’m pretty sure it would feel great for a second or two…” Shaking off the horror of what she just heard, Becky manages to find herself successfully hidden under Nia’s hair, clinging onto her shirt. She desperately tries not to move for fear that even the smallest movement could have Nia instinctively swatting what feels like a crawling bug on her neck. She remains still for another minute or so until Alexa takes a glance at her watch and says “Are you kidding me? She actually did it? It’s been FIFTEEN minutes and we still haven’t found her!” Nia lets out a stomp into the carpet in frustration, which is almost enough to send the tiny Becky flying off her shirt. “GREAT. Just Great! So we have to return her back to normal now? Stop this games just like we said we would?” Alexa and Nia look at each other for a few seconds before bursting out laughing. Alexa is the first to talk and says “Hell NO are we turning her big again. I never even got to feel her under my feet yet. Come to think of it, grab the remote and set it to the size i was at before… actually fuck that, i want her to feel even SMALLER!” NIa grins at Alexa’s suggestion and reaches down onto the bed, grabbing the remote like before. From her perch, Becky shifts her body around JUST enough that she can see Nia’s hands toying with the controls. She sees the setting Nia has it prepped for, and figures if she can cause Nia's shot to backfire, or even find a way to get to the remote itself, there may be a way for her to turn the tables on these women. So what does she do?
141112332122113.title: Becky Scales the Colossus

choices: Becky tries to return to normal size
Becky takes some time to torment the shrunken women
Becky is interrupted by the sound of the door opening!
1411123321221132.content:
Summoning all her courage, all her cunning, and all her reckless abandon, Becky positions herself on Nia’s shoulder and takes a running leap off her perch down to the waiting hand of the woman she just scaled. Her small size gave her a bit more resistance than she was expecting as she made her descent, but somehow she was able to position herself right on top of the device Nia was holding. Her tiny weight must have had just enough of an impact to register to the massive surrounding fingertips as she landed, because it caught Nia’s attention at just the last moment. She looked down at her hand and on top of the remote, just in front of the control panel, she saw the naked shrunken woman climbing towards the button that activates the ray. And just by sheer coincidence Nia had carelessly gripped the remote in such a way that her fingertip was directy in front of the remote’s shooting range. Nia’s eyes go wide and she shouts “NO YOU DON’T YOU LITTLE…” And before she can finish, there is a quick flash, and the remote drops to the ground. Alexa looks over confused, only to see Nia gone, and every article of clothing she was wearing dropped to the ground in a terrifyingly familiar sight.

Stunned by her friend’s sudden disappearance, Alexa cautiously makes her way over to the pile of clothing that once was her friend. She leans over the abandoned fabric, unable to see any movement whatsoever “Uhh… NIa? You in there, hon?” She shifts her gaze up slightly and her jaw drops as she doesn’t see Nia… instead she sees a mouse sized redhead, standing atop a familiar remote, pressing both of her hands into the big button in the center of it. Alexa lets out a screech that disappears in an instant as the remote goes off, shrinking her down to an absolutely pitiful size. She thought she was small before but this was only about half of that size. She was barely the size of a flea. “No… No! No! Not again! Not this shit again!” Alexa screams to herself as she runs around in place, her body surrounded by a large white circle which she barely recognizes as the top of her white tshirt. She only stops frantically panicking to herself when she hears the sound of approaching footsteps from outside. Her whole body freezes as a shadow creeps into her hiding place, revealing in her full 4 inch glory the towering frame of Becky Lynch. Alexa screams bloody murder as the relatively huge women’s champ plunges her arm into the shirt, grabbing Alexa tight in her fist. As she rises to her full height, Becky brings Alexa up to her chest, staring down at the much smaller Alexa with a domineering smile. With the top half of her body moving around wildly above Becky’s fingers, Alexa looks to her left and sees a similar situation for Nia. And for the first time in today’s unusual course of events, the most dominant female on the entire WWE roster appears frightened and humiliated, clearly hating the sensation of being held by someone so much bigger than her. Becky looks down at the two terrified women and says with a newfound sense of power and confidence “Looks like I win the game, bitches.”
1411123321221132.title: Becky Turns the Tables

choices: She goes back to her own hotel room for well deserved rest
She goes to the hotel bar for a celebratory drink
She goes to the hotel gym for a quick workout
14111233212211321.content:
Becky stares down at the two shivering bugs in her hand and glares at them with righteous fury. She walks over the graveyard of discarded shirts and underwear that’s been cast upon the carpet of the hotel room, without taking her eyes off of the two shivering bugs in her hands. “HOPE YOU TWO ARE READY FOR A LIFETIME OF PAIN. FIRST YA TOOK MY SIZE, THEN YOU TRIED TO TAKE MY HUMILITY. AND NOBODY MAKES A FOOL OUTTA THE MAN.” Alexa is in tears looking up at her captor, and tries to squeak out an apology “I… I’m sorry Becky! I never meant to take it this far! We’re sorry!” Nia chimes in, but tries to throw her little friend under the bus and says “Yeah i’m sorry too! It was Alexa’s idea to shrink you! And she’s the one who wanted to make you super small! Not me!” Alexa can’t believe what her friend is saying, but in honesty Becky wasn’t even listening. She was just making a straight line for her own pair of tall leather boots. She maneuvers the two tinier women into one hand and using her free one she hopes onto the toe of the boot before scaling up the laces like a rope-ladder. When shemakes it to the wide opening of the shoe, she effortlessly holds the two women in her hand over it and says “I’M NOT SPENDING THE REST OF MY LIFE AS SOME LIVING BARBIE DOLL. SO I’M GONNA FIND A WAY TO CHANGE MYSELF BACK, AND YOU TWO ARE GONNA PLAY NICE IN HER FOR A WHILE.” Alexa and Nia are suddenly and immediately released from her grasp and fall into the long, dark cavern of Becky’s boot. It’s so far down and with so little light, Becky doesn’t even hear or see them hit the bottom. She does however get a small whiff of her own foot odor and at her tiny size, it hits her hard. “Oof… i really need to clean my shoes more often. I almost feel bad for those two.”

Meanwhile in the shoe, Nia and Alexa manage to get up after their horrendous fall. Looking around they only see black walls and a beaten up ruber-like floor beneath them. To one side of them is a dark looking cavern that seems to stretch on forever. And above they see the opening they fell in, a good three or four hundred feet up. “We’re… we’re in her fucking shoe…” Nia says, almost in a trance. She’s never been in a position where she’s felt small at all before. And now she’s sure nobody has ever felt as small as she is right now. Alexa however has no time to take in her surroundings and walks right up to Nia in a rage. “So tell me right now. What… the fuck… was that?” Alexa says standing up tall. Nia gets right in her face and says “What the fuck was… what?” She starts to confidently get in her space, but soon realizes that she’s no longer taller than Alexa. Something with the shrinking process must have affected their heights because for the first time, Nia and Alexa are looking eye to eye. Alexa shoves Nia back, causing her to fall onto her ass. “You backstabbing bitch! What was that shit about me telling you to shrink her?” Nia stands up and says “Well you did! Shrink anybody! People are People! That’s what you said! And fuck you, that’s the last time i try to help a friend in need.” Alexa looks underneath her feet and lifts them up in disgust. The sole of Becky’s boot is so worn out that there are little collections of sweat seeped into the fabric. Alexa’s puny weight was enough to bring some of it back up to the surface. She screams out in frustration and walks over to the wall of her shoe, staring up and crying “Fuck this! I’m not dying surrounded by the smell of some Irish bitch’s overgrown feet. I’m getting out of here right now!” She grabs a hold of the lining fabric of the shoe and begins to climb. Nia, seeing this as a possible way out, follows suit and catches up to her. The two girls continue to squabble as they scale the inside of another wrestler’s shoe trying desperately to get to freedom. “As soon as we get out of this, we are DONE as friends. I can’t believe i let you talk me into this.” Nia shoots back “Talk YOU into this? You’re the one who was begging me for help at the size of a bug in the locker room! You should be on your hands and knees thanking me that you didn’t get stepped on by one of those other bitches!” Alexa just scoffs and said “Well, if i knew this is where i would have ended up AND EVEN SMALLER, maybe i would have just preferred it if you left me there in the first place!” Nia aggresively continues her climb and says “Yeah? That makes two of us. I had plans tonight, you know! And now i have to spend it trying to get out of a smelly fucking shoe! I don’t even know how we’re gonna get back to normal size after we do escape from here!!”

Their climb is brought to a miserable halt as a deep voice from above shouts “GOING SOMEWHERE, YA MEASLEY LIL’ BUGS?” Nia and Alexa both shoot their heads towards the sky and are horrified to see a gigantic brown eye squinting for focus, but undoubtedly staring down at them. The two insect sized wrestlers are almost brought to tears at the sight of their rival, once small enough to crush under their thumbs, brought back to her normal size. From their current height of only a quarter inch tall, Nia and Alexa could only look up at the towering redhead and see her as a real-life goddess. And it’s a goddess they had very VERY badly wronged. They don't know how she did it, but Becky managed to get the device to turn her back, and now their fate is entirely in her hands... More so than it was before. Becky raises a hand to push her frizzed-out red hair out of her face so she could clearly look down at her prey, and with a big smile said “HOPE YOU GIRLS WEREN’T PLANNIN ON LEAVIN’ SO SOON. IF I REMEMBER THE RULES OF THE GAME RIGHT, THE WINNER GOT TO DO WHATEVER THEY WANTED WITH THE LOSERS. NO LIMITS.” Alexa’s own words came back to bite her and she gulped heavily waiting to see what Becky would do to them. She didn’t have to wait long as the giant ginger simply stuck her hand into the boot with her pinkie extended, and wiped it along the inside edge of the boot. The two shrunken girls couldn’t move fast enough to get out of the way, and they were knocked off their climbing perches, taken down by a pillar of powerful pale flesh. Both Alexa and Nia hit the sole of the boot with a slick thud, laying down on their backs to try and recover from what happened. They only get a moment’s rest however, as the sky is darkened again, but this time they don’t see Becky’s face covering the opening. They see her FOOT. Nia crawls backwards in a frenzyand shreiks at the horrifying vision coming towards her, before she picks herself up and runs in a straight line for the toe section of the boot. Alexa is a little slower to catch on but follows suit, and both of them are running for their lives, screaming and crying, while Becky’s massive peds make their way into the opening of the boot and soon far enough in where Becky can step down onto her insoles.

Outside the boot, Becky can’t hear their teeny screams. She can’t really even feel them under her powerful toes. But she knows they’re in there, and she knows they’re in hell. She laughs a bit as she feels a slight tinge of rush looking around the room, seeing Nia and Alexa’s discarded clothing and understanding that the people who used to fit in those clothes are now trapped in her boot with her bare feet. She sits on the bed and grabs her clothing from before, and as she puts it on she realizes that her pants are a bit too short, and her shirt and jacket feel a smidge too tight. She may have given herself a bit too much height when she changed herself back to normal. But she’d figure that out later. She reaches down to grab her championship, and while she does looks down at the remote she’d placed on the pillow. With a sense of newfound power she never thought she’d have, Becky stand up and takes a few over-exaggerated steps, laughing while she does it. “Oh, this is the start of somethin REALLY fun, isn’t it?” She chuckles to herself as she puts the remote in her bag and shuts off the light, leaving the hotel room with two speck-sized prisoners underfoot. The only question is, where does she go from here?
14111233212211321.title: Bugs in Becky's Boots

choices: She grows Alexa back to normal so they can work together
She grows Alexa to doll size so she can still control her
She keeps Alexa tiny and takes her with her!
1411123321222.content:
Becky’s eyes go wide with terror as Nia’s other hand comes up, clutching the same remote that put her in this position to begin with. “LET’S SEE WHAT YOU HAVE TO SAY WHEN YOU’RE SMALLER THAN MY FINGERNAIL.” Nia presses down on the button of the remote, which hits Becky square in her little body. From Nia’s perspective, Becky seems to disappear entirely, sliding completely out of her grasp. She can feel something different in it’s place, almost like trapped in her fingers is a tiny soft pebble. She tilts her hand slightly and opens her fingers, revealing a much more insignificant Becky standing on the smooth plain of her palm. Becky has never felt so powerless, cowering in the hands of an already imposing amazon, only now reduced to what she figures can’t be more than half an inch tall. Nia pulls her face in close to get a good look at the terrified redhead, delighting in her complete submission to her size. “THAT’S BETTER. NOT GONNA CALL ME NAMES AT THAT HEIGHT ARE YOU? AND EVEN IF YOU ARE, YOUR VOICE IS JUST TOO DAMN LITTLE. US NORMAL PEOPLE WOULDN’T BE ABLE TO HEAR IT ANYWAY.” Becky doesn’t even try to stand in the giant woman’s hand, she just stays on her back, waiting for this nightmare to end. Nia however is enjoying every second of it, and puts the remote away so she can play with the insect in her control. She places an index finger down on top of Becky’s miniscule body, without applying too much weight. Becky squirms and screams underneath the giant appendage, but Nia just keeps it on top of her, signaling to her how insignificant she’s become. “THIS IS SO MUCH BETTER THAN WHEN YOU WERE MOUSE SIZED. I COULD END YOUR WHOLE LIFE WITH JUST THE SLIGHTEST PRESSURE FROM MY FINGERTIP. I AM YOUR GODDESS NOW.” Nia’s thoughts race at a mile a minute while holding the shrunken champion. She has so much power over this little woman she doesn’t even know what to do with it. All she knows is that she wants more. “Forget about making this roster doll sized.” She thinks to herself “I need everyone to feel this small in my presence. I’m going to turn every single woman in this hotel into a bug. I’m going to be unstoppable!”

She takes her finger and sensually licks it, before lowering it back down onto the insect sized Man. Becky realizes what’s happening and gets up to run, but doesn’t get far before the humongous finger crashes into her back and she finds herself stuck to it, covered in spit. Nia lifts the finger up to her eye and squints to focus on her prize as she says out loud “TIME TO PUT YOU IN YOUR NEW HOME. ALEXA HAD A NICE RIDE IN THE FRONT OF MY PANTIES BEFORE, BUT I THINK YOU DESERVE A PLACE THAT’S A BIT… COZIER.” Nia laughs to herself as she lowers the hand behind her and uses her free hand to open the back of her pants. Becky screams and tries desperately to escape her fate, but the saliva sticks her to the finger just long enough for Nia to insert her finger in her own ass and wipe the side, trapping the speck of a woman between her giant cheeks. Removing her hand, Nia smacks her own ass to scare the bug she’s trapped, and bends down to pick up Becky’s belongings. Lifting the championship belt up to her chest she looks down and says “I guess if Becky’s not gonna be using this, i’ll take it off her hands. I’ve already beat her in more ways than one.” Taking all of Becky’s things into the hotel room, She walks over to the desk where the tiny Alexa is waiting. Noticing Nia’s beaming expression, Alexa shouts up at her “Somebody’s in a good mood.” Nia just laughs and says “YOU COULD SAY THAT. WELL I’VE GOT SOME GOOD NEWS FOR YOU. THE REMOTE SEEMS TO WORK FINE. I TRIED IT OUT ON THE CHAMP, AND LET’S JUST SAY SHE’S NOT GONNA BE BOTHERING ANYONE FOR A LONG TIME.” Alexa lets out a wicked laugh and says “You’ll have to tell me all about that later. For right now take that remote and make me big again! I’ve got ideas for how we can use that to really shake things up around here.” Nia pulls out the remote and says in a very ominous tone “IT’S FUNNY YOU SHOULD SAY THAT, BECAUSE I’VE BEEN HAVING SOME THOUGHTS ON WHAT SHOULD BE DONE FIRST…”
1411123321222.title: Becky Gets Micro-sized

choices: Follow Nia as she heads off to shrink more people
Follow Becky as she runs off to get help
Follow Alexa as she is left alone in the hotel room
1411123321223.content:
Nia looks around the hallway and hears voices coming from either side. She thinks about taking the shrunken woman with her but instead she changes her mind and just releases her grip entirely. Becky finds herself in a free fall, her vision consisting of Nia's body rising up beside her, and the floor getting closer. Unable to grab onto anything to slow her fall, Becky just closes her eyes and braces for impact as she nears the ground. To her complete surprise (and Nia's for that matter), Becky's fall is not devastating, and she finds herself able to pick herself up pretty much immediately. Her small stature seems to add some unseen durability, and her much less significant weight was small enough that she didn't pick up terminal velocity on the way down. She thinks she dodged a bullet for a second until she remembers that she's landed in between Nia's giant feet. She backs away slowly as Nia looks down at her and says "I was expecting you to go splat from the impact, but it looks like you live to fight another day, shrimp. You're lucky i don't want to stain my shoes with your insides, otherwise i'd stomp you out right now." She lifts up a foot, showing off her shoe's powerful sole to Becky as she hovers it in mid air. "Now get out of here before I change my mind. And try not to get vacuumed up by the staff! Hehehe" She slams her foot back down onto the ground and Becky takes off running. She doesn't know where she's headed or what she's going to encounter, but she knows whatever it is, it can't be worse than a huge Nia Jax on a power trip.

"Now all i need to do is get rid of the evidence." Nia says to herself as she points the remote at Becky's clothing and presses a different button, causing all of her belongings to shrink down to her similar scale. Between her fingertips she holds all of Becky's belongings and simply plops them into her mouth, intent on swallowing and dissolving anything that could possibly link her to Becky's disappearance. Nia attempts to swallow everything but feels something metallic and sharp caught in her teeth. She reaches in with her fingertip and manages to pull out the miniaturized Women's championship. Holding it in her hands she says "Wish i could take Becky's name off of those plates, but at this size it could make a pretty little toe ring." She puts the ring in her pocket and heads down the hall, happy with not only the knowledge that the remote works perfectly, but it can also shrink objects, not just people. There's a lot of people staying at this hotel, and if Nia wants to start her doll collection in the right way, she has a pretty good idea on where to start.
1411123321223.title: Becky's On Her Own

choices: It's the Smackdown title... She's in Bayley's room!
It's a Queen of Spades shirt... She's in Shayna Baszler's room!
A studded leather vest... She's in Rhea Ripley's room!
14111233212232.content:
Humiliated and belittled in more ways than one, Becky watches from the other end of the hallway as Nia proceeds to shrink down all her belongings, including her title belt, and bring them all into her room. Clenching her fists in anger, Becky whispers to herself “When i get back to normal i swear i’m going to rip that titanic twat's fucking head off…” She doesn’t really have time to indulge in revenge fantasies, however, as she feels under her bare feet the tremors of another giant nearby. She looks up and her face goes pale as she sees an instantly recognizable blonde mountain bounding towards her. Charlotte Flair. Holding the NXT title proudly over her shoulder, Charlotte’s massive footsteps reverberate through the halls as she walks with an equally enormous Cathy Kely, talking to her about interviews and promos she’d have to shoot the next day. Becky moves as close to the wall as she possibly can, and slides her way towards the nearest hotel room she can find. Getting on her hands and knees, she sees the gap underneath the door and thinks she has just enough room to squeeze beneath it to get away. Which is good because she hears Charlotte say to Cathy “Wait… what’s that on the floor?” Becky doesn’t waste any time and scrambles under the door, pressing her tiny body as close to the floor as possible and managing to get through the space. She finds herself freed from the pressure and inside the hotel room relatively quickly, standing still and trying not to make a sound as she hears Charlotte’s large feet stomp down just on the other side. The Queen's massive shoes tap the ground a few times in frustration, before a muffled voice from above says “Weird… Must have been seeing things.” Charlotte and Cathy continue walking down the hall and Becky sits down leaning against the door, breathing a sigh of relief. “Jesus. Don’t want to know what she would have done to me if she were to get her hands on me like this.”

Becky takes a minute to get a perspective on her surroundings. She’s the size of a mouse, trapped in a hotel filled with wrestlers, and Nia’s got the only thing that can get her back to normal size. Clearly the deck is stacked against her, but maybe if she found herself in the room of someone she could convince to help her, she has a chance. She looks around the room and sees a few non-descript bags and articles of clothing, but nothing that would really tell her who’s room this is. “Well i’m never gonna get a good look around from the floor. And besides they can’t really help me if they step on me first.” Becky walks over to the bedside table, and spots a cord hanging down from the countertop. Using all her upper body strength, she manages to get a grip on the cord and climbs herself up the side, making it all the way to the top. Rising back up to her feet, she takes another look around the room and sees that the bed is well made, the blinds are drawn, and there’s nothing out of the ordinary plugged into the walls. Clearly whoever checked into this room, they haven’t been here for very long. She does see something out of the ordinary though: On the chair in the corner of the room, she sees a very particular object and immediately knows who’s room this is.
14111233212232.title: Becky's Gonna Need Backup

141112332122322.content:
Draped across the chair is a black and gold shirt, adorned with the phrase "Crank, Rip, Tear" and a pattern on it that looks like a series of spades. "Oh god no. Not her. Anyone but her right now..." is all the shrunken Becky can squeak out before she looks over to see the door to the room unlock, and the imposing form of Shayna Baszler steps through. Shayna is dressed in workout clothes, just a well worn black tank top and a pair of tight white gym shorts. She is sweating from head to toe, gulping down a huge bottle of water as she closes the door behind her. Becky doesn't waste any time and scrambles to the far side of Shayna's bedside table, hiding her naked body behind the base of the lamp she had just used to climb up. Shayna takes the gym towel from around her neck and says to herself "Can't believe they didn't put me on the card tonight. At least i was able to get a workout in before the end of the night." Shayna wipes her forehead and under her pits, before tossing her gym towel onto the bedside table. Becky braces herself for impact as the huge cloth slaps against the surface of the tabletop. Becky isn't moving an inch before she knows it's safe, and instead she just peeks around from behind the lamp, observing Shayna's every move. The hundred-foot tall MMA specialist pulls out her phone and dials it, and within a few seconds a somewhat familiar voice answers on the other end with "Hello?" "Marina, it's Shayna. I know we have to head out tonight to go to the next town. Get Jessamyn and come pick me up from my hotel room in a half hour or so." "You got it, Shayna. See you then." Shayna sets an alarm for herself and puts her phone down on the table just a few feet in front of Becky... at least a few feet by Becky's perspective. The self appointed Queen of Spades takes her sweaty feet out of her gym shoes and swings her legs around to lay down on the bed, not even bothering to change out of her smelly gymwear. As she lays down her arm stretches high above Becky who covers her mouth so she doesn't make a single sound. Shayna pulls the lamp on the table a little closer to her, and without looking switches it off, leaving the room in much dimmer light. She turns over and lays on her side, falling asleep within a matter of seconds. Clearly she's a deep sleeper, which is good news for little Becky.

"Of all the fuckin people i get stuck in a room with, it's gotta be her. She already tried to take a bite out of me neck when i wasn't the size of her finger. Imagine if she got a hold of me now, she'd probably swallow me whole." Becky shakes her head at her original plan and thinks "I ain't getting any help here. Best try to get the fuck out of here before this beastly bitch wakes up." Becky looks over to the lamp chord she climbed up with, but since Shayna moved it ever so slightly, the chord is tightened out from the wall. If she tried to climb down it, she'd have no slack, and would probably slide right off of it. So she decides she needs to use her surroundings to her advantage once again, and walks over towards Shayna's discarded gym towel. At her smaller size, the smell and heat coming off of it is rancid, but Becky knows she could definitely use it to get down quicker than anticipated. Using all her strength she pushes against the wet cotton fabric, and inch by inch manages to move the towel from the middle of the table towards the edge. Wiping away a combination of her own hard earned sweat and Shayna's permeating musk from the towel, Becky feels gross but knows she's accomplishing something when an edge of the towel actually falls down over the edge of the table. With a few more determined pushes, Becky manages to push the entire tent-sized cloth down onto the floor, where it lands in a pile with a small "thud". Becky sits with her legs dangling over the edge and looks down to the soaked fabric beneath her. "Alright. Now all i gotta do is jump down and land on the towel. If getting dropped by Nia taught me anything, it's that i seem to fall a little softer while i'm this small." She wipes some leftover grime and wetness from her shoulders and around her face and lets out a short "bleh" at her situation. "I'm gonna need one hell of a shower after this one. It'll take weeks to get the smell of Shayna's sweat out of my hair." Becky takes a deep breath and stands back up to her feet, ready to jump down and escape from Shayna's room before she even knows she was there.
141112332122322.title: Of COURSE It's Shayna's Room

choices: Fire and Desire (Mandy Rose and Sonya Deville)
The Kabuki Warriors (Asuka and Kairi Sane)
The Iiconics (Billie Kay and Peyton Royce)
14111233213.content:
Nia can't believe her luck. She found two people who she could test the remote on, and they were both people Alexa held a grudge for. This would be perfect...

Who was it?
14111233213.title: Double the fun?

141112333.content:
Nia has her reservations, especially seeing the condition the gun is in, and says down to her little friend "MAYBE IT'S NOT SMART TO USE THIS THING RIGHT NOW. MAYBE WE SHOULD FIND WHO MADE IT... I DON'T KNOW HOW WE'D DO IT OR HOW LONG IT WOULD TAKE... IN THE MEANTIME I COULD KEEP YOU IN SOMETHING SAFE LIKE A JAR OR A CAGE... IF I SHRUNK DOWN A DOLLHOUSE TO YOUR SCALE YOU'D AT LEAST HAVE A ROOM TO STAY IN, AND YOU'D PROBABLY BE ABLE TO FIT INTO SOME OF THE ITTY BITTY CLOTHING..." Alexa has had enough and lets out a shriek of frustration that is so high pitched it barely registers to Nia, but she can clearly see her throwing a tantrum on the desk and leans in to hear what she's saying. With tears in her eyes, Alexa is screaming up at her friend "Fuck this! No more waiting! Take that remote and unshrink me right now! I! Hate! Being! Tiny!" Nia takes a step back and says "FINE, FINE. CAUTION TO THE WIND, LET'S TRY IT." She holds the remote at arm's length, and winces a bit as she presses down on the big button in the middle, striking the ant sized target with immaculate precision. Within a split second, Alexa is no longer the size of a bug on the table, and is instead standing on top of it, still in the midst of her breakdown. "MAKE ME BIG RIGHT NOW! MAKE ME... Oh. Oh my god." She instantly stops when she realizes she's been unshrunk, looks down at her body and pats herself all over to make sure she hasn't suffered any side effects, and then he leaps off the tabletop and onto the carpet below. She immediately runs over and throws her arms around her friend, on the verge of crying from happiness. "Oh god thank you Nia! I hated being small so much, i'm so happy to be normal again!" In her ecstatic glee, she presses her face in against Nia's body and closes her eyes, elated to be on the same level as the rest of the world. 141213232231.title: Bliss's Foot Work

1412132322313.content:
Alexa had well and truly taken a gamble. She had been aware of the size ray for at least 20 minutes now but had to endure the humiliation and indecency of giving feet massages to two women she absolutely loathes! But after giving a better massage than anyone deserved from her she threw caution to the wind and made a dash for the size ray! However there was a minor issue, Sasha had seen her.

“Oh you bitch! Come here!” Sasha yelled, as she saw exactly what Alexa was running towards.

Alexa didn’t even hesitate, she just kept on running until she saw the size ray. It was so close! All she had to do was pray that Sasha wasn’t quick enough to grab her, otherwise it was game over. Alexa sprinted as fast as she could as she saw from behind her the dark shadow of sasha looming over her, was she reaching down or had she stood up to grab her? It didn’t matter she just had to get the gun.

Bayley meanwhile was completely taken aback as Sasha shot up to her feet and scrambled to grab something near the edge of the bench they were sitting on.

“Sasha? What’s wrong?” she asked concerned. She had no idea how concerning the situation was.

Sasha was within inches of grabbing Alexa, but just as she was about to wrap her fingers around her the worst happened. Alexa spun around with the size ray in hand and a look of joy on her face. Sasha had no time to react as Alexa pulled the trigger and shot the boss!

A light shone on Sasha’s face as the last thing she saw at normal height was the diminutive Alexa smiling at her. Almost instantaneously Sasha was reduced down from her regular height of 5’5 to a tiny half an inch tall! She was now the same size as Alexa which was exactly what little Miss Bliss was hoping for, because now she would know exactly how Alexa felt all this time. And Alexa wasn’t gonna go easy on her once she grew back to normal. Unfortunately she wouldn’t get the opportunity just yet.

Prior to shrinking Sasha had been leaning down in almost a dive like fashion. So once she was shrunk down her momentum carried on so she just so happened to continue forward. Before Alexa even had a chance to react Sasha came crashing into her knocking her off her feet and sending the size ray flying out of her hand.

Dazed and confused both women sat up before locking eyes with each other. They then both turned their heads in unison towards the discarded size ray which now lay several feet away from them. Turning back to look at eachother they both had the same idea.

Alexa made a run for the size ray but she was speared from behind by Sasha who tried skipping over her to reach the gun herself, however Alexa grabbed her leg and pulled her back before mounting her as she started to rain down punches on the fallen boss.

“Huh you like that Sasha you little bitch? Not so fun being small is it? Well you better get used to it because once I get that gun you’re gonna be tiny for a long long time!” Alexa gloated.

Alexa was attacking with her best weapon, her silver tongue. Her verbal had to be the best in the industry right now, it sometimes your greatest strength can be your downfall. Just as she was spouting some insults she was caught of guard by a stiff right hand from the tiny boss who was quick to pounce and switch positions with Alexa who was now on the receiving end of some physical and verbal abuse.

“What was that blondie? Oh that’s right I couldn’t hear you with my fist in your mouth! Don’t worry there’s no need to get comfortable, cause once I’m back to normal size I’m gonna shrink you to the size of a speck you little germ!” Sasha shouted at the downed Bliss.

That didn’t sit well with little Miss Bliss. In an instant she blocked an incoming strike and hit Sasha with a thunderous forearm. The shot stunned Sasha but not enough where she couldn’t fight back. She grabbed a hold of Alexa’s hair and the two started rolling around the carpet as both of them thought for control, neither was giving an inch as they edged closer and closer to the size gun.

After a few rotations the two separated and one rolled towards the Bench and the other rolled closer to the gun. Who managed to get it?

14121323223132.title: In Bayley's Hand

141213232231321.content:
Alexa and Sasha were at each other’s throats once again, for good reason thought. Both of them hated each other when they were normal size, so both being shrunken to half an inch tall did not help in the slightest. Bayley on the other was their gigantic protector at least for the moment, she was tired of all the fighting and all the pointless squabbles, was it so wrong Of her to want a united women’s locker room? Evidently so as the the two bugs at her feet couldn’t stand eachother.

With the size ray in hand Bayley was in control, she had decided to grow the two back to normal and then get rid of the size ray once and for all. There was a part of her that wanted to keep the two shrunken...and least for a little while in order to teach them a lesson. But she wasn’t thst kind of person so it was best to just return them back to normal and settle their differences in the ring as usual.

However there was an issue as the size ray was made to scale for a half inch tall person...so Bayley was far too big to be able to properly see the gun let alone use it! Thst didn’t stop Bayley from trying though as she tried using her finger nail to adjust a few settings...not the best idea.

Meanwhile on the floor the two shrunken women continued arguing until the familiar sound of the size ray going off interrupted them. They both craned their necks up in anticipation hoping to see Bayley shooting them with the ray. Unfortunately for them they didn’t see the giant body of Bayley looming over them, no they only saw the ceiling.

“What the hell? Where’s Bayley?” Sasha asked concerned.

“I swear to god if that giant idiot jus left us here I’m gonna kill her!” Alexa screamed in frustration.

“Hey bitch did you dare insult my best friend! You take that back or I’ll kick that little ass of yours!” Sasha threatened.

“Little? Sweetie you wish you had an ass like mine. Have you seen how big and toned it is? Now shit your mouth or I’ll kick your scrawny ass all over this floor!” Alexa retorted whilst walking up to Sasha.

The two walked towards each other with intent, with neither caring about their shrunken situation. Just as the two were ready to exchange blows again they were interupted by a familiar voice.

“Jeez can’t you two stop fighting for even a minute?”

Alexa and Sasha spun round completely taken aback by the newest development. Standing their in al, her shrunkne glory at half an inch tall was their former giantess protector Bayley. Both women were completely surprised to see Bayley shrunk like them...which could only spell bad news...

“Bayley? Oh man I’m so happy to see you!” Sasha’s exclaimed whilst hugging her best friend.

Bayley returned the hug as Alexa looked on with a look of disgust on her face.

“Yeah yeah happy reunion that’s great and all. Bayley what the hell are you doing here? Who didn’t you grow us back to normal?” Alexa asked impatiently.

A look of guilt appeared flashed over Bayley’s face for a moment before she hastily changed the subject.

“Man I wish I hadn’t taken my shoes off...” Bayley trailed off.

“Yeah same, but hey at least they look oretty cool from here all big and everything. I gotta admit bestie I was scared shitless when you were normal sized looming over us haha” Sasha replied.

The two best friends continued chatting like nothing was happening whilst Alexa was getting angrier and angrier at their situation.

“ENOUGH! Who cares about your shoes? At tlesst you two have your clothes on!” Alexa blurted. Amazing how easily eveyone forgot that she was stark naked right now. Bayley and Sasha stopped talking to listen to little Miss bliss’ outburst.

“Now will you tell me why you shrunk yourself and why we’re all scuttling around on the carpet like bugs!” Alexa shouted.

Sasha looked at Bayley with a look of confusion herself. Why hadn’t she grown them back and why did she shrink herself? Bayley looked coyley at her feet before she finally started talking.

“Well when I was normal sized the gun was kinda...bug sized...so I couldn’t see what I was pressing...and then the gun went off and shrunk me...so yeah that’s what happened” Bayley finished.

“Ok that’s all well and good moron, but why don’t you just use the gun to grow us all back now?” Alexa asked.

Bayley turned s bright shade of red as she started to twist her foot in a coy innocence.

“Yeah about that Lexi...” Bayley started. She then showed them the size ray in her hands...accept it was currently looking a little worse for ware as a few wires had come loose and random sparks were coming of it. Alexa and Sasha both saw this and had the same reaction. Utter heart break.

“No no no no no no!!!!! Oh my god you freakin idiot! How the Fuck could you do this you moron! Now we’re all gonna be stuck like this and I’m gonna be naked and tiny and ssomeone could step on me or I could live out the rest of my life as a bug and have to marry a cockroach and...” Alexa started saying. She was clearly freaked out about this situation. Sasha just stood there in silence listening to Alexa’s spittle. Bayley on the other hand felt so guilty that she did the only thing she could think of to calm Alexa down. She hugged her.

Alexa stopped talking as she felt the warm embrace of Bayley holding onto her in an instance all her worries were gone...at least for the moment. She closed her eyes and let her face sink into the soft fleshy pillows that were Bayley’s breasts, at the same time her hands started wandering before coming to a halt on her massive ass cheeks. Bayley felt were Alexa’s hands were but decided to let the little woman enjoy herself, this was Bayley’s fault so she might as well let Alexa enjoy her groping.

After a minute or so the two women separated and Bauer placed a hand in Alexa’s cheek.

“All better Lexi?” Bayley asked lovingly.

Alexa nodded in response as she fought to hold back tears, she finally took a deep breath signaling that she was on again. Bayley the decided that things were too risky for them to stay out in the open so the three of them walked to safety under the locker room bench.

“Ok guys I know things look bad and we’re all freaking out it I think we need to come up with a plan. So right now we need to find a way to unshrink ourselves. Who knows maybe there’s a reboot button on this thing?” Bayley said optimistically.

The other two simply nodded as Bayley toon a look at the Ray. That’s when...

Not really trying to make art but frankly trying to make it disgusting and putrid as possible. Which is why she's using green, red and purple. Sarah with her gloves was just trashing the place. Knocking over desks and lockers and frankly just using her raw muscle to cause a mess. Liv with her knifes were just tearing it into anything she could. Walls, furniture, merchandise. She was like a deranged kid with that thing. Looking at all three girls Alexa did have a point “Seriously we just got to wait it out until these three leave.”

“Then what! Alexa Then what!” Sasha yelled, being this size is really getting to her. Alexa had plenty of time to cope and Bayley was too amazed at her new size to hate it.

“I uh... i haven't though that far through” Alexa said, a moment of trueness coming over her face as this was a real problem.

Bayley felt bad too, if she didn't mess up with the ray all three of them would be normal size.
“Don't worry guys, we've still gone the ray. All we have to do is fix it. We have all the parts and were a couple of smart girls. We will fix this thing in no ti-”

“Hey look a couple of bugs!” A much louder voice said, stoping Bayley in her tracks. She knew the voice as she looked at the person who said it and very sadly, spotted them.

Who is it?

Things had taken quite the turn for the three half inch tall women. Bayley, Alexa and Sasha were all feeling different emotions at their shrunken sizes. Then there was Alexa who had been this size for some time now and wasn’t even that fussed with the events unfolding. Then there was Bayley who as the most recent shrinkee was actually mermerised with all her giant surroundings, in her mind it was actually kinda cool being this small and seeing everything so huge! But now they were in the middle of a Riot...

Whilst the three women were busy arguing over how to possibly fix the broken size ray they had failed to realise thst an enormous shadow was looming over them...

“Hey looks couole of bugs!” A much louder and booming voice said.

All three women froze in their tracks, they all knew whose voice that was. What was worse thst they had been discovered by the giantess. Slowly craning their necks up they saw the terrifyingly huge face of the Riott Squad leader herself, Ruby Riott. Somehow the half inch tall women had failed to notice that she had stopped spray painting and had made her way over towards the benches. Their only hope right now was that Ruby didn’t recognize them as humans...and hopefully she didn’t dislike bugs as well.

Ruby stared down at the three women with an evil smile on her face, she had all three cans of spray paint laid out on the bench ready to go, but somehow the bugs huddled nesr the leg of the bench caught her attention. Only question was how would she respond to such a discovery.

“Well lookey here, a couple of bugs have scurried into the locker room...oh man imagine how freaked out someone would be if they found these in their clothes!” Ruby said to herself.

Although she was talking to herself ruby hadn’t accounted for the “bugs” at her feet to be in actuality three shrunken members of the women’s roster! And as such they heard everything ruby had said and were in a mixed state of emotions.

“Holy shit she’s seen us! She’s gonna kill us! We need to run away right now!” Sasha whispered hurriedly to the other two.

“No don’t be stupid, if we run she’ll realise we’re people. We should just let her pick us up and put us in some other persons Clothes. Hopefully she won’t look too closely at us.” Alexa responded.

“Oh wow...she so big!” Bayley said in an almost trance like state.

Alexa and Sasha both turned to look at Bayley after she had spoken. They saw that she was looking up at Ruby in an almost lovingly kind of way, almost like being so small had given her a giantess fetish...she wouldn’t really try she explore her new feelings at a time like this?

“Bayley! Snap out of it!” Alexa snapped.

Bayley came to immedietly and glanced over at Alexa and Sasha who were looking at her concerned. Feigning a smile she tried to smooth over the situation.

“H-hey guys don’t worry about me...I’m sure everything’s gonna be fine...” Bayley said rather unconvincingly.

This was the final straw for Sasha who had had enough of the talking and stalling, so she decided to tske matters into her own hands and turned tail and started to run away! Bayley and Alexa tried to stop her but it was no use as they gave chase unsuccessfully. Ruby saw this and smirked as she saw the “bugs” trying to scuttle away.


“Woah not so fast little guys you’re not going anywhere yet!” Ruby remarked.

Reaching over to the bench she grabbed one of her paintspray bottles and shook it before spraying a line of paint right in front of the sprinting Sasha. The tiny boss came to a sudden halt at a thick line of a green paint blocked her path completely. She fell on her ass and looked up scared as hell at the gigantic Ruby Riott who was on one knee looking down at them all.

“Awww the little bugs thought they could escape. Well not today, come to Ruby!”

Ruby then lowered a humongous hand down towards the three shrunken women who could do nothing as they were scooped up from the floor unceremoniously. Sasha was screaming all the way whilst Alexa tried to remain as quiet as possible. Meanwhile Bayley was in silent awe as she felt the warm embrace of a giantess all over her body.

‘Wow I can see why Alexa was so emamored with my ass before, giant things are fucking awesome!’ Bayley thought to herself.

Ruby picked up the bugs and placed them in her outstretched hand. Satisfied with her find she decided it was time for her to hide them in some poor unsuspecting woman’s clothes. Meanwhile her fellow Riott Squad members were still trashing the locker room, Liv Morgan was slicing and dicing any surface she could get her knives into, Sarah Logan was busy causing major damage to any structure as well. Ruby was proud of her squad, they had proven to be valuable underlings in her campaign to be the number on woman on Raw.

As Ruby was searching for a woman’s bag the three women (bugs) in her hand were having a minor argument.

“Ok guys just shut up and play dead and maybe we’ll get through this alive.” Alexa whispered.

“Fuck off Alexa she knows that we’re people! We are so fucked!” Sasha snapped back.

“Holy shit this awesome.” Bayley muttered to herself.

This kicked off an argument that wasn’t exactly quiet, this didn’t go unnoticed as Ruby thought she heard something in her hand, looking down she brought her hand uo to her face. That’s when she saw it. These weren’t bugs in her hands. No. These were people!

“Holy shit! This can’t be real! Sasha? Bayley? Alexa? Oh man this is too fucking good to be true!” Ruby said joyfully.

The three women in her hand froze. They had been found out...Ruby Riott had discovered them..,they were all fucked. Well in Alexa and Sasha’s minds...Bayley’s was focused on something else.

“Hey Ruby whatcha got over there?”

One of the Riott Squad members asked Ruby a question, the real question was did Ruby reveal the three shrunken women to her stablemates?
