Gathering her thoughts she decided she would try and plea with Sasha one more time in a desperate attempt to stop her friends Madness.

Bayley then ran through the entrance but out of nowhere she found herself trapped in a crowd of screaming fans trying to escape the area as Sasha’s hand was hovering above readying for a blood splattering attack.

“Ok little ones say good night it’s time for the boss palm hahaha!!! Oh what do we have here? Some Bayley fans, well I’ll show you what happens when you support the wrong star!” Sasha boomed howler looming diecrtly at Bayley.

Bayley was panicking as Sasha was looking right at her and hadn’t recognized her! And now her titanic hand was coming down fast! What happened to Bayley?
15211231212.title: Bayley’s Fan Experience

choices: Sasha drops her in and swallows
152112312122.content:
Bayley's eyes widened as she saw her best friend's giant hand descending. If she didn't react quick, she would be reduced to a bloody pulp underneath Sasha Banks' giant descending hand. Shoving her way past the fans she normally adored, Bayley made a desperate attempt to dive to safety.

There was an incredible crash behind her and a cloud of dust and debris shot up into the air. Dazed and confused, Bayley turned around, to see the gigantic hand of Sasha Banks where the bodies of men, women, and children were mere seconds ago. "Oh my god! Sasha no!" Bayley screamed, a tear streaming down her face. She had been witnessing the carnage Sasha was causing, but now being this close to it really seemed to drive home just how dangerous Sasha was.

Sasha smiled, happy to see another section of fans had been squished beneath her hand. She lifted her hand again, to reveal several bodies of people, each about one inch tall compared to her, were crumbled against her palm. There were even a few children whose mangled bodies were among the remains.

Drinking in the screams of all the people terrified around her, Sasha brought her hand to her mouth and licked it, her tongue lapping up each of the bodies. "Ahhh, you guys are all delicious," she teased. Then she turned her attention back down towards the area she had just struck, and saw a tiny person who seemed to escape.

"Well, are you trying to escape me, little one?" Sasha laughed and lowered her giant hand down towards Bayley. Sasha plucked up her tiny friend between two fingers.

"Sasha please! It's me!" Bayley screamed as she was brought in front of Sasha's mouth.

Unfortunately for Bayley, she was too far away from Sasha's ears to be heard, and Sasha's giant fingers obstructed her view.

"I bet you taste great," Sasha teased, and hovered Bayley above her mouth.

What happens next?
152112312122.title: She managed to avoid her hand

1521123121223.content:
Bayley was in a major predicament, she had just seen first hand how evil Sasha had become. With utmost ease she had crushed an entire section of fans under her titanic hand like it was nothing. But now something much worse had happened. Sasha’s hand had descended and plucked her from the stands and now she was hovering over the dark moist abyss that was Sasha’s terrifying mouth!

“NOOOOOOOO SASHA STOP!!!! ITS ME BAYLEY!!!! PLEASE DONT EAT ME!!!!” Bayley screamed at the top of her lungs.

However her words fell on deaf ears as Sasha was too big and too far away to hear poor little Bayley. This was is for her, she was about to be eaten by her unaware best friend and all whilst trying to save people. Well at least she would go out with a clean conscience. Lucky for Bayley however good things happen to those who do good.

Just before she could drop her “snack” in her mouth Sasha felt a weird sensation coming from her foot. Stopping in her tracks Sasha looked down Puzzlingly at her feet, out of nowhere a bright light erupted from her boot and encased Sasha and Bayley within it. Sasha had no idea where this light was coming from but knew exactly what it was. Smiling she let the sensation overtake her as things were about to get much much worse.

Little did Sasha know that the size gun had become lodged within the sole of her boot and as such any movement could trigger its activation (amazing it took til now to kick in) now it had finally activated and started affecting Sasha.

The boss started to moan as the overwhelming feeling of growth filled her entire body, it would only last a few seconds as she shot up in height rather quickly. Within a few seconds the growing stopped and Sasha looked down at the much smaller arena, she estimated that she had now shot up to roughly 500ft tall! This was a tremendous delight for the boss as she had grown 2 1/2 times her former size!

“Holy shit! Look how big I am! I keep growing bigger and bigger! If I get any bigger Soon this arena is gonna resemble a toe ring...hmmmm I’ll out that idea in the back pocket for later hihi!” an elated Sasha giggled.

That’s when Sasha remembered that she was about to enjoy a snack and looke dbwteen her fingers to see if her prey was still there. Question was had Bayley grown with Sasha or not?
1521123121223.title: Bigger Boss!!!

15211231212232.content:
Sasha was enjoying her newfound height at 500 feet tall. She had long since shot through the roof of the building. Then it suddenly dawned on Sasha that she was about to enjoy a snack between her fingers. She began to turn her attention back to Bayley.

Unfortunately for Bayley, when Sasha had been struck by the size ray again, Bayley had not grown proportionally. While she had previously been about the size of an inch compared to Sasha, she was now smaller. Much smaller.

Bayley was now about the size of an ant in between the fingers of her giant best friend. She was lifted again in front of Sasha's eye.

"Well now, what shall I do with you," Sasha spoke, her voice echoing through Bayley's body. It was clear to Bayley that her friend did not recognize her.

"Please Sasha, it's me!" she screamed. Bayley had not been heard before, and there was absolutely no hope of being heard now.

Sasha's giant eye seemed to dart back and fourth, the massive pupil studying the Bayley's tiny squirming body.

That cocky, evil smirk re-formed on Sasha's face. "I know where you're going," Sasha said with a laugh.

Bayley screamed in horror as Sasha went to put Bayley's "ant-sized" body into her...
15211231212232.title: Bayley didn’t grow

15213.content:
- After Summerslam 2019-

A Mercedes Bends pulls up to the car lot. Parking among all the others as no one would guess who would be coming out. With a simple click she opened the door and out came the one the one, the Boss! Sasha Banks.

With a smile on herself, and a black jacket on. She looked up to the Arena WWE was at. Traveling around the world and currently they were at Toronto Canada. She smiled to herself as she closed the door, but first grabbing something. Pulling it out of the car as she held it in her hand.

With a happy swing she walked to the arena, excited about what she was going to do.

Sasha hasn't been this happy for a long time, a very long time. From being shafted by WWE constantly, Getting screwed out of the Tag Titles and constantly being creatively stifled. WWE tends to have that effect on people long enough.
 She actually planned to Quit the company, move over to the up coming one that should not be named. However she was told to rest, to take a break and think about that move. Which she did. From Wrestlemania to Summerslam she was unseen by any WWE fan.

And now she's back, why? Well because Stephanie McMahon made her a deal. A very good deal that she was more then happy to accept.

Moving forward she looked down to the divide in her hand and thought about the deal. Besides just better negotiating states and a bigger earn for the Boss, it also came with a little cause.

With the ray in her hand, she can shrink any WWE superstar she feels fit! Whoever she wants she can shrink to the size of a bug! At first she didn't believe it but she saw it first hand and she was all about it. Any superstar. From RAW, Smackdown, NXT, NXT UK, Hell even the Hall Of Famers. She can do it.

The rules she's been given are that she's not allowed to kill anyone, injure anyone and if requested by Steph she has to grow them big again. They were still employed by her family after all.
 Regardless Sasha was more then happy to take this offer. Walking into the building she wore a smile as she planned to do some real damage. There was so many people here and they will remember not to piss of the Boss. So many enemies.
 She's not planning on being the nice Boss n Hug Connection, no she's gonna be the NXT Bitch Boss, and she's gonna enjoy every second of it.

Moving into the place she got stopped by someone. A burly woman with muscles and a security suit on. This woman looked like she could give Nia Jax run for her money.

“Hey you stop! No unauthorised personal behind here” She walked right up to Sasha and she did have some inches over her. When she walked right up Sasha looked up to her.

“Oh” She said a bit shocked as the aggressive attitude she had left away “Your one of the Diva’s aren't you? Sorry, couldn't recognise you due to your hair”

It made sense. She changed the colour of her hair from red to blue. She didnt have a problem with that, what she did have a problem was the D word.

“Woman. Wrestlers. Not Diva’s. We earned that” Sasha said, more of a bark as she was not happy about the words.

“Right yeah you earned that” The security woman said with a smirk “You earned that by shaking your ass around and getting dude sweaty. Good work”

Sasha glared at her before saying out loud “yeah, you deserve this”

The girl was about to ask what, but couldn't as there was a blinding light coign from Sasha’s waist. The security guard grabbed her eyes until the light died down “What the hell was tha-”

She didn't finish her words as she was left looking at a gigantic Sasha Banks! Towering over her like a building. The taller woman now the size of a bug, and Sasha was about to treat her like one.

She raised her giant boot over the shrunken woman and with no remorse brought it down onto her. In a second her life was snuffed out as she was nothing but a red smear.

Stephenie said she wasn't allowed to Kill any WWE Superstars, this is just a lowly security guard. So she found a loop hole. She twisted and dragged her boot over the remains, getting the blood off as she kept walking.

This is why she returned. Her smile is back and she was about to make it a whole lot bigger. As she walked through the halls of the Arena she walked past people, but none she really had a bone to pick with.

There was many she needed to pick with. The top of her list was Alexa Bliss. She's watched WWE since she's been gone and everything about her was pissing her off. Her false friendship with Nikki Cross, having the Tag Titles when she really doesn't deserve it and attacking her friend Bayley. She deserved to be shrunken for the Boss’s enjoyment.

The other end was of course Becky Lynch. Or what she's calling herself now, ‘The Man’. She scoffed to herself thinking what a stupid name that was.

Becky has gotten a big ego, and talks a lot of shit. She's even done it to her. Not to mention she took the role that Sasha wanted. Being the fist woman to main event Wrestlemania.

Becky was a target of hers. In fact Charlotte, Ruby Riot, Natayla, Ember Moon. She wants to shrink every bitch that thinks they can beat her in a wrestling match.

There was only one person safe from her wrath, it was Bayley. She doesn't want to shrink her friend, so she should feel lucky.

Then again, maybe she can have some friendly fun with Bayley. That could be fun.

As she walks through the corridors and into a room, who does she see first?
15213.title: The Boss Is Back!!

choices: Leave her to fend for herself
Put her in another woman’s ring gear
152132.content:
Walking through the corridors of the backstage area, even Sasha had to admit she had missed this. The hustle and bustle of the backstage crew, writers waiting for their work to be torn to pieces by Vince and Kevin Dunne and of course the various wrestlers all getting ready for the nights show. Even thought she’d never admit it out loud she was very happy to be back.

Be that as it may however, Sasha was there for one reason and one reason only. Make any and everyone who had ever wronged her pay, and luckily for her it was a long, long list!

As she walked down the corridor she wondered who’d she get to shrink first...well second if you include that bitch security guard whose remains were barely still plastered on the sole of Sasha’s boot.

She was hoping to find her best friend Bayley first, she knew thst after some convincing the two of them would be able to have a lot of fun together.

But alas it was not meant to be as a side door opened and someone bumped right into the boss making her stagger slightly. Annoyed Sasha turned ready to give whoever it was a piece of her mind. But to her utter joy that person was none other than the Raw Women’s champion, “the man” Becky Lynch!

Her annoyance turned to joy in an instant and as a result a big smile spread across Sasha’s face. Becky turned with her belt on her shoulder and muttered an apology but then she stopped in her tracks and turned around to get a proper look at who she had bumped into. A coy smile formed on Becky’s face as she came face to face with the boss.

“Well well well. If it isn’t the boss! Sup Sasha it’s been a while huh? Last I saw you were heading home with your ball, I say ball because you’d already lost your title! But seriously welcome back, in case you haven’t been watching things around Monday night Raw have changed whilst you’ve been gone. I run this women’s divison, hell if I wanted to I’d run the men’s as well! So the man bids you welcome to her show!” Becky said cockily.

Sasha just stood there smiling as she let Becky run her mouth. Oh boy she was sure in for a surprise when she whipped out her shrink ray and cut her down to size!

“Gee thanks Becky! I really appreciate the warm welcome, and I’m so happy for you! You’ve done really well whilst I’ve been gone, but I just hope that there will be no bad blood between us, I wouldn’t want to get off on the wrong foot!” Sasha said in a really girly voice.

Becky was teen aback by this sudden change in attitude, but she appreciated the respect all the same.

“I’ll be honest I didn’t expect that from ya Sasha but I’m happy nonetheless. I’m glad I decided to be the bigger man as welcome ya back!” Becky said smugly.

Sasha grin grew even wider as she heard Becky’s choice of words. Boy was she gonna regret that. Slowly pulling out the shrink ray she got ready to use it.

“Yes Becky I’d say you are the bigger man...but not for long!” Sasha snapped.

Becky didn’t have time to register what Sasha even said as in an instant a bright light shone right in her face, blinding her for the moment. When the light died down Becky opened her eyes.

“What the Fuck was that? You trying to blind me or something bitc...” Becky started.

She stopped dead as she found herself not face to face with Sasha but rather face to bellybutton with her! Craning her neck up slowly she saw the smiling terrifying face of Sasha staring down at her.

“What the Hell!!! How’d you get so big! Y-you stay away from me ya big behemoth if ou know what’s good for ya...” Becky threatened unconvincingly.

Sasha laughed at the smaller woman’s threat. She barely came up to the bosses belly button and here she was giving her lip...maybe Sasha had to teach her another lesson.

“No becks I’m not big, you’re just small! Look at you you’re like half your height of something! Now what you said before..,was that a threat?” Sasha replied.

Sasha’s smile disappeared and was replaced with a scowl. Becky gulped in fear, at her size Sasha could easily beat her without putting up much of a fight. She knew she couldn’t win this fight so being the crafty wrestler she was she turned tail and tied to run.

Becky wouldn’t get far however as in one swift motion Sasha stepped forward and grabbed Becky by the hair! The man cried out in pain as Sasha taunted her.

“What’s this? You think you can just run away? No I don’t think so...in fact I think I need to teach you a lesson little man!”

As Becky was struggling to escape from the bigger woman’s grip, Sasha took out her shrink ray again and fired at Becky. The bright light returned and blinded Becky once again. Sasha made sure to let go of her hair as the man fell to the floor in a heap.

Once more the light went away and Becky regained her vision, gathering her wits she slowly got to her feet with her belt still in he hands.

“Oh that’s it you think you’re funny Sasha? I don’t give a fuck if I’m only half my size, I’ll kick your ass no matter what height you are! So out up or shut up bit...” Becky yelled.

Pride definitely didn’t come before the fall as Becky was getting ready to attack Sasha with all her might. But she seemed to forget what happened the last time a light blinded her...

Becky turned getting ready to clock Sasha right in her gut but to her despair she wasn’t looking at her belly button...she was looking up at her knee.

“Hahaha Oh is someone surprised? Aww you forgot I could make you smaller didn’t you? Well I can and I’d say you’re only a foot tall right now!” Sasha said excitedly.

Becky was completely dumbfounded. She had been embarrassed by Sasha yet again. But she wasn’t gonna let her get away with it this time. Throwing caution to the wind she ran right ahead and began punching and kicking every inch of Sasha leg she could reach!

Sasha was on the verge of tears as she held back laughter, Becky’s blows were nothing more than little bug bites to her! Boy the man sure looked pathetic! But she couldn’t let her get away with disrespecting her, without saying a word she pulled her leg back and kicked Becky sending her flying into the wall.

The breath was completely knocked out of Becky as she struggled to breath from that kick Sasha gave her. It felt like a small car hitting her it was that strong. Sasha meanwhile saunters over and leaned down she could get a better view of Becky.

“Awww is that all the fight you have left in you becks? Well poor little man. Guess I win. And I’d say to the victor to the spoils!”

With that said Sasha reached down and plucked the shrunken women’s title from Becky’s body. Bringing it up to her face she admired the little title that had once been hers. She then took it and wrapped it sprung her wrist. To her delight it just about fit!

“Aww yay! The women’s title makes the perfect bracelet! Man I’m gonna look so good tonight! Since I won I guess I get to choose what happens to you...hmmm I don’t want Steph or anyone else discovering you so soon...I know!” Sasha exclaimed.

Taking out the shrink ray once more she fired at Becky and watched as the man shrunk even smaller. She quickly went from 1 foot to only 1 inch tall in a matter of seconds! Becky groggily watched as Sasha rose higher and higher into the sky. By the time the light cleared up fully Sasha was like the size of a building to her!

“Holy shit look how small you are now Becks! Lucky for you you’re not the smallest I’ve shrank someone today. But I’d say this is a good size for you. It matches your talent to mine quite well!”

Satisfied with Becky’s size Sasha contemplates what to do with the little man...after a few moments she decides to...
152132.title: The Boss Meets The Man

1521323.content:
Sasha decided to move on to “bigger” things and drop Becky off with someone else unawares. “I should crush you but I’m not allowed....that doesn’t mean you can’t have an “accident”. It’s not my fault if someone doesn’t see your ant size ass oops hahahahaha ha”

“It’s been fun “Little Man”. But I have other plans” Sasha said as she reaches down pinching up Becky between her fingers and scoffing “Buh bye Becks.....stay put lol”. Sasha says as she walks over to the lockers and drops the 1 inch tall Champion.....
1521323.title: Put her in another woman’s ring gear

choices: Under the big toe, Zelina doesn’t feel her  (reserved)
Under her big toe, Zelina feels her
15213231.content:
Sasha looked around the empty locker room while clenching the tiny struggling body of Becky between her fingers. Sasha could hear the shower running behind a closed bathroom door. She looked down and at the bag near the bathroom door and smiled. That bag belonged to Zelina Vega, who was showering right now.

Walking over to the bag, Sasha reach in and grabbed one of Zelina’s sandals. Zelina has smaller feet than almost any other woman on the roster, but they were massive compared to one inch Becky.

“Well Beck, I think I’ll leave you in Zelina’s shoes,” Sasha teased, infuriating Becky.

“Are you fucking stupid, Sasha!” Becky yelled. “She’ll feel me and take me right out!

The foul mouthed champion had a point, at an inch tall, she was definitely to big to be missed. Sasha had an answer though, she just grinned and pointed the shrink ray at Lynch.

“No dont!” the usually confident Becky screamed. Sasha pulled the trigger until Becky shrunk down again to 1/4 inch tall, the size of an ant. “THAT’S BETTER, DONT YOU THINK?” Sasha teased. She could hear a barely audible squeak coming from Becky but could not make out what she was saying. “She lowered Becky down on the the sweaty platform of Zelina’s sandal. “BYE BITCH!” Sasha laughed and walked out of the locker room.

Several minutes passed of Becky trying to figure out how to survive this situation, when the bathroom door opened. It was Zelina, though the normally short woman towered over her like a Latin goddess now.

“Holy shit,” Becky whispered. Zelina lifted her giant barefoot and began to slide it into her sandal. Becky wasted no time. She began to sprint towards the toe section, desperate for escape. The giant foot continued to descend.

“Zelina don’t do this,” Becky screamed. Obviously, Vega couldn’t hear her, and she finished putting her sandal on. Where was Becky right now?
15213231.title: From The Man to The Bug

choices: She shrinks Zelina. No friends except Bayley
She shrinks her to a foot tall. She can be in charge of the little ones.
She shakes Zelina's hand. Its a deal
152132313.content:
As Zelina was putting on her sandal, she swear she could feel something in there. Right under her big toe. It was slight, it was barely noticeable but it was there. At first she thought it was nothing more then a pebble, like one would logically think.
 Good thing she decided to wear a sandal instead of a sneaker. The girl lifted her foot and tilted it side ways. Letting anything under her foot slide away. Well Becky as it turns out wasn't that lucky. As she was already stepped on good enough where her body was pushed into the sandal. So her body wasn't going anywhere.

Once she was sure the sandal would be gone, she went back to normal. Stepping down on her foot as she stood up. Finding that the same small and insignificant feeling was there. Nw visibly annoyed she stomped it down, thinking she could flatten it and she would get rid of the problem that way. She stomped her sandal onto the floor several times.

For Becky, it was like being hit by a building over and over and over again. She doesn't know what else the size ray did to her, but she wasn't being smushed into red paste. No ‘The Man’ was there and stuck being stepped on over and over and over again.

This has been the worst day of her life, and its only just began. She can't even get Sasha back because she was the size of an ant and stuck inside some Latino’s sandal!

Speaking of the Latino, she found that the feeling in her sandal was still there and it was really pissing her off. She was going to have to pull out her sandal and pull it actually.

Grabbing her sandal she lifted it up to her face. Which scared the hell out of Becky as the giant Latino’s face was over her in just a second.

“What the hell! A bug!” She yelled angrily as her voice boomed over her. Zelina seeing the bug move slightly raised her finger. Planning on snuffing out the bugs life with nothing but her sexy finger.

Becky saw this and raised her voice “Don't!!!!” She shouted.

It was faint but Zelina heard it. Moving around as she paused for a second. Did she just hear Becky’s voice. Lowering her finger she pulled the sandal up to her eye and with a closer look didn't believe what she saw.

It was Becky! Only small, and stuck to her sandal. She wasn't being the tough badass ‘Man’ That she is usually but the concerned and scared one.

And she got even more concerned when Zelina’s face turned to one of evil “Oh you have got to be kidding me. This is too good! The Man! Down and stuck in my sandal”

“Zelina don't! Help me out of here!” She said as she couldn't get her body loose. Zelda held her by bringing her finger, and hit her free. Knocking the orange hair girl away.

“Now...” Zelina said as she really wanted to know “How the hell! Did you get that size”
At first Becky didn't respond, not knowing if it would be good to tell Zelina how she got shurnken and turned into a bug. However Zelina noticed this hesitation and frowned. “I said answer me Bug!” And with that her finger came and hit Becky hard.

“I could kill you right now and it would be so easy. I just close my hand and your gone. So answer my question, how did you get so small?

“Sasha!” She shouted at, Becky gripping her midsection. She looked up at the giant face and answered “She's here! She's... got a gun or something? She shrunk me, took my title”

“Did she now” Zelina said as she smirked. With that gun, she could do so much. She wouldn't need Andrade at that point, she could beat any superstar on the roster easily. Shrink them down to doll size and dominate them.

Zelina has always been lacking in height and this is Perfect. It is exactly what she wants “Im gonna go find Sasha” Zelina said as she looked down at Becky “And your coming with me”

“No need to find me” A voice said “Im already here”

Zelina craned her head to the door to see Sasha Banks there. leaning on the side and showing off her bracelet “You like it, looks good on me. Like most things do”

“Sasha!?” Zelina said as her eyes went on the ray in her hand.

“See you found Becky, not gonna lie. Was kind of hoping she would stay in her sandal. Hey Becky, hows it going? Feeling small aren't you?”

Becky didn't reply, only looked at the colossal woman with fear.

“Whats the matter, not feeling so big anymore. Don't worry, you and Zelina will have that in common”

“What!?” Zelina shouted, her voice almost defining Becky “Y-Your not gonna shrink me!”

“Oh yes i am” Sasha said with a smirk on her face, lifting the gun and standing on two feet. She pointed it at Zelina “I don't have a problem with you, its more the fact that i just want you small”

“Please dont! I can help you Sasha” Zelina said saying whatever she wants to get Sasha to stop.

“Fine, I'm listening” The Boss said as she waiting for Zelina to start.

“I can help you round up more girls! Like Alexa, Asuka, Charlotte. I can help you!” She said as Becky was trying to speak up.

“No don't, take the ray from her! She's gonna-”

“Shut it little bug!” Zelina barked down to Becky. Getting the girl to stop talking. Sasha has got to admit it, she does like Zelina’s ruthless attitude.

“Please, we have no issues withe eachother Sasha. You got to keep me big”

She looked at Zelina and then with a smirk smiled. A smirk that Zelina couldn't read and she couldn't know what was going to happen to her.

What does Sasha do?
152132313.title: Zelina Spots Her

1521323132.content:
Sasha stood and contemplated Zelina’s offer. She had made some good points, she had absolutely no beef with her and she had been offered to gather her some more victims without the need for her to. But then again the boss only had one person that she planned on keeping full size...but who’s to say she doesn’t need an assistant?

“Ok Zelina, I guess I can let you help me. Here hand me that bug in your hand, I have other plans for her.” Sasha said with a sly smile.

Zelina smiled in relief, Sasha had accepted her offer and wasn’t gonna shrink her. Delighted she took the ant sized Becky and deposited her onto Sasha’s outstretched hand. The man screamed again as she free fell through the air until she landed with a soft thud on Sasha’s massive hand.

Satisfied Sasha brought the tiny Becky up to her collossal face and smiled menacingly at her. Becky cowered in fear at the sight of her. Suffice to say that being shrunken to ant size had definitely shattered the mans tought guy bravado.

“Thanks for the chance Sasha im so glad you kept me normal sized, so er what do you want me to do first?” Zelina asked.

Sasha closed her hand around Becky trapping her in a cave of complete darkness for the time being, she then revised up the size ray and smiled evilly at Zelina.

“I don’t remember saying anything about keeping you normal size pipsqueak haha”

With that Sasha fired at Zelina who screamed and raised her hands in a pathetic attempt to shield herself as the beam and bright light engulfed her. When she opened her eyes she found her world had gotten a lot bigger!

Sasha looked down at the now 1ft tall Zelina who trembled in fear at the giantess in front of her. Sasha took a few booming steps forward and stood looking down at the diminutive Latina. Zelina gulped as she was now slightly smaller than Sasha’s knee!

“What the hell Sasha why’d ya shrink me! I thought we’d be working together to shrink other people!!!” Zelina blurted out.

Sasha stopped grinning and looked down slightly irked at what was just said. She then took her foot and delivered a swift mid level kick to Zelina that sent her lying back several feet. The blow was hard enough it made Zelina throw up a little bit as Sasha crouched down to get a better look at her.

“Now let’s get a few things straight pipsqueak. I’m in charge which means I’m the boss, so that’s how you’ll be addressing me in future. One more thing we’re not working together, you are working FOR me. You can be my little chief of staff and keep track of all the people I shrink. That’s why I shrank you, I need someone closer to their level. Now get up and get in line. Understood?” Sasha barked.

Zelina quickly rose to feet after wiping her mouth, she was still feeling a little uneasy but had to obey her new bosses order. She even did a salute to her new Boss which looked cheesy but actually ended up pleasing Sasha who smiled in approval.

“Good now that that’s cleared up you can start your job by holding onto this little bug.”

With that she opened her palm and brought Becky right up to her giant face, winking at she puckered her lips before blowing a kiss at her. The ensuing gust of wind actually blew Becky right off of the boss’s hand!

Becky screamed as she fell through the air once again, only this time it was like falling off the top of the tallest skyscraper in existence! She passed by Sasha’s entire gigantic body as the boss giggled at the sight.

“Ok Chief Vega. Your first task is to look after that little bug Becky. Do me a favour and catch her ok!” Sasha laughed.

Zelina nodded frantically and then began to move around and position herself as she made sure she could catch the tiny man.
