“What the hell do you mean shrunken matches? We’re not gonna stay this size. Are you insane you jumbo bitch? Now you’re gonna find whatever made us small and make us big again otherwise I’ll rip your arm off your body. Are we clear Paige?” Becky shouted aggressively.

Paige looked down at Becky in complete silence. After a few seconds she reached down and grabbed Becky in her massive hand taking both her and Charlotte by surprise. Taking extra care to squeeze the life out of her she addressed her.

“Now let me tell you something Becky. You are in no position to make threats. You’re only 3 inches tall darling, and if you think you can rip my arm off at thst size...we’ll ive got some bad news you can’t...but I can rip yours off!!!” Paige bellowed sadisticly

Paige then plucked Becky’s arm between her massive fingers and began to Apply pressure causing Becky to scream in agony.

Charlotte could her rivals screams from the floor and actually felt bad for her. However it was then she realised she had a chance. She took off as fast as she could for the size gun that was only a few (normal) feet away from were she was. This was her best shot of restoring herself to normal since Paige was so absorbed in torturing Becky. She ran as fast her legs would tske her until she was right next to the gun. Breathing a sigh of relief Charlotte was just big enough to adjust the controls and set them to grow, just as she was about to set the timer and grow herself...the worst happened.

“And what do we have here?”

Charlotte’s heart dropped. She hadn’t heard the booming footsteps, or noticed the massive shadow enveloping her. Slowly looking up she saw the titanic horrifying face of Paige staring at her. Panicking Charlotte attempted to use the gun but to no avail as Paige simply reached Down and picked the gun up. Twirling it in her fingers.

“Hmmm is this what I think it is ms Flair? Well only one way to find out.” Paige mused.

She then took out her lipstick and placed it on the floor. Talking the gun she didn’t bother to change the settings and fired at the lipstick. Instantly the gun shot up from the floor until it was roughly the same size as Paige herself!

“Holy shit! Yes this is awesome! Now I have the thing that made you two small in the first place! Oh this is gonna be sweet, my shrunken wrestling division will be the hottest thing on all of WWE!!! And hell if I get bored I can always make the first ever giantess division...with me as champion haha!!!!” Paige proclaimed.

Paige then reached down and picked up Charlotte before dropping her and Becky into her purse, she then took off from the locker room with the size gun and her new divisions first superstars.

What does Paige do first?
155132.title: Paige’s Idea

choices: Paige introduces a few “new rules” mid match
1551321.content:
Paige was truly elated. What had started as her simply checking up on her women’s divison has evolved into something much, much better. She stumbled upon a shrunken brawl between her brands best women wrestlers and even better than that she had found the device that had caused it! In her mind this was what she needed to make Smackdown the A show, the future of sport entertainment was here, and it was tiny!

Walking briskly she allowed her purse to swing slightly from side to side causing her two 3 inch tall passengers to have a little bit of a...bumpy ride. Becky and Charlotte true to form where being tossed and thrown about within the soft velvety walls of Paige’s purse, whereas Paige was delighted with the latest development the two in her purse were in hell.

“This is all your fault Charlotte you stupid bitch! What the hell were you doing with a shrink ray anyway? Wait how the hell did you get one of those in the first place?” Becky shouted.

“Like I’d tell you ya ginger freak. Let’s just say as the daughter of a wwe legend I have connections that people like you could never even dream of” Charlotte snapped back.

Becky had once again had enough of Charlotte’s attitude and was readying up to stiff her right in the mouth. However just as she was about to strike a bright light blinded her as Paige unzipped her purse.

“Sorry about that my little Darlings. Mama Paige couldn’t let anyone else see her stars. Now are you two gonna come out or do I have to pick you up again?” Paige said with a slight tinge of menace.

Not wanting to anger the giantess, Charlotte immedietly obliged and walked out of her purse post haste. However with her new attitude Becky wasn’t at liberty to entertain Paige’s dictatorship like antics, even though she had been threatened earlier she was still incredibly rebellious and stood her ground. This didn’t go unnoticed by Paige.

“Oh Becky sweetie. Did you not hear me? Well in case you’re hard of hearing I’ll say it again. Get your tiny little arse out here before I count to three...otherwise you will regret it! 1...2...Don’t make me say it Becky!” Paige threatened.

Staring the Brit right in her gigantic eye Becky smiled and held her hands up and started to slowly walk towards the purses exit. Paige smiled and was ready to welcome her with no consequences, however at the last second Becky turned her outurned hands and switched them to a single bird salute on each hand.

In an instant Paige’s smile vanished and was replaced with a somewhat angry blank expression. Without saying a word she grabbed Becky and held her in her hand. She then sat down at her desk with Becky still in her hand and Charlotte watching from the middle of the desk. Eyeing Charlotte Paige smiled once more.

“Charlotte Baby-girl, I want you to pay attention close attention. This is what happens when you disobey Mama Paige.”

With that said Paige with her free hand flicked Becky with her huge black nail polished finger. The flick whilst insignificant to Paige was monumental to Becky. One flick was like being hit by hit in the head with ten big boots all at once. But Paige didn’t let up there as she unleashed a barrage of finger flicks, each more devastating than the last.

After a minute of none stop abuse Paige stopped once she saw a fair amount of blood trickling down from Becky’s forehead. Satisfied with her punishment she set her Down in a heap next to Charlotte who looked at her once proud rival bloody and beaten before her. Paige then leaned in close so that her face was inches from theirs.

“Now I hope you two understand what happens when you disrespect Mama Paige. Now listen up as I lay down my house rules. You will obey every word I say, failure to do this will result in severe punishment. Now if you do exactly as I say and wrestle excellent Matches you will be rewarded. Now have I made myself clear ladies?”

Charlotte and half conscious Becky nodded in agreement which finally out another smile on Paige’s face.

“Good! Now I’m not a monster so I’ll allow poor whittle Becky a chance to recover slightly before we record the first match, now back in mama’s purse and rest up whilst I get things ready.”

With that the two shrunken women climbed inside Paige’s purse and were left in darkness once more as she zipped it shut. Her head almost splitting from the pain she was in Becky fell asleep within seconds. Charlotte after a few minutes curled up into a ball and eventually fell asleep.

Several hours passed before the two were awoken by light entering the purse. Paige had come to collect them finally ready to record the first ever match of the Shrunken Women’s divison.

Paige had taken this rather seriously as she had a toy wwe ring set up on her desk with lamps set up on either side of the ring. There was also a small towel that she used as a curtain so thst the two could enter as real stars. She even had her phone with the support of a selfie stick held up so she could record the match with a steady camera.

Ushering the two toward the ring Paige allowed them a moment to prepare before addressing them.

“Ok ladies in a few minutes I’m gonna press record. Now I’ll be acting as ring announcer, commentator and referee. Once I call your name you will enter through the curtain and enter the ring. Follow my instructions clearly all right. And we will keep this up until we get it perfect. Ok little ones?”

Paige and Becky nodded as Paige prepared to press record...
1551321.title: Paige’s House Rules

15513212.content:
Making sure her tiny “superstars” were ready Paige leaned forward and pressed record on her phone. The light shone bright and the recording was in progress. Paige then lifted up some notes before speaking.

“Welcome Laides and gentlemen to the inaugural edition of SCW. Shrunken. Championship. Wrestling! I’m your host, your commentator, your ring announcer, your general manager and your referee. I am Paige!” She exclaimed excitedly.

Paige then walked into the shot of the camera and began waving and blowing kisses to nothing in particular. Meanwhile behind the curtain Becky and Charlotte were silently preparing themselves for what was sure to be a rough night. Paige’s thick Norwich accent was dismally mind numbing to them and they waited patiently for their names to be Called.

“Our inaugural contest is scheduled for one fall. Introducing first from the Queen City, haha!” Paige couldn’t help giggling at the choice of hometown she had chosen for herself. “Charlotte Flair!!!”

Charlotte then nervously walked through the curtain and began approaching the ring, she glanced up nervously at Paige who was glaring at her, getting the hint Charlotte did her usual ring entrance complete with handstand and split entrance into the ring. Glancing up again Charlotte was relieved to see Paige was smiling now.

“And her opponent...from Dublin Ireland...its Becky Lynch!!!”

Becky came out next and simply sauntered to the ring as she normally would as Paige’s voice echoed throughout the room, her commentary was fair and that which would be expected of a normal commentator. Once the two were on the ring Paige walked around and sat in the chair by her desk so that she was on the hard Camera.

“Ding-ding-ding!” Paige announced.

With that the match was on. They first started with a traditional collar and elbow tie up that lasted about thirty second before Charlotte was able to gain control with a headlock. Becky switched it up and pushed Charlotte away towards the ropes before delivering a drop kick thst kncoked the Queen down, Becky the applied her own grounded headlock as Paige continued commentating.

Eventually Charlotte was able to reverse the headlock and pulled of a school boy roll up on Becky. Paige then lowered one finger and tapped the table...once...twice...but Becky kicked out before she could reach three! Becky then got uo and both women charged at eachother delivering stereo clothesline’s that took each other out, it was at this point that Paige intervened.

“Hold on a second ladies and gentlemen! General manager Paige has just announced that this will be a Fe-Fi-Fo-Fum match!”

With that said Paige pulled out the shrink ray and adjusted a few settings before taking it and firing at Becky! The Mn then dwindled in height even further until she was only as tall as Charlotte’s shin! And by comparison to the giantess Paige she was a mere ant in comparison! Putting down her shrink ray Paige laughed as laid out some new rules.

“Ok so for the next 60 seconds Becky shall be tiny, if Charlotte is able to catch or stomp her then Charlotte wins the match! However if Becky manages to elude and escape Charlotte she will be declared the winner!” Paige informed them.

Becky looked up the long and terrifying legs of Charlotte, past her toned stomach and her monstrous breasts until she was looking up at Charlotte who had a smirk on her face. This was extremely unsettling for Becky who would have to run firnher life to avoid this behemoth.

“60 seconds starts...NOW!”
15513212.title: Unexpected Match Stipulations

choices: She leaves them be, leaving Charlotte in charge.
She decides she will leave them, but shrink them both to specks. No escape
155132121.content:
Things have gone from bad to worse really quick. Not only has she been shrunken in size when compared to Paige, but now she was shrunken in size compared to Charlotte!

She was so small, so tiny that in fact she was shin height to Charlotte. The giant blonde looking down at her with a smile. This is how it should of been, but instead she was shrunk instead. At least she can get the glory of being in front of a tiny Becky.

“Oh Becky, you are so tiny and you are so fuck! Oh I am gonna have fun stepping on you.”

“Get real you loud mouth bi-”

“45 seconds left!” Paige said as she revealed the time was already going. Charlotte wasted no time as she lifted her giant boot. Lifting it up and getting ready to stomp down on Becky.
 The little Irish woman of course saw the problem. A giant stepping Charlotte in front of her, and an even more massive Paige behind her. Becky jumped out of the way, dodging as Charlotte stomped down. Becky acted quick, running away.

“Is that ‘The Man’ running away. More like ‘The Coward’!” Charlotte taunted as she gave out a loud laugh. “Well there is no argument who the better wrestler is!”

Becky stopped. She knows that this is probably a really stupid choice, but she was not gonna let Charlotte just talk shit about her.

Turning around, she ran back to Charlotte. The blonde not moving, cause she ran over and went to tackle Charlotte down. She ran into the boot that was bigger than her, as she tried to push it down.

And it had about the effect correctly.

“Haha! That it Becky. Man you are so weak!” She said as she kicked her leg. Kicking it forward and sending Becky flying across the ring. She hit hard against the edge, landing down on the stomach as it was clear that was a really bad idea.

Deciding to move, she goes and does that. She goes to slip out of the ring, however Charlotte was faster.

With a smile Charlotte moved over and grabbed Charlotte’s legs with her finger. Pulling it back as she gets pulled for a while. Becky felt herself get pulled, as suddenly an immense pressure on her back. A giant step that made her scream in pain. Charlotte has planted her giant boot onto Becky, and had her under her boot.

“The winner of the Fee Fi Fo Match. Charlotte Flair!” Paige shouted as she played Charlotte’s music on her phone. It rang as Charlotte smiled. Normally she would do her victory dance, however she decided something else as she pushed down hard on Becky. In her mind this was a long time coming, and Becky deserved this.

“Hey, no trying to injure the other wrestler.” Paige scolded as she moved her finger, hitting Charlotte away as she stumbled. “Suppose I should get her big as well.” Paige then aimed it at Becky and grew her up to Charlotte’s height. Of course she couldn’t move, due to being stepped on pretty heavily.

“Well tiny ladies, I say that was a successful pilot. You two really put on a show!” She said stopping the recording. “I really think this is gonna be the new hot thing.”

Charlotte smiled. She hated being this small but at the same time, she loved stepping on Becky. Very mixed feelings about this.

“Anyway, let me sort you two out. I have to keep my performers well.” She said with a smile. Getting up and looking for something.

Eventually Paige came back with nothing. “You know what, you two might as well sleep where you work. I got no problem with it. Just make sure not to make a giant problem for me.”

“Fuck you!” Becky shouted to Paige, getting some sense back. Clearly she was not happy. “You can’t just... kidnap us! You are gonna pay for this! People will find us, and you will fucking pay!”

She shouted this for a long while, until Paige smiled.

“Well then, maybe I was wrong. let’s get you back small becky.” Paige said with a smile, shooting Becky and bringing her down. About half the height of what she was before. So halfway to Charlotte’s shin.

 “Have a good night Charlotte. Maybe tomorrow you will get Becky to no longer be a sore loser.” Paige said with a teasing tone. Paige left view and she turned around, seeing the shrunken down yet giantess Charlotte.

“Oh, this is stupid and I hate it, but this moment. Holy shit.” She replied so happily.

-

This is hell for Becky. It’s been who knows how long hours. Last night, Charlotte treated Becky like shit, kicking her around with happiness and stepping on her. Mostly feet based, and whether it was because she was into that or she wanted to save her body for later, she was not really sure.

Paige walked up on the two, dressed for work and looking down at Charlotte.

Charlotte was laid down in the bed, with her hands behind her head and her boots off. “Good morning, did you two have a good sleep?”

“I did.” Charlotte said rolling up and sitting up. Looking inside of her boot as she pulled something out. The dirty, covered in sweat broken body of Becky.

“Well, I think she did.” Charlotte said holding her up with a smile. She hates Paige for this, but for what happened to Becky Lynch. Nothing could have been better. She would of tried to escape, but the walls were far to big.

“Good girl. Now, i’m going to go to work. Maybe take another couple girls back here. Get my roster higher.” She said with a smile. She has no doubt in her mind that she will do that, she just needs to decide her.

After a while she looked down, deciding on what she will do. On one part, she wants to take them, but maybe it would be better to leave them here.`
155132121.title: Charlotte's Squash Match

choices: The giant eye of________ looking down at them
The giant finger of________ coming down near them
1551321213.content:
Paige look down at her shrunken women’s Division. She had Charlotte flair who as only a few inches tall and even smaller than her was the near bug sized Becky Lynch!

Now Paige had to get to work and was seriously considering taking the two shrunkees with her. However at the last second she decided against it and instead pulled out the size gun.

Smiling the English vixen showed her tiny stars some courtesy and let them know just what was about to happen.

“Ok darlings I have to go to work now and I just don’t feel like babysitting you little ones all day!” Paige said in a fake sad voice.

Charlotte was delighted by this. If Paige left them alone she could torture Becky some more, maybe even use her as a sex toy whilst the giantess was away. Then maybe she could try and escape the room and find some help! However what Paige said next would leave the queen terrified.

“So I’m gonna leave you little ones here. Only I can’t risk you getting away so I’m gonna have to something about that...” Paige construed as she lifted up the size fun and adjusted the settings.

Charlotte froze as she saw the giantess raise her size raise. She knew what was coming but was too afraid to move at the moment.

“So I’m gonna have to make the two of you a lot...smaller!” Paige said menacingly.

At this point Charlotte unfroze and turned till and tired to make a break out of the ring. Next to her boot Becky was stirring weakly and cake to just long enough to see Charlotte struck by a beam.

Within seconds Charlotte was Shrunk even smaller than she already was! Becky walked over as the tiny Charlotte was knocked to the ground by the tremors that were being caused by Becky’s booming footsteps!

Charlotte had been shrunken to the size of an ant to Becky Lynch. Meaning she was bug sized to a bug! Becky looked down at her and smiled. After everything that happened yesterday and today she was ready to get some payback.

Raising her boot she was preparing to squash Charlotte like the bug she was. The queen could do nothing but hold her arms up as she saw the huge sole of Becky’s boot coming right down for her!

However at the last second Paige intervened and shot Becky with the size ray! Almost instantly Becky was shrank down to the same size as Charlotte. However her boot was still big enough to connect with Charlotte first, the big yet shrinking foot almost knocked Charlotte out as all air escaped from her lungs!

Noticing she was now the same size as Charlotte once more. However before she could express her distain. A booming voice and a reality check would snap her out of her stupor.

“OK GIRLS BEHAVE AND DONT GO ANYWHERE!” the giantess Paige boomed.

Becky and Charlotte were stunned by the sheer size of this woman. She was the entire sky to them essentially at this point. How small had she made them? Well wanting to make sure they couldn’t escape Paige shrank them to speck size. Almost too small to be seen, but as long as Paige knew where they were she would find them again.

With her problem solved Paige hid her size ray in her purse and headed out the door. She would finish her day at work and head straight back to this locker room to continue her shrunken women’s league. Maybe she’d pick up a few more women for this division...

Finally left alone Becky and Charlotte looked at each other. Ten seconds later they were laying into each tower with rights and lifts and all sorts of kicks. It was clear they wouldn’t be getting along during this alone time.

1 hour later

Having tired of fighting, each of the speck sized women had taken refuge in one of Charlotte’s giant upturned boots. Having not been wearing them when she was shrunk again, Charlotte’s boots were now the size of a small house to each of these women.

As Charlotte and Becky sat trying to think of someway to get back to normal size, the locker room door opened.

However it became clear within seconds that this was not Paige. Inside the toy ring Charlotte and Becky looked up and saw...
1551321213.title: An unexSPECKted situation

choices: Alexa and Nikki turn, seeing Paige at the door
15513212131.content:
With the two now speck size girl’s sitting in the ring, they kept their distance from each other not very happy about the situation in general. For Becky, she has gone through hell. From getting shrunken by Paige, facing a giant Charlotte and being tortured by the blonde all night afterwards. Then, when she got a chance for payback, it was gone before she had any of it. And now she was speck size, under a giant shelter which was the boot of the blonde.

Charlotte was feeling the same, but a bit different. Of course she was not a big fan of this, but at the same time having that situation over Becky. It was so amazing. Sure it sucked being so small, but if she can get even more of that. It might be worth it, to a degree at least.

As the the girls were in the boots, a loud boom happened and soon enough, the sky was covered. A shadow, and when they looked up. It was a giant blue eye, scanning the ground.

“What the hell!” The Irish woman yelled as she froze, both of them as the pupil searched around, moving and blinking. It was like a love crafitan creature, it was that big and that amazing. When it pulled back, the eye became a face.

A face of a short blonde woman, who just so happens hate both of these woman. Alexa Bliss.

Sure she was nicer then she was before, but that doesn’t calm either of them down.

What did, is that they were so small to be found. Charlotte and Becky hiding and staying still.

“It’s a play ring, in a cardboard stadium?!” She boomed, her voice sounding so loud that it got the other two to cover their ears. “Wonder what it’s doing here!?”

“Ohhh!!! Play!!!” An even louder voice say, getting them to cower once again. Alexa felt someone run into her shoulder, gripping her. It was an equally massive Nikki Cross. The slightly insane girl looking down with a massive smile, her Scottish accent booming. “Let’s play Alexa!”

The two tiniest woman of the roster, now being behemoths over the two front runners. Needless to say, neither of the specks wanted to be found. Alexa hated them, and Nikki was too insane to trust.

Up above, Alexa was smiling at her friend. Admittedly good friends. You might be surprised, considering Alexa has stabbed so many others in the back and... Nikki was one of them. Alexa grew to like her though, and found her a good friend.

She hasn’t done the backstab, and she wasn’t planning on it. She liked Nikki Cross.

Although she was more curious with the ring, cause she found something. “Boots?”

The booming voice said that, and both Becky and Charlotte ran, leaving the homes and running to either sides of the ring. This was because when the fingers came in, they were like god sent pillars from the sky. They were unreal, and left them so shocked and so amazed. Alexa raised the small toy boots as Charlotte could barely believe it. They were like houses to the specks, but Alexa could fit it on her little finger.

“What are boots doing there?”

“Who cares! Let’s play!” Nikki boomed next to her shaking her friend around.

“Uh... we would, we don’t have any action figures.” Alexa said with a massive smile on her face. “I imagine it’s some fans toy they left here.” She said looking in, not seeing the specks but an empty ring.

“We don’t toys! We can just do it with our hands!” Nikki said excitedly. Bringing her hands down to the ring.

Of course, Right on Becky’s side. Becky dropped down and cowered as the hand came down and two fingers stabbed down near the turnbuckle she was under. She looked at the giant hand that was above her, seeing it standing on the two middle fingers, with two fingers raising up. Her thumb tucked away. “We can do it with our hands!”

Alexa looked right to Nikki, before shrugging. “Sure, okay.” She said simply, letting this happen as she brought her hand down. Almost squishing Charlotte unawarely under her finger. Something that left her so stunned and scared.

With a smile, they both started to play and mess around in the ring. Nikki dragging Alexa down to her level of immatureness with the game. They started play wrestling, throwing their hands around and landing it down. She could not hold the happiness as they pretend tossed, pretend punched and even more.

Alexa tackled Nikki’s hand as she giggled, moving her hand and getting onto the top turnbuckle above Charlotte. “Top rope!” She said as she made it jump and fall onto the other hand, a giggle coming from both of the girls.

If it was anyone but Nikki, she wouldn’t be caught dead doing this. Luckily for Charlotte, they went away from her corner, the tiny blonde scared beyond belief at the altercation.

For Becky, it was even worse. Nikki grabbed Alexa’s hand and tossed her around. Tossing her around and making Alexa’s hand sit in the corner.

“Stomps!” She giggled, bringing her hands down and tapped the other hand, pretending kicks. Becky, who was down below, right between Alexa’s laying knuckle was scared. Frightened even, as she was praying that Alexa won’t shift her hand around and end her life.

Eventually they pulled back, and Nikki used her hand to pin down Alexa’s. A smile on her face as she counts. “1, 2, 3! I win!” She cheered, as she lifted her giant hand as she wore a massive smile on her face seeing this. She relaxed for a long while as Alexa followed.

“You win Nikki.” She said with a massive smile, not even mad she lost. After all it was just a game, and it was Nikki. She could not help but wear a smile on her face.

Becky and Charlotte down below were praying that they would leave, but what happens next?
15513212131.title: Giant Bliss & Cross

choices: She agrees to join Paige’s division (normal size)
She doesn’t want to join (Her and Nikki Shrunk)
She’s still not sure (one of thee shrinks one stays the same size)
155132121313.content:
Things had gotten even worse for the speck sized duo of Charlotte and Becky. They had been left alone in the toy ring with into themselves and Charlotte’s massive boots for company.

No they had some more company. Some much bigger company. Their ring had been discovered by two people they wish hadn’t. Alexa Bliss And Nikki Cross.

For the at few minutes Charlotte and Becky were at the mercy of these unaware titans. They had been using their fingers to play Wrestle, which was innocent enough for them. Less so for the tiny occupants of the ring.

They had been hiding and trying to avoid the massive fingers that could wipe them off the face of this earth in an instant. Both women were terrified as they had to dodge the perfectly manicured fingers of Alexa and the rough dangerous fingers of the unpredictable Nikki!

This went on for some time until finally Nikki won the match. Accepting her defeat with a smile, Alexa hugged her her best friend and congratulated her.

“Way to go Nikki! You got me there!” Alexa said happily.

Nikki reciprocate by hugging her friend tightly as she bounced up and down like a maniac. They were an odd duo but it Strangely worked.

With their fun done Alexa glanced back at the ring, still curious as to why this toy ring and cardboard stadium was set up. Shrugging it off she then picked up the toy sized boots she had found Earlier. They were clearly meant for a toy but they seemed a lot smaller than the usual action figures. They also seemed vaguely familiar. She could’ve sworn they belonged to someone she had wrestled before. But who?

Before she could think any more about the boots, she was interrupted by her bestie Nikki.

“C’mon Lexi lets go! We have to get ready for our match!” Nikki said enthusiastically.

“Hmmm? Oh yeah let’s go...” Alexa answered as she lost her train of thought.

No longer interested in the tiny Boots, Alexa absentmindedly tossed the back into the ring where they bounced off the canvas and flew to either side of the ring...right where the recovering specks were.

Becky and Charlotte both screamed as the massive house sized boots flew towards them. Both women had to dive out of the way as the boots landed with a thunderous crash. The impact sending vibrations across the whole ring.

Charlotte and Becky both backed away from the huge boots with fear across their faces. They could be crushed by something as simple as ring gear. What does that say about how small they actually they are.

Now with their match over Alexa and Nikki turned to leave and go and get ready for their big tag match against the kabuki warriors later on. However they found their way blocked by someone unexpected.

Standing there in full business attire holding a small black purse was none other than Paige! The English vixen smiled widely as she eyed the two smaller women.

Alexa and Nikki were surprised to see Paige here. Ever since her tag team ditched her as a manager she had been behind the scenes being the worst host on various wwe backstage shows. However even though Alexa was a lot nicer, she still had that same old Bliss attitude.

“Can we help you Paige? Because if not we have a match to her ready for tonight so...” Alexa said cockily.

Paige smiled wider as she walked right up the the duo. She looked down at the much smaller with a smile. Now Paige was fairly tall for a woman at 5”8. But with her heels on her was 5”11 easily and towered over Bliss and Cross by a good 10 inches.

“Why yes Alexa I would love your hero if you’re offering it!” Paige said brightly.

Alexa and Nikki shared a quick confused look as they turned their attention back to the taller woman.

“You see I’ve started a new division here in wwe. And frankly I’d say you two are perfect for it. Only question is. What role you two would play.” Paige said as she tapped her chin.

Alexa and Nikki were confused by what Paige had said, new division? What the hell was she talking about?

“I haven’t heard anything about a new division, have you Nikki?” Alexa asked with a hint of skepticism.

Nikki shook her head in response, but at the same time she looked at Paige with intrigue, she clearly had some interest in whay Paige was saying.

“Well darlings it’s very new and highly confidential. Don’t worry I have the go ahead from the higher ups to do this.” Paige lied.

Alexa was still unsure but Nikki was eager. She loved the chance to do something new.

“Ooooh Alexa lets do it! We can have fun fun fun!” Nikki said as a giddy as a kid in a candy store.

Alexa was still unsure. Paige noticed this and discreetly reached into her purse and gripped a certain shrink ray in case she needed it.

After a few minutes Alexa made her decision. What did she decide?
155132121313.title: Paige’s Offer

choices: A tag match would be fun
She should shrink Alexa too, Nikki seems okay.
1551321213132.content:
As intriguing it was, the offer from Paige. Bliss felt something wrong with it, and knew she was not gonna try something like that. It was too vague, and Alexa simply didn’t trust Paige. The smirk on her face showed that was a good move.

“Thanks, but no thanks, come on Nikki.” Alexa said grabbing her friends hand and trying to lead her out of the way.

Nikki though, did have the mind of a child, so of course she was bored. “Come on Alexa! It could be fun! We will still be a team and stuff! Come on!”

“You should listen to Nikki, Alexa. Who knows what might happen if you don’t.” Paige said, a bit of a chipper voice. Something that tripped her up and left her confused.

“A-Are you threatening me!” Alexa said, a bit more aggressive about the whole situation. “We are leaving Nikki, come on!”

Seeing Alexa was a bit more on about it, Nikki listened and walked out. Leaving as Paige smiled.

“Big mistake,” She replied, moving her hands around and pulling the size gun. Before the two actually got out of the way, Paige fired.

It all happened in an instant, as Alexa found herself shrink down. Shrinking down as the world got bigger.

She blinked twice, seeing the giant world now. It was... massive!

“Wow!” Nikki said, at her side. Alexa turned and saw her friend, just as small as she was. Nikki was just as shocked, although their reactions would change later on.

“So... it was a threat!” A voice boomed to them. Alexa had a shiver down her back as Nikki looked confused. Both of them, saw the giant Paige smiling down at them. The girl was a tower to them, and it got them to back afraid.

“Y-You have got to be kidding me!” Alexa said backing up, afraid. She was small before, but now... she was doll sized.

“Nikki let’s go!” Alexa said, not liking the situation. It was not the smartest move, but she wanted to run. Run away as fast as she can, however Nikki wasn’t moving, just staring up. “Nikki! What are you doing?”

Paige didn’t waste any more time, as she walked her way forward and reached down. Reaching down towards the two and grabbing them. Nikki was easy enough, she wasn’t moving so Paige grabbed her.


Alexa tried to run away through the giant door, but Paige easily caught her as well. Having both wrapped around her fingers, their bodies touching each other.

She raised them up to her eye and looked at the two woman.

“Sorry, but I don’t take a no. You two are going to be in my division, if you like it or not. Now, time to take you to the ring.” She walked over and dropped her into the ring.

Dropping her down as they both land and roll around for a bit. In the ring, Alexa looked around. looking for anyway to escape, while Nikki just pointed up at the giant Paige.

Alexa looked as well, seeing her upper body being the entire view.

Looking around the room, the boots were more around her size now, she could wear them.

 “L-Let us go!” She shouted up loudly, very angry about it and screaming. She stomped her feet, but all it got was from a laugh.

“Please, like you are in any position. You two are staying in my division, with me. So be good, or else.”

Alexa took a step back at another threat. The last one was t shrink her, and she feels it’s the same here. Alexa wanted to swear, however Nikki spoke up.

“This is... so cool!!” Nikki said. Alexa looked to her friend, jumping around and giddy. “Look at her, she is so big. And we are so small! Hehehe...” She said hoping like a rabbit. Only Nikki could be excited about this situation.

“See, Nikki likes it Alexa, she’s being a good girl baby doll.”

Alexa just rolled her eyes and looked around, trying to figure out a way to get out. At her size, she might be able to climb over the walls with help from Nikki. Maybe when Paige leaves.

However, she paused for a while as she looked at the boot in the corner. Her eyes go wide as she pieces it together. They weren’t the first wrestlers Paige has shrunk.

Walking over Paige talked to Nikki as she grabbed the boot, lifting it up. When she did, she saw the small woman who has been hiding behind it.

“No, fucking, way. Charlotte?” Alexa asked, her mouth open as she looked down at the queen. She was the size to her, that Alexa was the size of Paige! She covered her mouth, very shocked about it. “Holy shit.”

“Alexa! Look what I found!” Nikki said running over. Alexa looked away from Charlotte for a second, to see her friend holding Becky Lynch!

Her grip rough around her as the orange haired girl tried to break free. “Let go off me!”

“Look at her, she’s even smaller then us! Is that Charlotte? Ohh!!!” She cheered coming down. Charlotte screamed as Nikki grabbed her with the other hand, having both woman. Alexa stood up, dropping the boot.

The two strongest members in the whole woman’s division, being nothing but a plaything. It left her speechless.

“So you have found your competition.” Paige said from above with a laugh, seeing the altercation in the corner. “See, you two aren’t alone. You have friends, or opponents.” Paige said with a giggle.

Clearly, Alexa was in shit. She didn’t even feel like taking advantage of Becky and Charlotte, she just wanted to escape. The small woman rubbed her forehead thinking about it, while Nikki was comparing the small Becky Lynch in her hand, to the giant Paige in the sky. She has taken a liking to this situation more then the other three.

“Now, what am I gonna do? I got four? Hm...” Paige said putting her manicured finger to her chin. Until she ultimately decides ____________
1551321213132.title: Down Goes Bliss & Cross

choices: It’s a no contest (Paige decides who to shrink)
15513212131321.content:
Paige had exerted her dominance once more. She had used her prized size gun to shrink herself a couple of new participants for her new shrunken women’s division.

The duo of Alexa Bliss and Nikki Cross we’re now hers to do whatever she wanted with. Although it didn’t have to be this way. She had offered them the choice to join her willingly. If they had accepted they would have kept their size...or at the very least be returned to full size once filming was done.

Now the tiny tag team were shrunken to only 3 inches tall and at the mercy of the giantess Paige. They weren’t alone as Nikki had between her massive hands the even tinier near speck sized Charlotte and Becky.

“Oooooh Lexi they’re both so small! And she’s so big!” Nikki said joyfully as she held the tiny women in one hand and pointed up to the giantess Paige with the other.

Paige was glad one of her shrunken wrestlers saw the bright side to this. Even if it was the slightly crazed Scottish Nikki. Nonetheless now she had 4 women in her division. Not enough by a long way but a good start.

“Ok darlings since I have four of you now, I think this is the perfect time to have our first ever Tag team match!” Paige said smiling.

Alexa looked from Nikki to Paige with a confused look on her face. She couldn’t be serious right? There was no referee for starters and then there was the problem that was Charlotte and Becky were tiny compared to them!

Still Alexa didn’t want to her on this crazed giantesses bad side. So she faked a smile and looked up at Paige.

“Erm yeah that sounds great Paige...but I don’t think it’s gonna be much of a match haha” Alexa giggled nervously.

At this Charlotte and Becky gulped as the realized the stood no chance against Bliss and Cross when they were literal giants compared to them. Worse was they were already in Nikki’s grasp, made evident when the Scottish woman lifted them up to her huge smiling face.

“Ooooh we get to play together! Nikki gets to fight the tinies!” She said in a sing song way.

Luckily for Charlotte and Becky, Paige also noticed this problem and as such found the need to intervene.

“Nikki darling do me a favor and put these two down on the ground please” Paige said nicely.

Nikki looked up at the giantess then to Alexa who nodded at her. Slightly disappointed Nikki obeyed and placed Charlotte and Becky on the ground who immediately scampered away from the giant scot, clearly terrified for what the whack job could do to them.


Paige laughed as she saw the tiny specks running away form a 3 inch tall woman.

“Haha. Ok ok. I need to make this fair so I guess I’ll unshrink those two...for now!” Paige cackled maniacally.

With that she pointed her size ray at the barely visible specks and fired. Within seconds the two women grew until they were their previous size of only 3 inches tall.

“Thank Fuck. I thought I was gonna be a speck forever!” Becky exclaimed in relief.

Charlotte was also relieved to be back to a bigger size. Although she wished that Becky was still shrunk so that she could torture her some more. However she was still content with beating up a Alexa and Nikki. Those two shorty’s were no match for her. Well normally...

Turning around Charlotte was ready to look done and intimidate her much shorter opponents. Only when she turned she wasn’t looking down at them...she was looking up.

Charlotte was shocked to see that she only came up to just above Alexa and Nikki’s boobs! Stepping back she watched as Nikki giggled and leaned forward so she was eye level with her.

“Ooooh look tall Charlotte is not so tall any more!” Nikki giggled.

Alexa was also happy to see the usual tall and mighty Charlotte looking up to her. Alexa always thought she was better her but her height advantage always helped her out. Not anymore. Now Charlotte was the small one and Alexa was the big one.

Becky meanwhile also noticed that Alexa and nikki were bigger than her, but was glad had their attention focused on Charlotte. Suddenly the women were interrupted by a loud booming cackle coming from behind. Turning they all looked up to see the seemingly forgotten giantess Paige smiling down on them.

“Well as you ladies at have noticed, Charlotte and Becky area bit smaller than Alexa and Nikki. Since Charlotte and Becky are so good I thought they’d have no problem swapping heights with heir opponents!”

Alexa and Nikki smiled at each other. Now that they’re bigger they’ll have no problem beating the smaller ones. Charlotte and Becky however had a bigger problem than their opponents. They hated each other and wanted nothing to do with the other. Especially tagging. However they’d need to reconsider this as Paige once more interrupted.

“Oh and ladies one more thing. Whoever gets pinned or taps out in this match. Well they’ll wish they hadn’t since thyell be shrunken even smaller on the spot!” Paige said happily.

The mood in the ring suddenly changed as now there were consequences to losing. Becky and Alexa absolutely didn’t want to shrink smaller whereas Nikki didn’t care she could make do at any size, it was all a game to her. However Charlotte was considering something sneaky. Paige said whoever was pinned would be shrunk not the team, so if she wanted to she could screw Becky over!

“Get to your corners ladies the match is about to begin!” Paige announced.

Each team went to their neutral corner as Paige began to record on her phone.

“DING-DING!!!”

With that the match began. What was the result?
15513212131321.title: Tiny Tag Team Match

choices: Twisted Bliss On Becky (But Paige is very disappointed in Charlotte. Uh oh.)
155132121313211.content:
Paige was setting everything up for the next match in her division. The tag team of Charlotte and Becky Lynch, vs Alexa Bliss and Nikki Cross. With a little height fun thrown in. The loser, the one who gets pinned or submits shrinks, and is at the mercy of the other three.

As she set up the camera, making sure she was on the hard can, looking over the small ring and the small woman. All at their corners and ready.

She sounded her bell, and the woman began. Paige began commentary, but they all ignored it, knowing that they would lose if they focused on the giant voice above.

Charlotte on one side, and Alexa was on the other. Getting closer, it was true that this was such a reversal. Normally Charlotte towers over Alexa, but not this time.

Seeing the once mighty blonde smaller then her in the ring, gave Bliss more confidence. She doesn’t like matching strength, but here... she might win.

For Charlotte, who tried to play it more cautious, acted on instinct as Alexa stepped in. Locking a Collar & Elbow tie up. They both grip each other as Charlotte tried to push her back, only to find that she could not.

Alexa, amazed at this acted quick. Dragging Charlotte down face first in the mat. Stepping back as she looked over herself.

“So this is the handicap you have every match? Neat.” She said simply. Now the Queen was talented, but it was her size and her strength which made her the top of her division. Getting up Charlotte went to take down the legs, but Alexa was quicker.

Relying on her speed more in the ring, she was more prepared as she grabbed Charlotte, holding her in a DDT position. Charlotte tried to fight out, finding that she couldn’t. With a big laugh she drove Charlotte down into the mat. Turning her around and going for the pin.

“One! Two! T- Oh! Charlotte kicks out!” Paige announced as that was what happened. Grabbing her head, she proceeded to dominate her in the ring more. Tossing her across the ropes and hitting a clothesline. A suplex and more. She wasn’t use to the being the big one. Eventually she tossed her to Nikki and tagged her in.

“I wanna play! I wanna play!”

“Okay, you’re playing.” Alexa said with a laugh as she watched Nikki pretty much drag her to the corner. Charlotte tried to get in, but Nikki was attacking her. With punches, kicks, elbows and more.

This happened so much that the blonde was out of it, even more then before. Nikki gave her a suplex out as she gave a loud laugh. Clearly she was having fun.

“Do something!” Becky shouted to the blonde as Charlotte made her way out.

“Shut up!” She shouted, angrily at Becky as she saw the giant Scottish woman coming. Standing to her full height, which was still shorter then Nikki.

Charlotte did what she can rely on, moving her arm and slapping her hand right on Nikki’s chest. This move, at the very least is a good way to space her away from pressure.

“Hehe! You are so weak! Hehe!” Nikki said, having no effect on it. Charlotte wearing a horrified face. “My turn!”

Nikki then dragged her hand back and went to hit, letting Charlotte dodge. Moving to the turnbuckle. She waited for a long while, until Nikki came running.

With the right time she leaped out of the way, and Nikki went collar first to the turnbuckle. Smiling Charlotte looked to Becky, who had her hands out.

It was a race now, as both woman tried to reach for their partners, and oddly enough getting it at the same time!

Alexa and Becky was now in, and unlikeCharlotte, her partner didn’t rely on strength, she had fire.

Even though she was smaller, Alexa would not be able to tell the difference, getting knocked down by Becky, again and again. Then amazingly, Becky grabbed Alexa’s leg, and raised it, throwing her over for a suplex!”

Alexa landed, amazed at how good she was. Becky walked in, but Alexa was quick, kicking her in the gut, a more effective kick this time.

She went to suplex her, but could not as Becky grabbed her leg, and gave it a dragon whip. Sending Alexa down. She jumped on.

“On-” Not even a one count until Alexa tossed her off, although that didn’t mean Becky was gonna stop. Running to the ropes, she sent a missile dropkick right to Alexa, the blonde laying down feeling the hit hard.

“Alexa!” Nikki said running in, Becky switched targets, walking back as Nikki ran to her, Alexa rolling away.

Nikki ran in with no fear, which let Becky not only dodge, but trip her up. Nikki falling down onto the ground as Becky was on top of her back.
 Grabbing her arm, and bending it in a way it should not do.

“Ahhh!” She screamed as Becky pulled more, then she really should of.

“See Charlotte, this is how a real champion does it!” Becky yelled, feeling proud that she was about to win. Alexa was gone, Nikki was down. This Scottish woman has tapped to it before, and Becky didn’t care about the size, she was going to tap into it again.

Lifting her hand, she really thought about it, and Charlotte saw this.

More importantly, she saw her chance. Making her way behind Becky into the ring.

It was an ode to Summerslam 2018, as Charlotte ran and pulled off a Natural Selection to Becky Lynch, sending the Irish woman down as they were off Nikki.

“Oh! And Charlotte just turned on her teammate!” Paige yelled from above. “What a shock!”

Nikki went to the corner as Alexa watched as well, shocked. Charlotte shifted her around onto her back, making her way.

“Alexa! Twisted Bliss! Now!” Charlotte said with a smirk, knowing who’s about to get smaller.

What choice does Alexa make?
155132121313211.title: Becky And Charlotte On The Short End

choices: Leave them but get another women to Watch over them
1551321213132113.content:
Despite all odds Becky Lynch was beating her taller opponents Alexa Bliss and Nikki Cross. She was only boob level to these women but that wouldn’t stop her! She was straight fire, she was relentlass and most importantly. She was the man.

Now she had subdued Alexa and currently had Nikki Cross in the dis-arm-her. It would only be a matter of time until the Scottish psycho tapped out. Unfortunately someone else had other plans.

Out of nowhere Charlotte nailed natural selection on Becky! The blond vixen had once again cost Becky glory and she was about to cost her a hell of a lot more!

Above the sat the giantess Paige who remained professional since she was on camera and played up the betrayal like a normal commentator would.

“Oh and Charlotte just turned on her teammate! What a shock!” Paige yelled.

Even though she sounded shocked, on the inside she was very disappointed in what Charlotte had just done.

Smirking Charlotte rolled out of the ring leaving Becky at the mercy of the much taller opponents. But not before putting Becky in prime position for a twisted bliss.

“Alexa! Twisted Bliss! Now!” Charlotte shouted as she left the ring.

Alexa looked at Charlotte to the fallen man. She hated that Charlotte had basically handed her a win but she wasn’t about to throw away her height by being honorable.

Scaling the ropes she looked down at the near unconscious Becky and sighed. She had to do this. And with that she flew through the air and nailed a huge twisted bliss!

“Twisted bliss by Alexa! Could this be it!” Paige yelled excitedly.

Alexa Hooked Becky’s leg and covered her for the pin. The fingers brought her massive manicured finger down and tapped the floor for the pin.

“One...two...three!!! It’s over! Here are your winners!!! The team of Alexa Bliss and Nikki Cross!!!” Paige shouted enthusiastically.

Alexa stood up as Nikki ran back in the ring and hugged her best friend. Meanwhile on the outside Charlotte smirked evilly as she knew that Becky was about to become a lot smaller!

With the match over Paige have her closing speech and signed off. Turning her camera off Paige looked down at her shrunken division. Alexa and Nikki were still celebrating whilst. Becky was beginning to stir, it was clear by the look on her face the reality was sinking in. She was gonna be shrank again.

Meanwhile Charlotte had slid back into the ring and was standing on one of the corner leaning against the turnbuckle with a smile on her face. Paige noticed this and made a mental note to take care of her her after she shrinks Becky.

Nikki was jumping all around the ring, giddy with excitement that she had won another match!

“Yay we won we won! Becky’s gonna shrink! Becky’s gonna shrink!” She sang as passed by Becky.

Lynch was furious at this and stood up looking around she finally spotted Charlotte in the corner laughing at her.

“YOU BITCH!” Becky screamed.

Not caring about any consequences Becky ran at full speed towards Charlotte who was too slow to react. Becky clocked her right on the jaw as she Rained down on her with a flurry of punches.

This went on for a good 30 seconds as Alexa and Nikki watched uncaring.

“Haha look at the little shrimps go. Yano I’ll be glad to see Becky get smaller, she still has a lot of fight in her!” Alexa admitted.

After a few more seconds Paige finally intervened and plucked the the tiny man between her fingers and dropped her back in the middle of the ring.

“Ok that’s enough. Do that again and I’ll have to squish you Becky.” Paige said coldly.

Becky froze as she was about to run back and attack Charlotte again. However the threat of being squished like a bug quickly changed the mans attitude. She quietly stood still looking at the ground, clearly defeated.

Satisfied Paige clapped her hands together as she reached down and picked up she size gun.

“That was a great match ladies! Congratulations Alexa and Nikki you won an therefore will get to remain at your current size!” Paige said happily.


Alexa and Nikki sighed a breathe of relief as they wouldn’t be getting any smaller at the moment.

“However with winners comes a loser. And Becky darling I’m sorry but since you were pinned you are the one who will be shrunk so...”

With that Paige pointed her gun at Becky and pulled the trigger. A beam struck Becky as she Quickly shrank down until she was even smaller than before. When she was done she was only an inch tall.

Alexa and Nikki were stunned to see the man now only an inch tall. In comparison she only came up to the 3 inch tall women’s knees. Charlotte meanwhile was laughing at Becky’s predicament. She walked over to Becky ready to assert her newly gained height advantage. However Paige had other plans for the queen.

“And then there’s You Charlotte. You hunk it’s funny turning on your partner to make sure she’s the one shrunken? Bet it smells you fell real big doesn’t it?” Paige said with an angrier tone then before.

Charlotte felt nervous as she slowly tried to back away from the giantess, but it was no use as Paige placed a giant finger behind her and pushed her forward.

“Lucky for you though I'm a woman of my word. You won’t be shrunken for for losing there Match.” Paige said.

Charlotte smiled weakly although it would only last a moment.

“No I’m just gonna shrink you because I feel like it!” Paige boomed maliciously.

Before she had time to react Paige fired her size gun at her and watched as the queen was cut down to size. Charlotte shrank smaller and smaller. Finally it came to and end. To her horror though she was staring at a giant boot...belonging to Becky!

The queen was now an inch tall compared to an inch tall woman! Becky was elated as she couldn’t wait to get her payback. Even Alexa and Nikki were curious to see what would happen to the tiny queen who they could crush without a second thought.

Satisfied Paige put her size gun back into her purse. Standing up she turned her attention back to the tiny women.

“There let that be a lesson. Never break my rules. Now we’re all done for today...now want to do with you...” Paige pondered whilst tapping her chin with her manicured finger.

In the end Paige decided to...
1551321213132113.title: Paige’s Little Rule Change

choices: A woman in a Backstage position (Your Choice)
A Woman from the Past perhaps visiting (Your Choice)
15513212131321133.content:
Paige gave this some thought, some real thought. She can’t leave them by themselves, they are probably hungry and probably will try to escape. Shrink them to specks again, but she has already done the size fun and she plans to leave them like that for the rest of the night.

She could take them hope, but that would mean she would have to care for them, and make sure they don’t run and... well that just sounds annoying for Paige.

So there is only one choice for her. Getting up she smiled down to them. “Well ladies, I am going for a little bit, don’t try to kill each other.” She sung as she walked out, closing the door behind her as she plans to get someone. Someone to watch over them tonight.

For all the girls, they saw the giant vixen leave, and Alexa knew this was her chance. Grabbing Nikki’s hand she went to drag her out of the ring and to the walls. “Come on, we are getting out of here.”

“What! No Lexi,” Nikki said with a smile. “I wanna see!”

Alexa would question what, but she was seeing what as Becky was trying to stomp down on Charlotte. No remorse, as she was trying to kill her.
 The mini Charlotte was running around the ground, trying to dodge the foot as Becky laughed. It was like a tiny child stomping on an ant.

“I wanna see what she is gonna do!”

“Nikki! This is our only chance to escape! Come on!” Alexa said dragging her as Nikki looked confused.

“Leave? Why do you want to leave?” Nikki questioned. “This is cool! Everything is so big, plus they are so small!”

Alexa looked at her, as Nikki giggled. Why did she have to be so... Nikki.

“I’m coming! Rawh!” She laughed as she ran to Becky and Charlotte. Becky jumped back as Nikki scooped her up. Grabbing her and lifting her up, holding her away. “Little Becky! Becky... baby! Becky Baby!”

“I’m not a god damn baby!” She shouted as Alexa just ignored her.

As one of the big ones, as well as the sane one she was gonna take charge.

Moving over and getting down on her knee, she scanned the ground for Charlotte. Eventually she saw the blonde bug and... well she was smaller then a bug. It was really something. Alexa can just imagine the sight she was.

Regardless she brought her hand down and held it onto the back. “Charlotte, get on.” She said down to the blonde. Whether she was saying something or not, Alexa didn’t know. She wasn’t moving, so she made it better. “It’s either on my hand, or under Becky’s boot.”

This got the minuscule girl moving, as she walked over and climbed Alexa’s hand. Standing there as she lifted it up. The rise up being hell for Charlotte, but of course she did not notice.

Alexa stood up as she faced the other two, Becky still being toyed.

“Let me go damn it! Let me go!” Becky said trying to fight her way out.

“Nikki, let her go.” She said as Nikki did just that, opening her hands and letting her fall down. It was a long fall, but she didn’t take much time to try and find Charlotte, revenge on her mind.

Eventually she saw the towering Alexa holding something, and she of course got up. “You have Charlotte! Give her to me!”

“How cute, it’s like a child ordering around their teacher.” Alexa teased as Becky was irate. As good as it is to see Charlotte small and bug sized, it’s also good seeing Becky small as well. She has had more of a history with this woman.

“Shut up! Give her to me! I need to get that bitch back! You have no idea what she did to me!”

“Oh, I wanna know!” Nikki said getting on her knees next to Becky. “Tell me! Tell me!”

“She tortured me all night! She stuffed me away in her boot while she wore it! She stomped my life out! I need to get her back!”

“For fuck’s sake.” Alexa said putting her other hand. She was planning on getting everyone rallied together, but clearly this wasn’t going to work, not with these two.

“Give it!”

“Nikki, hold her.” Becky said as Nikki didn’t need to get told twice. Moving and grabbing her in a hug.

“Hey!”

“Listen,” Alexa announced. “Only way we are getting out of here, is by working together! You two might hate each other, but I hope you hate this situation more. So we are going to work together. I know it’s hard for you two, but we need to.”

“Bu-”

“Nikki, once we get away, we can get the size gun, you can be any height you want.” Alexa said to her friend.

“Oh! I like that!” She said, as Alexa also had some motives there.

“Good, we are on board. I can’t talk to Charlotte Speck here, but i’m assuming she’s on board for protection. Becky?”

Alexa felt a glare. “So what? I don’t get to do anything to Charlotte!”

What can Alexa say? Yes, she makes an enemy of Charlotte. No, she makes an enemy of Becky. She was going in the middle.

“Okay, when the two of you are around the same size, you can kick the shit out of her for five minutes straight. No resistance.” It was better then what might happen.

“We can even help you!” Nikki said with a laugh as Alexa rolled her eyes.

“Fine.” Becky said.

“I’m back!!!” A voice rang, very loudly, known as Paige. “And I found a woman to look after you. She is... really excited!”

“Don’t mention this talk to her.” Alexa commanded, believing the height put her in command. She turned and saw the giant Paige looking down at them, feeling bad for speck Charlotte. That size would be hell.

Paige walked up, and then the caretaker walked up to them. Towering just like Paige and smiling down.

It was ______________
15513212131321133.title: Alexa Getting The Team Together

155132121313211335.content:
Alexa was trying her best to rally the troops so to speak. Being only 3 inches tall hadn’t hindered her leadership skills in the slightest. She had Nikki on her side no questions asked, accept she was being...well Nikki, right now she was obsessed with everything size related.

The Scottish Woman seemed to like being small at 3 inches tall, whilst liking people smaller than her...whilst liking someone being giant to her. She was a very odd woman.

Alexa had also managed to convince the 1 inch tall Becky to help them to try and escape later. She did however have to promise Becky an hour alone with Charlotte later on once she was a more appropriate size.

The queen meanwhile was extremely tiny. She was an inch tall compared to the one inch tall Becky making her bug sized, almost speck sized. Right now she was being held in the massive palm of the giant Alexa. This was extremely humiliating yet humbling for the tiny queen.

However if she did manage to get her hands on that size gun, she wouldn’t hesitate to shrink every last woman in this room...speaking of women in the room.

The giantess Paige had returned and she wasn’t alone. Stomping over to the cardboard arena, Paige smiled down at her tiny women’s division. Well three of them she couldn’t see Charlotte in Alexa’s hand.

“Hello my little darlings, thank you for waiting. Now I’m going to have to leave you until tomorrow but I’ve good news! I ran into someone who is more than happy to spend the night looking after you all!” Paige said smiling.

With that Paige lifted her hand and gestured to the giantess next to her. Just like Paige she towered over the other women, except this woman was actually taller than Paige!

Standing above them was someone the women hadn’t seen on wwe television in years. It was 2004 wwe babe of the year Stacy Kiebler! https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/c...

Now Stacy was considered one of the most beautiful and sexy women in all of wwe back in the day, but she had barely aged a day and looked exactly the same as she did in 2005! Now Stacy has rather small breasts but what she lacked there she made up for with her incredibly long sext legs! These 41 inch pins stretched for miles and led to a fantastic ass!

Also she was one of the tallest women in wwe. At 5”11 barefoot she was the same height as Paige in 3 inch heels. But Stacy also had heels on, a pair of black 4 inch ones making her a mighty 6”3! The tiny women in the box gulped as they looked up at their new towering caretaker.

“Holy shit! You weren’t kidding Paige they are tiny! Man they're even tinier than that girl you shrank before!” Stacy said intrigued.

Alexa and Becky looked at each other with worry, so Paige had shrunk some other poor helpless superstar. But who? The English diva simply laughed at this comment form Stacy.

“Haha yes Stacy see I had a little problem. If they were too big they could escape so I made them all this small so they couldn’t. Oh and there should be another somewhere...Becky where’s Charlotte? You didn’t crush her did you?” Paige asked with a tone of annoyance in her voice.

Becky froze as the English giantess leaned her face in the arena, she could see the anger beginning to rise on her face. Luckily for Becky Alexa needed her so she spoke up.

As Liv Morgan disappeared into the bathroom next to the locker room, Alexa knew it was time to act. Whilst Liv was occupied Alexa took out the salad from her bag and laid it out neatly on the locker room bench.

With that done she then put the next part of her plan into motion. She grabbed her shrink ray and quickly peaked out of the locker room. Almost like it was destiny standing right outside were the people she wanted to see. Ruby Riott and Sarah Logan.

Oh this was just perfect, the very two women she wanted to shrink were right in front of her. Playing it cool Alexa acted surprised and invited them into the locker room.

“Oh hey girls! Wow this is great timing you were just the girls I needed to see!” Alexa exclaimed in surprise.

The two other former riott squad members looked her up and down indifferently.

“Yeah and?” Ruby said dryly.

“Yeah what do you want Alexa?” Sarah Logan asked.

Alexa knew exactly how she was going to play this. Smiling like an innocent school girl Alexa spilled her guts out.

“Well since you guys are such good friends of Liv I though you should be here when I give her a big surprise!” Alexa replied.

The other two women were suspicious but since they loved Liv they believed Alexa and headed into the locker room.

Walking to the center of the room 2/3rds of the riott Squad Looked around curiously.

“So what’s this bug surprise then?” Ruby asked.

“Yeah and where’s Liv?” Sarah added.

“Well it’s actually more of s little surprise...and it happens to be you two!” Alexa said devilishly.

Before the other two could react Alexa aimed the shrink ray at the two and fired. In an instant the two shrunk down until they were ant sized.

Clapping her hands in excitement Alexa made her way over to the two. On the floor Ruby and Sarah screamed as the gigantic boots of Alexa stomped towards them. Each footstep feeling like a 6.8 earthquake!

Alexa stopped and looked down at the two any sized women and laughed as Ruby and Sarah held eachother. They couldn’t believe what had happened as they were covered by Alexa’s immense shadow.

Things got worse as Alexa reached down to pick the duo up. They screwed again as her massive hand scooped them up and closed, enveloping them in the darkness and warmth of Alexa’s hand.

Walking over to the salad bowl, Alexa dropped the two tiny Riott squad members into it. She even made sure to toss the salad so they couldn’t be seen by Liv.

Satisfied Alexa went and sat on a chair next to the salad and pretended to text on her phone.

The door next to her opened and in walked Liv. She had just applied a fresh coat of makeup and looked stunning. Liv then noticed the salad on the bench and walked over to start her meal.

“Aww Thanks Alexa you’re the best!” Liv said happily picking up the salad bowl.

Alexa simply smiled and pretended to go back to texting, when in fact she was actually keeping a close eye on Liv’s meal.

Meanwhile inside the salad Ruby and Sarah were gathering their bearings when the huge face of their best friend Liv Morgan took up Their entire sky! The two tried to scream to get her attention but it was no use as Liv only had eyes and ears for her meal.

Liv then stabbed a few leaves of lettuce and cherry tomato. Unfortunately Sarah Logan was caught in the middle of the leaves. Liv opened her mouth in anticipation as Sarah Logan screamed her least words.

“NO LIV!!! PLEASE DONT EAT ME!!!!” Sarah screamed.

That was all she could say before she was shoved into the black dark abyss of Livs mouth. Within seconds she was chewed up and swallowed.

Alexa grinned as she knew that Ruby must be beside herself in fear at what was to befall her.

She didn’t have to wait long as Liv scooped up a lettuce leaf and a piece of cucumber which Ruby was stuck to. The leader of the Riott Squad didn’t scream or beg or cry. She just quietly accepted her fate.

However as she was heading for Liv’s mouth she looked over at Alexa. To her shock Alexa could actually see her about to be eaten. The last thing Ruby saw was Alexa mouthing the words “bye bye” before she was deposited onto Liv’s bright blue outstretched tongue.

Liv retracted her tongue as she chewed up her salad. Sadly for Ruby she avoided very single tooth in Liv’s mouth and was swallowed whole. Doomed to spend the rest of her short life digesting in her stomach.

Liv finished the salad and let out a quiet burp that she giggled at. She then thanked Alexa again before sitting back and rubbing her stomach.

Alexa was amazed at what she just saw, she had just seen a woman eat her own best friends without even knowing about it!

Now Alexa had had such a good time watching Liv eating people that she was considering letting her in on her shrinking spree, then again she could just shrink more people for liv to eat unbeknownst to her. Or she could just shrink her and eat her herself.

The options were all good ones but which one did Liv go for?
155333112111111231322.title: Riott Squad Reunited

1553331121111112313222.content:
Alexa Bliss was on a power high. She had just used her shrink ray to make Sarah Logan and ruby riott ant sized. But that wasn’t even the best part, she had taken these little pests and used them as garnish for a little salad she was preparing.

Alexa had watched with sadistic glee as the two tiny women were eaten alive by their former best friend Liv Morgan! And best of all she had no idea that she had rendered Sarah to a pink paste by chewing her like a salad leaf, and worse that she had simply swallowed ruby whole, leaving the tiny riott squad leader to slowly digest in the pit of her stomach.

It was an incredible feeling watching these lives end so viscously ad Alexa decided right then and there that she wasn’t going to stop yet!

Just as Liv finished the last of her salad an idea came to Alexa’s mind. Smiling she walked over to her newfound friend and sat next to her giving her a friendly pat on the shoulder.

“Did you enjoy the salad liv?”

“Oh yes lexi thanks so much! But I gotta admit I’m still a little hungry, guess rabbit food isn’t all that filling haha!” Liv replied.

“Well in that case how about we go out to lunch? I looked a the schedule and we’re not even needed for tonight’s show, plus I’m owed a favor so why don’t we head out and stuff our faces?” Alexa replied with a devious smile.

Liv looked up at Alexa as a smile spread on her face. She was still very hungry even if she wouldn’t admit how much, and it would be nice to bond with Alexa a little bit more considering how nice she’s being.

“Ok lexi that sounds good! Where’d you have in mind?”

“Oh there’s this all you can eat Chinese place a few miles from here. It’s really good, I’m sure you’ll love it!” Alexa responded
happily.

Liv clapped her hands together and smiled showing her approval of the idea. Alexa then told her to get ready and meet her by her car in 10 minutes. The self proclaimed goddess then left the locker room in search of victims.

Turning the corner it didn’t take long as she found the women’s tag team champions Asuka and Kairi Sane chatting away in fluent Japanese.

Smiling she takes out her shrink ray and immediately shrinks them down to ant size. Stomping over she watches as the ant sized warriors scream and try to run from her towering Godzilla like form. Laughing she reaches down and carefully plucks them from the ground before depositing them in her empty salad pot.

Alexa then went and gathered even more for her all you can eat buffet! She shrank stage hands, production managers, office workers. You name it she shrank them. She had about 15 normal workers and 5 more wrestlers including Lana, Carmella, Naomi, Zelina Vega And Dana Brooke, them as well the kabuki warriors made a grand total of 22 shrunken snacks.


Alexa had even made them vary in size. Most where ant size but a few were even smaller specks whilst one or two were twice as big as ants so liv can really taste them as she chews them up!

With all her victims stored safely in her salad pot Alexa heads to her car and finds a waiting liv Morgan who’s now wearing a low cut pink top, a blue jacket and ripped jeans. Greeting her they get in Alexa’s Car and head to the all you chance eat Chinese restaurant.

15 minutes later

Pulling up to “Wong’s All You Can Eat” the two women happily head inside and get a private table away from regular customers. After ordering some drinks, Alexa offers to get both of them their first plate.

Alexa chooses some fresh fried dumplings and vegetable spring rolls to start with, that’s when she takes her chance to garnish the food worth some tiny people.

Who does she choose?

155333112111111231323.content:
Alexa watched in pure excitement as Liv got up to use the restroom. This woman had just swallowed dozens of her shrunken fans and was completely unaware of it. Alexa poured the rest of her salad into the bowl, and doused it in balsamic vinaigrette. Her mind was racing for what shrunken ingredient she should add to it; when an interesting thought crept into her mind. She had eaten some of the ant-sized people herself, and had been an “innocent” bystander watching tinies get eaten, but she hadn’t experienced what it was like to be shrunken first hand yet.

It began to occur to Alexa that this could be the thrill of a lifetime, witnessing a hungry, unaware giantess from a first person point of view. Her excitement was beginning to overtake her good judgment. Looking around and ensuring the coast was clear, Alexa climbed up onto the table and stood over the bowl. The woman then pointed the shrink ray at herself. “Well fuck, here we go,” she said, her voice quivering with excitement.

With a deep breath, Alexa pulled the trigger to the device. Instantly, Alexa felt like she was falling. She tried to scream but a high pitched, almost inaudible squeak cas out. Suddenly Alexa landed in what appeared to be a jungle, and rolled down a massive leave of lettuce, falling face first into a puddle of dressing.

“Ugh, what the hell,” Alexa said, spitting out dressing and pulling herself up to her feet. Her surroundings caused her jaw to drop. It was as if she was in some vegetarian wonderland. It was a tropical jungle where the plants and animals were replaced by veggies. Everything from lettuce leaves, to shredded carrots, to chopped cucumber surrounded her. “This is so cool,” the ant sized woman laughed to herself, as she broke off a small lettuce leaf and dipped it in the dressing that surrounded her.

The ground around Alexa began to shake. Looking up, her eyes widened. The titanic form of Liv Morgan had returned. “ALEXA?” the giant woman called out, seemingly confused as to where her friend had run off to.

“Well, at least this looks good,” Liv said to herself and took a seat in the chair. She licked her lips and pulled the bowl closer to her.

Alexa watched in amazement (and a little bit of fear) as Liv’s giant fork plunged into the bowl near her, and pulled out some spinach leaves and a cherry tomato. The food was then brought up to Liv’s cavernous mouth, where it disappeared and was crushed as she chewed and swallowed.

“Gotta be careful,” Alexa thought to herself. The last thing she wanted was to end up getting swallowed.

Wanting to prove her whereabouts to Liv later, Alexa whipped out her phone and snapped a picture of the giantess. She was glancing down, preparing to send it to Liv, when a peculiar shadow stretched over her body. Who was it?
