15533321.title: Dakota Kai

choices: Found Shayna in the performance center
Found Shayna escaping in her car
Couldn’t find Shayna but found her cronies
155333212.content:
It was another typical day in the performance center. The wrestlers were wrestling, the trainers were training and all was right in the world. This wasn’t a typical day for one person however. After nearly a 9 months off injured Dakota Kai was making her return to the ring tonight on NXT!

She had been training and rehabbing like crazy to get ring ready and now she was finally cleared to compete! Dakota was beyond excited, she had missed wrestling all this last year and now it was time for her to bounce back. Her torn ACL was a major setback but now it was her time.

The pride of New Zealand walked through the door to the locker room with a big smile on her face, within seconds that smile would vanish as she saw who was in the locker room. Standing talking right by her locker was none other than the NXT Women’s champion Shayna Baszler.

Dakota froze, she was terrified of Shayna as the mma specialist had made her life hell for a year before she got injured. Dakota had never stood up for herself so she was easy pickings for the champ. But if it wasn’t bad enough she was flanked by her fellow mma horsewomen, the supernova from Moldova Marina Shafir and the 6ft tall Jessamyn Duke!

Dakota as about to turn and leave but the horsewomen noticed her at the last so she had no choice but to walk it her locker with her head down. She just wanted to get changed and get out of there as soon as possible. But that would be too easy.

Sitting down she reached for her bag but Shayna has walked over and placed her foot on it. Dakota stopped pulling as Shayna looked down at her with her henchwomen on either side of her.

“Well look who it is guys. It’s little Dakota Kai! Awww what’s the matter do you want me to get off your bag?” Shayna asked in a condescending voice.

Dakota just sat silent for a moment before muttering a pathetic “Yes please...”

“Yes what?” Shayna said demandingly.

“Yes please...champ.” Dakota whimpered.

Shayna and her cronies began to laugh as Dakota just stood there and laughed at her. As this was going on a stage hand walked in with a package for Dakota. Before she could take it however Shayna had snatched it out of her hands.

“What’s this? Someone sending you fan mail? Nah can’t be you don’t have any fans loser!”

Everyone laughed again at poor Dakota’s expense. Shayna then dangled the package above her head and goaded Dakota to grab it before pulling it away at the last second. The heels the all passed the package around one another until Shayna took it and threw it in the showers. She then turned on the shower drenching the package in water.

Satisfied each woman took turns patting her on the head before they left and headed off on their way. Dakota was left alone in the locker room as a single tear rolled down her cheek. She walked into the shower and fished out her package.

Dakota left it to dry in the radiator as she got changed into her ring gear. 15 minutes later she picked up her package and opened it up. There were only two things inside the box. One was a letter and the other was bottle of a strange purple liquid.

Putting the bottle on the side Dakota read the letter. It was water damaged so she couldn’t make out everything.

Dear Dakota. I’m...gl.d you’re back! Bu..I think you need something to sh.w th.t you’re a force to be rec.oned with! Drink this m...c liquid and you’ll g.o. To new amazing he...ts! I hope you use this well. Your friend...

That was all Dakota could make out as she set it down and picked up the bottle. She opened it up and gave it sniff. It smelled of sweet lilacs. Now normally Dakota wouldn’t even consider drinking some strange liquid a fan had sent her. But today was bad enough all ready so how much worse could it actually be?

Shrugging her shoulders Dakota downs the entire contents of the bottle. It passed the first test, she didn’t go blind. Dakota then went to leave the room when something in her body felt weird. A strange tingling sensation swept throughout her entire body as Dakota started to regret drinking that stuff. Then it happened.

Out of nowhere Dakota’s entire body started to expand and grow! Her legs got longer, her arms for bigger, her ass and tits began to expand!

“What the Fuck is going on!” Dakota yelled as her growth continued.

Dakota kept growing as her head hit the ceiling with a dull thud as she collapsed to her knees so she had room. Unfortunately she ran out of this as she kept on growing and growing, Dakota even threw her arms up in a pathetic attempt to stop herself from busting through the walls!

To her horror she kept on growing as her head burst through the ceiling! She kept shooting up foot by foot until finally she found herself outside of the performance center looking down at the small fragile building!

Dakota looked over herself and was somewhat happy that her ring gear had grew with her. Comparing herself with the performance center she estimated she was around 200ft tall!

Dakota was scared and panicked but then something popped into her head, the memory of Shayna bullying her today. Getting angry her fists clenched before her anger turned into joy as she was delighted she now had a way to fight her bully’s!

Staring into the performance center through the hole she had made Dakota saw many of her fellow workers screaming and running away from her. Dakota was focused in finding Shayna and her friends.

After a few moments she...
155333212.title: Dakota’s Had Enough

choices: Put her somewhere on her body
1553332122.content:
Dakota Kai was now loving her new height! Thanks to some random growth liquid a so called friend had sent her she was now a whopping 200ft tall!

She looked at the now partially destroyed wwe performance center (thanks to her growth!) and was in the lookout for her bully, the NXT women’s champion Shayna Baszler. She peeked into the building and couldn’t spot Shayna amongst the fleeing people. Dakota started to lose hope but then out of the corner of her eyes she saw her.

Scrambling as fast as she could to her car, Shayna dived in and started the engine. She locked the doors as she prepared to leave. Her mma partners ran up and started banging on the windows begging Shayna to let them in. The champ wasn’t risking it as she just waved them away as she started to reverse at speed.

Jessemyn and Marina shouted and pleaded with Shayna as she simply spun the car away and drove off in a hurry. The two then shouted all sorts of profanity at their so called friend as she left them for dead. That’s when a massive tremor shook the ground the two were standing on causing them to fall flat on their asses.

The two rubbed their backsides and looked at the cause of the tremor. The twos Hearts dropped. It was Dakota having just stoooed over to their location. And she was smiling down evilly at them.

“Awww well what do we have here? What you guys don’t have anything mean to say to me? You wanna try and push me around? I’d like to see you try at this size haha!!!” Dakota boomed down.

Marina and Jessemyn grabbed each other for support and just sat frozen with fear staring up at the mighty giantess.

“What no answer? Didn’t think so, I’m so sick of being bullied and now I’m gonna get my revenge!” Dakota said coldly.

Without saying a word Dakota raised her massive foot and lifted above the crying duo who didn’t even have the guts to move. She then brought her foot down ending the mma chicks lives in an instant.

Dakota felt the crunch then squish under her foot, taking a look she saw the bloody remains of jessemyn and marina plastered to her sole. Smiling Dakota looks out to the distance and sees Shayna’s car speeding further and further away. With that Dakota took off after her prey.

Shayna meanwhile was driving as fast as she could away from the performance center. She was there when Dakota had suddenly busted through the ceiling and was towering over everything. She knew instantly she needed to her out of there. She had just bullied her not 15 minutes earlier so she was sure to be in her list of victims if she decided she wanted revenge.

Driving like a maniac she ran red lights, drove down the wrong side of the road and even caused other cars to swerve and crash. She didn’t care though. She needed to her out of there now.

Just as she thought she was safe she was in her rear view mirror another car getting flattened like a pancake less than a mile behind her! Turning she was stunned to see Dakota jogging at a leisurely pace after her!

Flooring it Shayna drive as fast as she could as the titanic Dakota simply jogged behind her catching up within seconds. Dakota then leaped over Shayna who looked up completely baffled as Dakota landed with a might earth rattling crash 20 feet in front of her.

Dakota then stood with her hands on her hips and waited for Shayna to crash into her foot. Shayna swerved and slowed down just enough to softly crash sideways into her music foot.

Shayna rubbed her head but then soon snapped back to reality and tired to exit her car and just run for it. However Dakota had already leaned over and wrapped her fingers around her car with them blocking the car doors specifically.

Shayna screamed as she was lifted into the air. She passed her long legs and toned stomach, last her now huge breasts before coming to a halt in front of her massive face!

Dakota peered inside the car and smiled as she brought to right up to her eyes.

“Miss me?” Dakota said sarcastically.

“Will me saying I’m sorry convince you to let me go?” Shayna asked nervously.

Dakota laughed as she then used her free hand to wrap off the door to the hot wheels sized car. She then tilted it and waited for Shayna to fall out onto her outstretched hand.

Shayna however was not going down without a fight, she hung in fir dear life as Dakota smirked and begins to shake the car. After a few moments Shayna lost her grip and fell screaming out of her car and into Dakota’s waiting massive hand.

Throwing the car over her shoulder she looked down at Shayna begging for her life on the palm of her hand. This was it, Dakota had all the power now! She was no longer a victim and she was going to let Shayna have it!

“Did you show me mercy when you bullied every single week months? Then when it was injured you sent me hurtful messages every single day. So you know what Shayna? Fuck you! You’re through!!!” Dakota bellowed down at the tiny woman.

Shayna collapsed to her knees and began to sob fully letting go of the tough girl bravado. Dakota then decided to...
1553332122.title: Shayna Goes For a Ride!

15533321221.content:
Dakota could barely contain her excitement as she literally held the fate of her bully in the palm of her hand. “I’ll tell you what’s Shayna. If you beg and convince me enough that you don’t deserve to die, maybe I’ll let you live.”

In an act of pathetic desperation, Shayna dropped to her hands and knees and started kissing Dakota’s hand. Dakota could hear the woman sobbing, which only excited her more. “You look so fucking pathetic, Shayna,” Dakota laughed. “But keep trying!” In reality, Dakota was just playing with her future food. She had no intention of letting Shayna off the hook.

“Well Shayna I’ve got good news for you,” Dakota led on. “I think you really are sorry.” She smiled as she saw the look of relief appear on Shayna’s face. “But I’m still gonna eat you!”

Shayna began to beg and scream as Dakota dangled the tiny woman over her extended tongue. She dropped Shayna, and slowly retracted her tongue into her mouth. Not wanting to eat Shayna right away, she began to swish her around, battering her against her teeth. Shayna was a wreck, covered in blood and saliva.

Dakota then without warning, began to swallow. Shayna screamed as she felt herself being pulled into the back of Dakota’s throat. She then found herself being forced down the pitch black, slimy esophagus on her way down to Dakota’s stomach.

Dakota let out a quiet burp and felt her stomach rumble. “Oh, still hungry I guess,” she laughed. She originally planned on only eating Shayna, but now was hungry enough to be less picky.

Dakota looked down and smiled. She found something new to eat, it was....
15533321221.title: Dakota’s dinner

15533321222.content:
Dakota had the baddest woman in NXT in the palm of her hand. She had managed to catch up to her speeding car with ease and now had both the car and Shayna in her possession.

Dakota had so much power now that she was 200ft tall! Giving her little guest a demonstration she crushed her car in her fist and let the mangled metal remains crumble down onto the road. Shayna kept on crying as she saw the once puny Dakota Kai showing off monstrous levels of strength, if she could so that to a car...what could she do to her?

Dakota watched as her bully was left a crying sniveling mess on her palm, she almost felt sorry for her. But then she remembered all the bad things she ever did to her and that lit a fire under her. No this was it she couldn’t show mercy, she had to put a stop to this once and for all, and she knew exactly how she was going to do it.

Dakota then reached down and plucked the pathically small women’s champ from her palm and held her in front of her massive billboard sized face. Smiling evilly at the minuscule champ she let her know exactly what was about to go down.

“Aww poor little Shayna. Well don’t you cry anymore it’s all gonna be ok!” Dakota said slightly concerned.

Shayna stopped her crying and wiped her face and thought it herself that she might actually have a chance at living. That Hope was instantly shattered when Dakota brought her closer she whispered to her.

“You see you’re not gonna have anything to worry about because you’re not gonna be around much longer!”

Dakota then lifted up her massive foot and showed Shayna what was stuck to the bottom of her wrestling boot. It was mostly a red stain with pieces of debris stuck to it but Dakota made sure she knew exactly what it was.

“Say hi to Marina and Jessemyn! They got a nice quick death being flattened like pancakes under my boot! You won’t be so lucky Shayna, no you’re gonna know exactly how I felt for all these months. So say goodbye to your friends remains because you’re going exactly where they’ve gone!” Dakota said menacingly.

Shayna began to scream as she lost what little remained of her dignity, she struggled and struggled but it was no use as Dakota’s grip was inescapable.

Dakota then took Shayna and brought clenched her in her fist. Not enough that she was in pain but enough so she couldn’t get away. It was at this point that Shayna’s mind was broken completely. She just screamed and wailed as Dakota looked down menacingly at her. She loved that her bully was now reduced to a crying victim at her mercy.

But enough was enough, she was feeling just the tiniest bit bad that Shayna was suffering this much. No she was better than her, so instead of letting her suffer she was just going to end her life right now.

Dakota then placed her thumb over Shayna’s head and pressed down it as she squeezed the rest of her body in her hand. She pressed and squeezed as she hear the muffled sounds of Shayna screaming in agony, after a few seconds the screaming stopped as the NXT women’s champions body exploded into a pool of red.

Opening her hand all that was left of the once proud four horsewoman was a red splatter and some guts plastered to Dakota’s hand. Satisfied with her bully’s demise Dakota took a moment and surveyed her surroundings.

On one side was the main part of Orlando and on the other was the way to back to the performance center. She saw the trail of destruction she had left when she had been pursuing Shayna earlier. There were massive dents and pot holes (more like massive trenches) that she had left in the road. Dakota was only now just realizing that with her new size came a new sense of responsibility.

Sitting down on the ground she wondered how exactly she was gonna live her life now. I mean she doesn’t even know if she’ll ever shrink back to normal! Now it dawned on her that if she was to remain this size she might have to choose a certain way of living.

She could either go the full attack of the 200ft woman and go on a massive rampage making everyone her servant. Or she could go the more helpful route and become a symbol for peace an justice helping the little people do the world as their giantess protector.

As Dakota pondered her fate, a car pulled up beside her massive body and out hoped a female wrestler. Walking up to Dakota she shouted up to the giantess.

“Hey Dakota! Wow I see you put that growth formula of mine to good use!”

Dakota looked down surprised and saw her fellow NXT superstar standing there, turns out it was...

Kacey Catanzaro was sat alone in her locker room, her face was soaked with tears despite her having stopped crying over an hour ago. It had been quite the emotional day for her.

Earlier this afternoon she had had a meeting with NXT officials. They had informed her that despite her improvement in the ring and immense athletic talent, that she wouldn’t be part of any future plans for the new 2 hour NXT.

This had crushed poor Kacey who had put her heart and soul into wrestling the last lot of years. She was told she would essentially be an enhancement talent with no hopes of making it further than that.

When she asked why she was told a number of different reasons. She was too green. She wasn’t good on the mic. But it all came down to the same thing in the end. She was too small.

Yes even as a woman she was considered too small to make an impact. Even when she argued that the likes of Alexa Bliss, Kairi Sane and Nikki Cross were all only a shade above 5 foot tall. No because she was a shade under it at 4’11” she was considered too short to be a star. And unlike Zelina Vega she wasn’t as talented on the mic so she couldn’t even be a valet.

This was definitely the lowest she had ever felt in all of her life. That’s when Kacey made her choice, if she had no future here then why should she bother to stick around? Grabbing her gym bag she began to empty out her locker. She fought back the tears as she emptied her worldly possessions into her bag.

Just as she finished the last of her stuff Kacey knocked over a small box that had been left in the back of her locker. Opening to she found a small gun that looked like it was something out of Star Wars. There was also a note that simply said.

“For when you’re feeling down”

“Did that thing just!...” Billie said her mouth wide open.

Both of them got the same word “No. This is ICONIC!!!!” They cheered at the same time of course doing the pose with it as well. Both girls being so excited

Thanks to some overzealous loser fan the IIconics now had a functioning size gun in their possession, sure the gun had originally been intended for Charlotte but what the hell did they care? “I would love that Billie! We’re gonna be the biggest stars around and no one will be able to stop us! But Er should we just grow one of us in case this gun doesn’t work like we thought? Peyton asked concerningly.

Billie looked at the size gun then back at Peyton as her expression changed from a cocky one to a sincere one.

“Pey. Whether this gun grows us bigger than skyscrapers or just blows up in our faces. I want to do it with you and only you or not at all. You’re my partner. You’re my best friend. You’re my everything Pey and don’t you ever forget that.” Billie said with all sincerity in her heart.

In a heartbeat Peyton’s faced became all teary eyed as she was overwhelmed by what she had just heard.

“Awwww why you gotta go and make me cry, I just got my makeup right!” Peyton rellied whilst pulling her best friend in for a hug.

Billie happily obliged as she tired to fight back th tears only to succumb to them herself.

“Don’t start crying you’re gonna make me cry, and my makeup was perfect as well!” Bille cried in response.

The two then spent the next few minutes crying and hugging eachother whilst sporadically telling each other how much they loved them. Safe to say that these two were closer than most married couples. Finally they stopped crying and wiped away the tears as they decided it was time to take action.

“Now Peyton how big do we wanna go here? I mean we can grow a as big as we want but I don’t wanna grow too big if you don’t want us to. I mean I’d settle for double out heights if I’m honest.” Billie said but not truthfully.

Peyton noticed this and smiled whilst she took Billie pinky finger in her hand like she would during their entrance.

“Don’t be silly Billie. Why settle for less when we’re so much more. Now didnt you say we’d be more Iconic than the Statue of Liberty?” Peyton said lovingly.

“That would be amazing Pey. Oooooh I can’t wait to get that big! Now how tall is Statue of Liberty?” Billie asked excitedly.

Out of nowhere the roof of the arena gave in as two large objects were coming out of the newly created hole, the crowd were stunned as they saw these figures rising higher and higher with their features becoming more and more prominent. These were people.

But these weren’t just any ordinary people. These were the IIconics, something that became obvious as more and more of their gigantic growing forms revealed themselves. Suffice to say the IIconcis were now 150ft tall giantesses and they were absolutely loving it.

Some people were too scared to move, others were enjoying the view of the humongous women whilst some beloved this to somehow be a part of the show. How wrong those people were.

Looking down with a massive grin on their faces the IIconics knew exactly what they wanted to do. They...

However Mandy got extremely lucky and managed to bounce off of Billie Kay’s fine derrière and barely cling to the back of Billies ring trunks, that’s probably not the last we’ll hear from Mandy.

However before she could lose her temper she heard the sound of her partner squealing in excitement.

Peyton’s eyes lit up as she looked down at the woman she hated most in this industry. Sure Charlotte beat them badly after survivor series and Asuka had beaten them both back to back, but Becky was a special case. Out of nowhere the Irish Lass Kicker has gone from happy to lucky sidekick to the anti authority rebal called the man. And the IIconics hated her for this. Peyton turned to Billie who knew what she was thinkingl standing up to their full terrifying heights the IIconcis struck their pose and shouted “Iconic!!!” For all the little ones to hear.

Meanwhile Becky hadn’t moved a muscle since Billie had ripped the roof off of the locker room, she had heard everything the IIconics had said so far pm she and witnessed all their carnage and mayhem and even worse she knew that they would come for her. “I don’t know Bille, it’s really pissing me off, who does this bug think she is?” Peyton responded.

“Well maybe she just needs to learn whose in charge?” Billie said evilly.

Bille and Peyton shared another look as a devilish grin spread across their faces. Billie then reached down with her collossal fingers and attempted to pluck the tiny Becky from the ground. Becky meanwhile saw the approaching giant manicured fingers and actually tried to attack them as they descended. Billie saw this and could help but laugh at the pathetic efforts of Becky.

“Oh my god Pey she’s actually trying to fight back! Hahahahaha the little twerp thinks she can beat us!”

Peyton simply leaned forward and blew a soft gust of breath at her which knocked the man completely off her feet. This resulted in another round of laughter from the aussies.

155333223332222222312311.content:
As Becky got ready for the match of her life, Peyton was looking for her squash match of epic proportions. She's not worried, why would she be. Its not like she's gonna lose to Becky, should doubt she could if she tried.

Billie got handed the gun as Peyton lowered her two fingers onto her friends palm. Stepping on it with two fingers as she saw the small Becky ready. Her face was so determined that Peyton wondered if she actually thought she stood a chance.

“Okay, I'm the referee. Ding Ding Ding. Start the match!”

And it started, Becky of course didn't run up to her, knowing that if she does she's gonna get attack. best to take it slow and smart.

Peyton had a different idea, bringing her fingers over and stepping. Taunting Becky with a little ‘Ohh, Ohh Im coming.” When she got close Becky went to the other side of Billie’s palm. “The little Man scared!” Peyton teased, loving how humiliating this must be for her. Bringing her fingers closer as Becky went to the other side.

Getting a plan she rushed Becky. Becky tried to dodge but Peyton extended a finger, giving the Irish woman a hard clothesline. Becky fell as she heard the loud Australian woman crack up into a laughter.

Becky now annoyed decided to fight back. Going to Peyton’s finger and start punching it. Peyton felt this but wasn't bothered. “Wow, i could literal just leave it there and you wouldn't hurt me all day. ‘The Man’ more like ‘The Bug’”

“Shut up!” Becky shouted back, giving her an anger that most woman would find intimidating. But to the IIconics it was just adorable.

“Yeah, i would love to see you make me” Peyton replied, moving her finger forward onto Becky. Squishing her under the finger. “Billie, the pin?”

“Oh right” Billie said focusing on how pathetic Becky was and then realised she had a job to do. Bring her finger she tapped it onto the ground.

“One... Two...” She would of got to three but to the IIconics surprise she sprung her shoulder up, leaving Becky in the match. Peyton moved her finger as she was honestly happy, that means the match continues.

While Becky, she hates the rudeness of the IIconics and how belittling this is. But the alternative is losing and getting killed so obviously, she's not gonna want that to happen. With Peyton’s finger off of her, Becky did the only thing that she could think of.
 The IIconics watch as Becky jumped onto Peyton’s finger and tried her signature Disarmer. Maybe she can make Peyton’s finger bend. Its the only idea she has.

“Oh my god! She's trying the Disarmer!” Peyton said loving the little Irish woman riding her finger.

“Disarmer? More like the Disfinger!” Billie added, both of them laughing at the pathetic attempt. Becky tried to bend the finger back but it wasn't happening. That was very obvious as she couldn't make it.

Thinking quickly while both of the girls were laughing Becky ran ahead to her enemies finger. Running ahead she brought her finger ahead and hit just under the nail of Peyton.

Now for the first time since this match has started, in fact the first time since the IIconics got big. She got hurt.

Pulling her finger back she held it up to her face “Ahh, you little bitch. Come here” Peyton then lowered her opposite hand to Becky, planning on knocking her down maybe even of Billie’s hand.
 Becky’s eye were opened as she narrowly dodged her hand. Getting to the side. Peyton naturally tried to sweep her hand right and knock her off. Becky reacted faster and jumped over her hand, much like a Ninja Warrior.

“Wow, she's treating you like a chump” Billie said, trying not to laugh

“Yeah well it doesn't matter. Im gonna beat her in this match and then ‘The Bug’ will be no more”

Peyton smiled down to Becky, but was surprised when she saw Becky wear a big smile back.

“I win! I win!” Becky cheered, both of the IIconics looking confused at her. “That bitches finger was away from the palm for longer then 10 seconds. I win!”

“Thats not... you don't... right Billie?” Peyton said looking to her friend.

Billie had an unapologetic face to Peyton “I mean... you did kind of lose”

“What!” Peyton said not happy.

“But hey! Now we don't have to kill Becky and we can have more fun with her, so... Its still IIconic?”

“... Its still IIconic” Peyton replied. Both of them looking to Becky.

What happens next?

1553332233322222223123111.content:
To the complete surprise of eveyone involved, Becky Lynch had overcame David vs Goliath odds and managed a win against Peyton Royce’s fingers...albeit via count out, but a win was a win and Becky was happy to have it. What made it even more sweet was that the IIconics actually agreed with her and awarded her the win. This was totally unexpected as Becky merely celebrated with some false bravado to keep up the charade thst she wasn’t scared, now while she wasn’t terrified she was a little but scared as to what these giantesses could do to her.

With the match decided and everyone satisfied with the result...at least for the moment the IIconics had to come to a descion as to what to do with Becky. Now as much as they would love to squish her like the bug she was to them now, the Aussie duo actually had to admit that the Man had impressed them, she had put up a decent fight by avoiding Peyton’s massive hand and fingers and she even attempted a dis-arm-her...well a dis-finger-her on Peyton. If nothing else the man was tough.

“Wow Pey I cant belive the little bug actually beat you!” Billie said whilst struggling to hold back laughter.

“Shut up Billie! It was only by count out! If I wanted to I could’ve ended that match instantly!” Peyton angrily retorted.

“Yeah but she still won Pey...and like it or not her won was pretty...iconic...”

Peyton scrunched up her face like a child throwing a temper tantrum, but after a moment or two she exhaled and her expression became a little bit more somber.

“...it was pretty iconic I guess...”

Billie beamed at Peyton happy that she had admitted defeat gracefully. Now that that was cleared up the IIconics turned their attention to the tiny Becky who was still grinning from ear to ear in the palm of Billies hand. Billie then cleared her throat getting the mans attention who looked up smugly at the titanic women.

“Ok little man, technically you have managed to beat Peyton in a one on one singles match. And as a result of not only impressing us you have also earned yourself a little award. Isn’t that right Peyton?” Billie said.

Turning to her partner she saw that Peyton was looking grumpillly in the opposite direction with her arms crossed. Billie then nudged her with her elbow and comically gestures to Becky in her hand as Peyton rolled her eyes and put on a fakeish smile.

“That’s right little bu...Becky...you’ve earned yourself a little award from the IIconic giantesses. Billie the gun if you’d please.” Peyton asked.

Bille then reached behind her and pulled out the size gun which was resting in the back of her ring trunks. Mandy Rose who had spent the entire match holding onto Billies pants for dear life noticed Billie grabbing the fun and wondered what significance if any it had...she was very blond this day.

Handing the gun over to Peyton, Billie then used her free hand and began slapping her thigh as if it was some sort of drum roll. Peyton then raised the gun up slowly for dramatic affect until it was level with Billies hand and Becky. She made sure Becky was paying attention before talking.

“Now becky were gonna let you in on a little...or should I say big secret. This here gun, this is the cause of our bestifiul gigantification, we used this gun to make ourselves the moving hot goddesses you see today. And it is truly iconic!”

“Iconic!!!” Billie chimed in excitedly.

Quickly high fiving Billie she went back to addressing Becky once more.

“Now this gun has granted us the power we always knew we deserved and because of it we’ve made this place our bitch! Me and Peyton have destroyed countless cars, buildings and people. And we haven’t even gotten started yet!” Peyton said with an evil smile on her face.

Becky stood listening intently to what she was saying, this gun was incredible! If only she could taste its awesome power tune maybe she could make the world her bitch too...

“Now Becky we have decided that the IIconics May need a little help in our fun. We think it might be nice to have a little...big helper. And that’s where you come in. We’re gonna give you the chance to become an honorary IIconic, and all you have to do is pass a little test for us.” Peyton said.

Becky was elated by this! This was exactly what she wanted right now, she wanted to get bigger and stronger, she wanted to feel buildings turning to dust beneath her toes and taste the blood of little bug people pouring down her throat, and all she had to do was pass the IIconcis test, easy!

Becky gave the IIconic behemoths the thumbs up as Billie and Peyton smiled, the man had accepted the challenge. Billie then leaned in close so her face was inches from Becky. It took all of Becky courage not to back away from Billies monstrously humongous face.

“Good Becky! We’re glad you’re on board, however we do have to tell you that if you fail this test you’re gonna end up like...well let me show you.”

Billie then bent down and reached into the arena, she then rose having grabbed a handful of backstage producers who were all screaming and squirming, this was all for nought as Billie brought them up right next to Becky who glanced over at the group of people.

Bille made sure Becky had made eye contact with each person before she acted. Without a second thought she Quickly closed her fist, squashing all those within it instantly. Bille felt the people explode to bits in her hand and it gave her a rush of euphoria. Opening he hand she saw the mangled bloody remains of those left on it. Smiling sadiisticly she licked the blood and gore from her hand all the while staring right at Becky Lynch.

Becky was shocked as the message was very clear. Fail and you’ll end up like those poor producers.

“Ok becks I think ya got the message sweet heart. Now as for your test. All you need to do is to go and find Charlotte for us and bring her to us. Easy right? And don’t worry we’ll be nice and give ya a little boost for the job hihi.” Billie laughed.

Nodding to her IIconic partner she wathcd as Peyton amied the gun at Becky and pulled the trigger. A bema shot out and struck Becky’s entire body, within seconds she shot up from her usual 5”6 to a mighty 15ft tall!

“Ooooh look now you have a bigger bug in your hand Billie hihi” Peyton laughed.

Billie then lowered Becky down into the locker room and knelt down to give her a final address.

“Now you have 20 minutes to find Charlotte, I’m sure st your new size it should be easy enough to bring her to us. Now in the meantime me and Peyton are gonna sit over her and chat. So good luck Becky and make sure you do an IIconic job!” Billie said.

She then stood up to her full height and waved down at Becky as she and Peyton sat down next to the arena and started talking. Becky meanwhile could be belive how big she was now. Sure she wasn’t as big as Billie or Peyton but now that she was in the locker room she noticed how small everything was and how much she towered over everything. Hell if the ceiling wasn’t cave in her head would’ve struck it.

Becky then snapped back to reality and got back to task at hand, Becky...

“Becky?!” She heard a voice ring. Looking to the side in a little storage closet, she saw Charlotte poking her head out! Surprised “Your... your huge!”

I'm guessing they wanted to make me their lieutenant or they're sidekick? And as my first job, guess which Blonde Bitch they want in their hands? Spoilers... its you”

“Not really, but its my first step to growing bigger then them. You got to take step after step if you wanted to reach the end. Or you know you could be a Flair and have everything handed to you”

“Get over it your Irish Bitch!” Charlotte shouted back.

Becky just laughing back at her “Oh, I'm gonna love seeing those two girls tear you apart. Now come on. We have some girls to please” She said grabbing Charlotte’s arm. Charlotte could do nothing against Becky’s power. Becky yanked her out of the room and brought her into the hallway. Charlotte still trying to get away, but not having enough power. Becky drags her back to where she was. Planning to go to the parking lot. Becky was laughing the whole time, staring at Charlotte. Seeing how powerless she was. She's gonna get destroyed by those girls.

Maybe she could get out of it like Becky did, but she hopes she doesn't. If fact she hopes Charlotte goes down one of their throats, like a little snack. Maybe if she asks they will shrink Charlotte so she could go down Becky’s throat. That would be nice.

As Becky dragged Charlotte, something happened?

As the much bigger Becky dragged the Now child sized Charlotte (at least compared to her) down the hallway she took a moment to reflect on her plan. Then that’s where the fun would begin.

Charlotte meanwhile as struggling as much as she could to get out of the vice like grip of Becky. Her arm was like a straw to the 15ft Man and she didn’t show any signs of loosening her grip. She tried punching and clawing at her hand, for all the good that did for her. Becky finally notice her futile efforts and using barely any strength lifted Charlotte’s entire body by her arm and dangled her in front of her face.

“Listen shrimp, you can keep on hitting me and see where there gets you. Trust me it won’t be pleasant, to you can behave yourself and accept your fate and come quietly. Either way you’re gonnna belong to the IIconics so choose wisely how you wanna spend your last few giantess free moments!” Becky taunted.

Charlotte was in too much pain to respond, she felt like Becky was about to rip her arm from its socket from the way she was holding her. Becky meanwhile was loving the power she had over the Now smaller Charlotte. Throughout the years Charlotte had always used her height advantage to bully and dominate the women’s division. But now the tables had turned and Becky was the tall one, only she was much taller than Charlotte ever was.

Turning a corner Becky could hear the familiar sound of the IIconcis laughing outside the arena. Becky had managed to keep her end if the bargain and had located Charlotte, she had even done it with 10 minutes to spare. Everything was coming up great for the man...that was until....

Out of nowhere Becky felt a slight sting in the back of her left knee, stumbling she dropped Charlotte who screamed as she fell 10 feet before hitting the ground with a thud. Becky rubbed the back of her knee as she tried to figure out what just happened.

“Ahhhhh! What the hell? What the fuck was that?” Becky asked clearly annoyed.

Turning around she saw the culprit. Standing with a grin on her face and chair in her hand was the empress of tomorrow Asuka! The Japanese sensation had heard and seen everything the IIconics had done, she had also see and heard what Becky was up to as well, and she was not happy about it.

“BECKY!!!! You betray Asuka! You betray locker room! You betray all of us!!! Asuka will make you pay!!!” Asuka shouted in her unique accent and dialect.

Becky looked at her both with a mixture of anger and curiosity. What was asuka thinking attacking her? She was nearly 3 times her size and had shown how easy she could manhandle any woman or person for that matter. But Asuka was fearless, Asuka was relentless and above all else Asuka bowed to now one, that included bigger Irish women and extremely big Australians.

Charlotte meanwhile managed to regain her composure and looked back up to see her unlikely savior Asuka offering her free hand to her. Reluctantly she took her rivals hand and got back to her feet. Asuka smiled her usual cocky/insane smile as Charlotte kept her distance from both of her rivals. Becky then decided enough was enough and tried to address the situation before it got out of hand.

“Woah Asuka you got it all wrong. I’m only trying to get big so that I can take down the IIconics. I’ve just gotta keep up the charade for a while so that they trust me and grow me, butnif you help me deliver Charlotte to them they might consider letting you join to and then we can team up and take them down together. What do ya say Asuka?” Becky asked.

Asuka stood there in deep though as if she was seriously considering Becky’s offer, Charlotte on the other hand couldn’t let Becky sway the only person who was willing to help her, so she tried to intervene hoping she could convince Asuka otherwise.

“Asuka don’t listen to her, she’s just gonna hand you over to the IIconcis along with me, so don’t be an idiot...” Charlotte started.

Out of nowhere a massive flat screen tv sized hand struck Charlotte across the face and sent epher slying back. Becky seeing what Charlotte was trying to do decided she needed to be silenced. Luckily she didn’t use much force, only enough to knock her back and not out. Becky then tried to act like her hand had slipped as she awaited asukas answer.

“Sorry about that asuka the old hand must’ve slipped...being this big you lose control of your everyday functions very easily haha...”

Asuka just stared at Becky for a few second before she walked over the Charlotte and once again helped the queen rise to her feet. Becky was taken back by this as Asuka spoke.

“That was all proof Asuka needed. You are bad and asuka is good. Now asuka and blonde are gonna beat you and big girls!!!!”

Becky sighed as she heard Asuka’s answer.

“This could’ve been so easy Asuka. But no you gotta be a dumbass and try and beat me, well moron how do you expect to best the IIconics at your size? Hell the two of you pipsqueaks couldn’t even hurt me let alone them.” Becky retorted easily.

“Challenge accepted”. Asuka replied.

Turning to Charlotte she motioned for her to pick up another chair that was lying ideally by, doing so the two former rivals nodded at each other as they prepared to face off against the man.

Just as they got ready to charge they were all cushy by surprise by the booming sound of an Australian accent ringing throughout the arena.

“Oh Becky!!! Only 10 minutes left!!! If you’re not back in time you know what’s gonna happen! So tick tock!!!”

A bead of sweat fell down Becky’s Brow as she heard this. Not wasting any time she charged at the smaller chair wielding women. What happened next was...

At the same time Charlotte and Asuka battled Becky Lynch (just before knocking her out) outside the arena the IIconics were sitting and chatting say without a care in the world. They had taken a break from destroying buildings and vehicles, as well as stopping their murderous rampage from the moment.

“So do ya think Becky’s gonna find that blond bimbo Charlotte?” Billie asked.

Peyton shrugged, she didn’t want to tell her partner that she really wanted Becky to fail so that she could have an excuse to squash her into paste. But she also wanted to know what plans they had for Becky and Charlotte for that matter in the event that she succeeds.

“So Billie What happens if Becky manages to find Charlotte?” Peyton asked while trying to be as nonchalant as possible.

Peyton dived at Billie, completely taking her friend by surprise. Landing on her back Billie could do nothing as Peyton turned her over and started slapping her ass, all the while Billie slapped the ground both out of laughter and pain.

Out of nowhere she noticed what looked like a person clinging to Billies ass for dear life. Bringing her face as close as possible to billles ass she saw who the person was.

Billie then started laughing as well as Peyton reached down and plucked screaming blond with two collossal fingers. That bitch Becky Lynch had stormed in all massive and knocked her out when she tried to run away from her. Now her head was swimming, which was ironic as she had been literally swimming inside a giantesses mouth!

Waking up she found herself inside a slimy dark cave being tossed around by a monsterous snake of a tongue. This was hell. She was then spat out like used gum onto the waiting open palm of her captor.

She was being stared at by the most terrifyingly crazy woman in all of WWE. Nikki Cross. And she was freakin huge!!!! Carmella was like a chicken wing in the hands of the giant, fitting as that’s what Nikki compared her to when she put her in her mouth.

Now all Carmella wanted to do was cry and curl up into a ball. But she was too scared to move and just sat there looking into the dark crazed eyes of this lunatic.

“Oooooh looks whose awake! Little mousey awake awake!!!” Nikki sang in a scary manner.

Carmella gulped and began to whimper in fear, instinct took over as she crawled desperately to the edge of her hand and fel l right off of it!

“Hihihi oooh look at the little mouse trying to fly! You’re no bird, you’re no bird!!!” Nikki sang.

Carmella began to cry as she realised just how big Nikki was at an astounding 50ft tall! She had no chance of escaping this monster. She had even made the ring her cushion, showing just how insignificant she was compared to her.

This realization made Carmella cry even more as she sobbed louder and louder. This didn’t sit well with ms Cross.

“Hey Little mousey stop your whimpering! Er you’re boring, boring, boring! Nikki should just eat you for real this time!” Nikki threatened.

Nikki heard her captives screams and pleas and lowered down until she was just dangling in front of her face. She shook her slightly and playfully as Carmella hung on for her life.

Nikki then took Carmella and put her in her front pocket with her head sticking out for air.

Nikki then started undoing the laces on her boot until they were untied, taking off the boot she then whipped off her sock before letting her bare toes wiggle in the air.

Carmella saw all this and wondered what this nutcase had in store for her. She didn’t have to wait long as Nikki grabbed her again and set her down in front of her humongous foot.

“Nikki wants you to play with her foot! Nikki wants to play footsie with princess mousey!” Nikki blurted out.

Carmella gulped. Footsie? This woman’s foot was massive! She could crush her without giving it a second thought. How the hell was she supposed to play footsie with her?!

Nikki answered her question by lowering her foot so suddenly thst Carmella didn’t have time to react! Closing her eyes she expected to be squished instantly. That didn’t happen. Opening her eyes to find out why she found herself in between Nikki’s big and second toes.

Looking up at the maniacal smiling scot Carmella had no idea what she had in store...until.

Nikki suddenly pinched her two toes together, trapping a screaming Carmella in between them. Lifting her foot up Nikki watches as the helpless Carmella struggles inbetween her pale giant toes.

“Hihihi is Little mousey likening footsie? Nikki loves playing footsie with you!”

Carmella could only scream and try and hold on her lunch as Nikki began moving her foot around quickly and violently. She could feel herself slipping so she clinged to the toes with all her might as Nikki was having the time of her life.

This went on for a few minutes until Nikki got bored. She lowered her foot and freed Carmella from her toe prison. Carmella was incredibly dizzy and disorientated, she threw up slightly from this. Nikki kept on laughing at the tiny woman’s antics and decided to up the ante.

She raised her foot and slowly lowered it onto Carmella. The Staten Island princess was too busy puking to notice the immense shadow of her foot looming over her until it was too late. She was pinned under this woman’s enormous foot.

Nikki made sure not to apply too much pressure as she didn’t want her mouse to explode like a grape. This did get her thinking however, sure it was nice having all these little mice sized people, but she was sure she could have even more fun if they were big sized!

A few more minutes passed before Nikki finally removed her foot from her. Carmella gasped for air as she began wiping her face of all the sweat that Nikki’s foot had smothered all over her.

“That was fun, fun, fun!!!! Nikki wants to play more with you!”

Carmella didn’t even have the energy to react, she was physically and mentally beaten by this giant maniac to the point she didn’t care anymore.

That’s when...

1553332233322222332.content:
Stephanie McMahon is the most powerful woman in all of wwe. She had Money, power, influence, beauty and much much more. She was the mastermind behind the divas revolution, she was the creator of wwe women. And she was an innovative genius.

And now she was thinking of the future...or more specifically the past. With her money she had hire a group of scientists who after years of work had managed to create a time machine.

With this technology she had a plan to make her women’s division the best it ever was. She was planning on sending her superstar back in time to wrestle the wwe female legends in their prime.

As she sat in her office she went down her roster list and started to make Dream matches. She could have matches like Sasha Banks vs Trish Stratus, Bayley vs Lita and even comedy fan service matches like The IIconics vs the Bellas before the plastic surgery. The possibilities were endless.

Satisfied she called the first group of superstars into her office. In walked Bayley, Sasha Banks, Alexa Bliss, The IIconics and Naomi. With all 6 women gathered Stephanie explained her plan.

(Writers note: Ok you’ve just got to buy into the zaniness of this plot)

She told them that she had invented a time machine that would transport them to past wwe shows. Due to her genius she made sure there was a day every few years where only the female roster was present for the event. They would also tape the matches then take the tape back to their time and air it as part of a wwe evolution 2 special.

All the women were happy to hear this. Each and every one of them wanted the chance to have their dream matches.

“Oh man I can’t wait to get the chance to wrestle trish!” Sasha said confidently.

“Man I’d love a match against Lita!” Bayley chimed in.

“I wouldn’t mind mixing things up with Melina” Naomi said cracking her knuckles.

“I’d love to meet Stacy Keibler! She’s my idol” Billie Kay said swooning.

“And Torrie Wilson too! So IIconic!” Peyton Royce added.

“Hmmm beating the likes of Victoria, AJ Lee And Ariel would be cool.” Alexa said smirking.

“Well good it seems you all have a general idea on who you’d like to wrestle. However I need you to pick a time period as you can only go to one at a time. So tell ladies. When’s it gonna be?

The women all had a group discussion before deciding the time period they wanted to visit was...


(Writers note: please when adding options make sure you know what diva/wrestler was in what era. Don’t have them go to the attitude era and find Charlotte flair or something. Any inconsistencies will be deleted.)
1553332233322222332.title: Back to the future: WWE Style

15533322333222223321.content:
Eventually the girls decided to go to the ruthless aggression era. The one that paved the way for the woman of today. This was headed by Sasha and Bayley, who furiously wanted to face the woman they love. Stephanie smiled and raised out of her seat. “Fantastic, follow me and i’ll take you.”

She walked for a long while down the corridor. The girls talking behind her as they were all excited. This was going to be the greatest thing that they can have. Sure, in terms of quality of match, might not be the best.

However Icon vs Icon is enough to sell seats, and carry the match itself. She wore a smile as she headed into the door, opening it up and showing a large room. With a control panel and a holding cell. With glass around and a lot of panels.

“Okay, i’ll set the time, and send you in.” Steph said, going to the control panel. “Which one of you want to be first?”

While the girls all wanted to do this, none of them really had the courage to go along with it. Eventually Sasha stepped up.

“I’ll do it, but i’m getting the main event spot on Evolution 2.” She said as of course Sasha wanted that. She stepped in, in her wrestling gear as she looked around. Feeling a bit weird and like a test rat. The girls stepped back a respectable distance, while Bayley reassured.

“I’ll be there soon, don’t freak out okay!”

“Setting the time, the location. Okay, time travelling in 3, 2, 1. Go!”

Sasha felt raw energy go around in her body, when suddenly her body disappeared. All the girls yelling out in shock as it was the last thing she was expecting.

“She should be back, ready to wrestle.

-

Sasha was back, but she was far from ready to wrestle. Blinking a couple of times, she looked around seeing a locker room. It wasn’t like the ones in the current era of WWE. Sasha remembers this background, it was when she watched it on TV. Looked exactly the same!

“Can’t believe this actually works!” She said as she looked up and around, loving what she was seeing. However, that changed when she realised something.

“What... no, no no no no! You have got to be fucking kidding me!” She shouted, looking around. S-She was tiny. To the point where she resembled more of a bug than an actual wrestler.

“You have got to be kidding me, you have got to be fucking kidding me!”

While she was throwing a well reasoned fit, a light shone behind her. Turning her head she could see her best friend Bayley, with an amazed look.

“Wow, did it work! Are we here?” She questioned, seeing Sasha.

“We are, but we are tiny!” Sasha yelled as she pieced it together. They all looked among themselves for a long while as Sasha stomped! “What the hell!”

-

“Okay, they are there and...” Stephanie stopped, and looking over it. “Hopefully in one piece. Who’s next.”

“You don’t seem to know what you are doing?” Alexa frowned.

“I do, we had pervious tests and they travelled back there without problem.” Steph said to all of them. “So just go, I promise it will be nice.”

“Do you... you know have a way to bring us back.”

“Of course, within an hour you should return, hopefully with the tape. Now go!” The two that questioned wasn’t giddy to get in so Steph looked to the side. “IIconics, get in now or you are fired.”

The two Aussie woman looked at each other and walked in, until finally they were in together. Stephanie activated and sent them away. A smile on her face.

“You two, get in or your fired.”

“Better not be a trick.” Naomi said as she walked in as well. The glow stepped in and Steph didn’t even give her time to close the door, as she activated it.

“Alexa, step in or-”

“I’m fired. Listen, I know when someone is bullshitting.” Alexa said crossing her arms. “Why the hell are you playing us.”

“What do you mean Goddess?”

“You’ve said you done this before, so why the hell are they not back and helping.” Alexa said as she raised a good point, one that none of the girls picked up on. “Tell me, what happened to them.”

“Oh, they died.” Steph said simply. “Not because of the time travel, but because of something else.”

Alexa’s eyes went wide, as she could not believe what she was hearing. “What? They died? How?”

“Oh, don’t remember. It happened so long ago.” Steph said with a smirk, a certain memory there.

-

“I don't’ wanna be here Peyton!”

“This is unfair Billie!” The IIconics yelled, hugging each other as they cried into each other. They have been doing this for as long as they got here, and she was not a fan of it.

Suddenly the light returned and they all looked to Naomi. Who herself was looking around.

“Aw hell nah! That lying white bitch!” She said seeing the size issue.

“Yeah, we’ve been tricked. Damn it, we are the size of bugs!”

“At least we travelled back in time.” Bayley said to Sasha. She may be a heel now, but she has always been one to make the best out of a terrible situation.

Naomi looked to the IIconics crying and hugging each other, as she joined Bayley and Sasha.

“Steph said only an hour here before we get back, but that could be BS as well.”

“Most likely is.” Sasha added before yelling. “Ahhh! I can’t believe it, how are we suppose to wrestle them now!”

“We can’t, which means we are stuck. Should we hide?” Bayley questioned, when suddenly. A sound happened. A loud, defeating sound.   The girls looked to the source, seeing it was something as simple... as opening the door. The door opened, pulling wide as they all look forward.
 Seeing the giant form of ____________ walking in.

After a moment Alexa made her decision. She...

Becky had struck gold. What had started as a way to spruce up her love life, had evolved into something so much more. Becky had shrunken her beloved fiancé down to ant size and had ,ade her won YouTube account.

She had now uploaded two different videos. And they were a massive hit. Her two videos combined had over 3 million views and she had only had the account for a couple of hours!

With her tiny fiancé currently trapped between her massive big and second toes, the man then went and checked the comment section of her latest video.

To her delight she saw that many of her beloved fans loved the tiny adventures of Seth series. In fact some of them were interested in starring in the videos themselves. This struck a cord with Becky. Sure it was fun messing with her tiny fiancé, but an entire group of fans? Now that sounded fun!

Becky then added a comment and pinned it to her video. She was inviting her top fans to come and star in her next video. She gave them an address of a place a few miles from here. She had said the first 20 fans to arrive would get to star.

Smiling Becky reached down and plucked the tiny Seth from between her toes. Seth was out of breath from having had to massage his girlfriend’s humongous feet. Now he was brought up through the air until he was in front of his giantesses gorgeous face.

“Ok babe I’m off to go pick up some lucky fans to star in my next vid. I’ll let you sit this one out and rest up ok?” Becky informed him.

Before Seth could Protest, Becky brought him forward and planted a massive kiss on him. The ant sized architect was enveloped by Becky’s huge lips which were much much bigger than him. One lip was more tuna double his size right now.

The kiss was only a few seconds long but once it was down Seth was covered form head to toe in lipstick. Smiling, Becky headed to their bedroom and opened her underwear drawer, she then dropped Seth into a pair of her favorite black panties.

“I’ll see you later babe, sleep tight!” Becky said as she blew him a kiss and slowly closed the drawer.

Seth tried to yell to stop her but it was too late. The drawer was closed and Seth was left in total darkness with nothing but Becky’s underwear for company.

With her tiny finance hidden safely away, Becky headed for her car and set off to meet her fans.

25 minutes later

“Oh my god I can’t believe we’re in the mans house!” a woman in her 20’s said excitedly.

“It really is a lovely home.” A man in his late 30’s chimed in.

“Well thank you all for coming. I’m so excited to feature you in my next video. If you’re all ready let’s get started!” Becky announced.

Everyone cheered loudly and clapped. Becky then reached into her purse preparing to use her shrink ray. That’s when one of her fans asked the obvious question.

“So do you have a studio or something? Where’s the green screen?”

Becky smiled. These Fans thought her show was all CGI and green screened. Boy where they in for a surprise!

Smiling Becky took her shrink ray and aimed it at the 21 fans.

“Oh don’t worry about that, a green screen won’t be necessary!” Becky grinned.

1553332233322222333121212131131332.content:
With 21 fans in her living room, Becky grasped her shrink ray and fired. The beam struck her fans an within seconds they shrank down until they were all only a 1/4 inch tall!

Once the light from the beam vanished, the fans removed their hands from their faces.

“Eughh What the hell was that?”

“Man it was so bright.”

“I feel a little funny...”

These were all thoughts and queries that escaped the mouths of the fans. A few of them stumbled around, slightly disoriented from the beam. Then they started bumping into things...one man walked face first into a weird plastic wall. Looking up he gasped. It was an Aglet of a shoelace!

Then the screams started. Teenagers and young adults started to panic as the reality dawned on them. They were tiny. Everything was huge! A single shoe was the size of a huge cruise ship!!!

Know one had any idea what was going on as they all took in their new giant surroundings. Then a terrifyingly loud sound screeched through the air which interrupted everyone’s panic.

“Having fun down there?” the voice boomed.

The voice was loud and yet oddly familiar...and Irish. Then a pitch black shadow enveloped everyone as the screams and yells of shock picked up again.

There above them with a huge smile in her face was the person who invited them in the first place. It was Becky Lynch. The man smiled down at her now ant sized fans who had no idea what they had signed up for.

The man was leaning over her couch with her humongous face taking up most of the sky for her teeny tiny fans. She already knew this is what Seth must see, but now that she had over 20 shrunken people and she was looking forward to some fun!

“Wow it’s so cool that you all wanted to be on my show! Except slight change of plans, today’s episode won’t be the tiny adventures of Seth. No this will be up close with giantess Becky!” Becky announced proudly.

The fans all stared up in awe at the giantess. Most of them were still panicking at the sight of the huge terror, but there were some who were amazed at the turn of events. And from what she was saying, she was still gonna feature them in her YouTube show!

However the majority were not exactly fans of being shrunken against their wills...

“Holy shit she’s huge!” A woman gasped.

“W-why did she shrink us?” A teenage boy spluttered.

“This is scary. I don’t wanna be small!” A small child said hugging her parents leg.

Becky heard some barely audible talk from below her, clearing her throat politely she was annoyed that everyone didn’t immediately stop talking.

“OI Shut it!” Becky yelled.

Everyone stopped making a noise instantly. Satisfied Becky continued talking.

“That’s better! Now hold on one second whilst I get the camera set up. It’s gonna be awesome. Today we’ll be shooting_______________, doesn’t that sound fun?” Becky said.

“Ok littles ones here’s how Scale Mt Becky works. You’re all gonna start at my feet and attempt to climb me until you reach the summit, the summit being my hair! Simple right?” Becky said smiling.

The people at her feet were hesitant about this. They didn’t know how they’d fair trying to climb someone as big and opposing as Becky Lynch! One young man was actually brave enough to question this.

“What if we fall down?” He asked nervously.

Now being the size of a small ant was a problem as Becky couldn’t hear him. But the man was smart enough to assume some little bugs would ask this and carried on explaining the game.

“And if you happen to fall during this game then don’t worry, you’re much more durable at this size so I’m sure you’ll be fine...”Becky lied.

The man lied about this as she knew there was no increased durability from her shrinking. But she didn’t want anyone abstaining from this game. This that did would surely regret it.

Eventually after some consideration, the tiny ant sized fans agreed with the mans demands and gathered at her toes, ready to start scaling her. Satisfied Becky was ready to properly begin her show.

“Ok little ones. You must all climb me and try to reach the top of my head. The first person up there wins!” Becky announced.

Wiggling her bare toes she was ready to start. The people all crowded at her toes and looked up, Becky was conveniently dressed in her usual ring gear, fishnet tights and a black and yellow top.

“Ok guys. 3...2...1...go!” Becky yelled.

Almost at once 13 of the 20 run up and start climbing. They reach her gigantic toes and start climbing up them. This took longer than anyone expected, the toes were bigger than the ant sized people yes, but they were the smallest part of her that they would have to scale!

After 5 minutes the 13 had reached the top of her foot and started climbing her legs via the fishnets, her left leg was being climbed by 8 people whereas the other 5 were on her right.

“Well feels like the bugs have reached my legs! But just who will scale the man and win a prize!” Becky boomed down an the Shrunken fans.

Meanwhile at Her toes, there were seven fans who hadn’t bothered climbing Becky. These include a family of four with a mom, dad and two children. An overweight man, a paranoid woman and the bus driver himself.

Becky looked down at her toes and frowned. She wasn’t happy to see people not participating. And she had a way of making them pay.

“Oh dear, looks like a few wee bugs haven’t bothered to climb Mt Becky! Well don’t worry guys the man has ways of dealing with these uncooperative bugs!” Becky said winking at the camera.

What did Becky have in mind?

Fans loved your video of you torturing Seth with your feet, now we’re thinking fans would love the chance to tour the very feet from that video, you know walk on them, touch them, take picture with them, you get the idea, and we can charge through the roof for such an experience.” Stephanie explained.

Stephanie reached down and picked up the tiny Seth, holding him between her massive fingers. She was amazed that the shrinking was real, she loved the feel of a tiny person between her fingers and at her mercy, she would have to get Becky to shrink her some people. Maybe even her husband.

One week later

Ronda, who locked her in an armbar because she didn't like one of the questions.

Renee entered the locker room in pain, clutching her arm after just coming from the Ronda interview which didn't
go so well. "I hate it that I can't defend myself so they all just bully me. If only there was a way that I could get back
at them and stop this", Renee said to herself. She left the locker room and walked over to her car to pick up a book
as she didn't have to do an interview for a while and wanted to pass time by. She got to her car and noticed a mysterious
package outside it so she decided to open it and saw a little toy gun inside. Renee sat in her car and examined the gun
properly, she noticed two letters, G and S and some measurements on the gun. She set the gun to S and the size to 5 inches
and fired it at the box that it came in and was shocked to see the box had shrunk. She then set it to G and hit the box again
and it grew back to its original size.

"Oh my god", she said shocked. "My wish has come true, I have a real life size ray and I can use it on anyone and defend myself",
she said excitedly. She thought about who to use it on. "There are so many people, who should I use it on first", she questioned.

Does she use it on either one of Charlotte, Bayley or Ronda, or does she use it on someone else first?

155333223332222233312221.title: Bianca Belair

1553332233322222333122211.content:
There was an air of excitement around WWE NXT. With the annual war games and survivor series events coming up, everyone was buzzing about NXT’s participation in these events.

For the first time ever there would be a female war games match. Every woman was pushing to be involved in this match but so far there were 7 spots of the 8 filled. One of them was occupied by none-other than the EST of NXT, Bianca Belair.

Now Bianca had the honor of being on NXT women’s champion Shayna Baszler’s team. Well everyone considered it an honor except for Belair. She hated Shayna. The fact she could never beat her for the title always stayed in the back of Bianca’s mind.

Combine that with her having to team with Io Shirai as well, someone who has actually pinned Shayna, you had a very salty EST. However unbeknownst to the entire women’s roster Bianca had been going to college part time. And not for the degree they thought she was.

No Bianca had been going to night school and college on her days off in order to study science and engineering. Now finally after years of tour and torment she had achieved her goal and perfected the ultimate invention.

Alone in her locker room Bianca pulled out what looked like an ordinary belt with a funny shaped belt buckle. What it actually was, was a size altering belt (like the atom). With this device she could change her size at will. From smaller than a speck to bigger than a mountain. And everything in between.

Bianca laughed as she fitted herself with the belt. Testing it she turned the dial on the belt slowly to the right. Instantly she begins to decrease in size until she was only a foot tall. Satisfied it could shrink well enough she turned the dial to the left and shot up in height until she was 9ft tall! Her head was scraping against the ceiling. Delighted Bianca turned the dial to the right and shrank back down to her usual 5’6 height.

“Yup I’d say this bad boy is fully operational. I can’t wait to take over this division and make all these women submit to me!” Bianca gloated menacingly.

Bianca had finally had enough of not getting her dues. She was ready to take over and make sure no one ever crossed her again. Her first order of action was to decide just how big she was going to get.

She could start off small at say 20-30ft and try and whip the women into shape that way. Or she could go bigger than that at say 100-150ft and is her size to scare the women into doing her bidding. Or she could go even bigger at say 500ft tall and really terrify every woman and person for a few hundred miles to do whatever she says no matter what.

Bianca started turning her belt to the left as she decided what size she was gonna grow to. Bianca grew to...
1553332233322222333122211.title: GiantEST

15533322333222223331222113.content:
Turning the dial on her waist to the left, Bianca thought to herself why she had to limit herself to such small heights as 30ft or even 150ft. No if she was gonna take over this women’s division then she needed to be large and in charge.

Smiling evilly to herself she turned the dial up to 500 and laughed as she started to grow. Her entire body was enlarged as she inched higher and higher towards the 9ft tall ceiling of her locker room. The roof was definitely not gonna last.

Meanwhile

Inside full sail university the women’s roster were all in a meeting with had women’s trainer Sara Amato. She was giving everyone an update on the future all women’s war games match and what it meant for everyone, not just those in the match.

The general morale of the division was high and each every body was abuzz about the potential show stealer that was gonna occur in a few weeks. Just as head trainer Amato was finishing up her speech the entire building seemed to shake!

There were massive tremors and the sound of the building crumbling and tearing as if something was bombarding down on it! All the women screamed and yelled as they all got on the ground and under the desks for cover.

The shaking seemed to last a good minute or two until finally it died down. Cautiously the women all crawled out from under their desks as they all stood up surveying any potential damage or injury.

Luckily the worst of the tremors didn’t seem to reach this particular room, so the worst damage there was, was a couple of overturned chairs.

The likes of Shayna, Jessamyn Duke and Rhea Ripley were the first to their feet and began to help others up as the smaller weaker wrestlers were more stunned by the events.

An outburst of chatter and talk erupted throughout the room as everyone tied to figure out just what had happened. However before the discussion got too far the were all interrupted by a booming sound.

“COULD ALL FEMALE TALENT PLEASE REPORT TO THE RING PLEASE!”

Everyone stopped talking as they turned to Sarah Amato for guidance. She simply told them all to get moving to the ring like the PR system said. As they left Dakota Kia whispered.

“Didn’t that voice sound familiar?”

She didn’t know how right she was as all the women of NXTs roster assembled in the ring. You had the likes of Shayna and her cronies Jessamyn and Marina. Rhea and her team of Candace LeRae, Mia Yim and Tegan Nox. Also there was Io Shirai, Taynara Conti and few other NXT talents.

After a few minutes talk broke out again as everyone had no idea who called this meeting. Almost on cue they got their answer.

“Ahhhh I see everyone has arrived. Good! Now we can talk about the future of the NXT women’s division.” A booming voice said.

Everyone looked around confused as they had no idea where th voice came from.

“Oh my bad y’all can’t see me. Hang on a sec.” The voice continued.

Once again the building began to shake again as everyone fell to their knees. The entire roof of the building had been torn flesh off and in place of it was the smiling face of one Bianca Belair...except she was massive! Her entire face took up the sky!

Several women screamed. Others swore loudly and some simply stood there stunned and too scared to do anything. Bianca meanwhile stared down at all the big sized women in the ring. If she wanted to she could lower her hand and squash them all under her palm!

“Well looks like everyone’s here. Well as you can see I’ve gone through some changes and as such I think these changes should reflect the women’s division” Bianca started to say.

“What the Fuck why are you so big?”

“Why’d you rip the roof off?”

“Y-you’re not gonna hurt us are you?”

Several women all shouted up to her at once. Stopping in her tracks Bianca looks down at they women with a scowl on her face. She could not tolerate this rudeness. Reaching down with her colossal fingers she scooped up head women’s trainer Sarah Amato.

Holding the near ant sized woman in fingers Bianca needed to find a way to get her point across. She decided in the end to...
15533322333222223331222113.title: 500ft Bianca!

choices: Get down on their knees and worship her
155333223332222233312221132.content:
The NXT women’s division could do nothing but stand and watch as the monstrous 500ft tall Bianca Belair plucked their head trainer Sara Amato from the ring and between her humongous fingers!

Sara screamed as she came face to face with the colossal EST. Bianca was now beyond huge at 500ft. She easily ripped off the entire roof of the full sail university arena, and if she stood up to her full height she would tower over the building with ease.

Bianca looked at her bus sized trainer between her fingers. She felt so powerful. She held a life literally between her fingers. Right now all eyes were on her as she sat above the arena. And rightfully so. This was how things would be now. She was their master, their ruler and mere moments ago these women had the gall to interrupt heras she gave her first proclamation. And she would not tolerate it.

With everyone’s focused on her she waved the tiny Sara over them so they all knew where to look.

“Pay attention you little bugs. This is what happens if you anger your new leader.”

With that she took one final look at the trainer who had never done anything to offend her or hurt her. But Bianca needed to set an example. And long term she didn’t need Sara who wasn’t even a wrestler anymore.

Sara Amato screamed as Bianca gave her one last cold look before she closed her fingers together. Almost instantaneously Sara’s body exploded in an eruption of red gore. Her tiny insides splattering all over Bianca’s thumb and forefinger.

The women below all let out glass and screams as they watched their trainer and mentor rescued to a pair of red stains on the giantess Bianca Belair’s fingers! A few women collapsed and started to cry. Some put their heads in their hands and paced the ring in disbelief. And finally some just finally accepted what had happened and what would become of them if they crossed the EST.

Bianca meanwhile looked at the little stains on her fingers with pure indifference. She had ended another persons life lie it was nothing...and she felt nothing. No remorse, no feeling whatsoever. This is what it meant to her above all these women. She was the giantess that stood tall as opposed to those little bugs who scurried by her feet.

Rubbing her fingers together, even feeling the splattered remains of Sara Amato for nothing more than a slight smirk from the giantess. Now she looked down at her women division who all froze and looked right back at her.

Good it seemed all of them had gotten the message. Now all she had to so was decide her next course of action. After a moment of contemplation Bianca decided her division would...
155333223332222233312221132.title: The Pecking Order

choices: That some had done good whilst others had done bad
1553332233322222333122211321.content:
Having just disposed of NXT’s head women’s trainer. Bianca Belair now turned her attention towards the women who were anxiously waiting for the giantess to gussy something or give and order.

The EST looked down at them as her massive face filled the entire sky of the arena. She had replaced the roof which was just a testament to how huge she was! Clearing her throat everyone fell silent. Even those on the floor crying dropped out of fest of ending up like poor Sara.

“Good now that you see what happens when you disobey me, maybe you’ll all do your best to please me. Is that understood?” Bianca asked menacingly.

Most of the women murmured yes, a few even said yes Bianca. However that wasn’t good enough for Bianca Belair who boomed down on the terrified women’s division.

“Yes Goddess!” she booms.
