“Yes goddess!!!”

Satisfied Bianca smiles. She then taps her chin with her finger as she pretends to be thinking over what she wants them all to do. After a moment she snaps her huge fingers which causes several wrestlers to flinch in surprise.

“Oooh I got it! Ok bugs I seem to have squished a fellow bug and gotten my fingers all dirty. I want you all to clean my hand until it’s all gone, is that clear?”

“Yes goddess!” The women ring.

With that Bianca lowers her massive hand into the arena. Her hand is so big it could easily fit 2 whole wrestling rings between them! The women all scrambled to get out of the way as her hand overlapped the ring and came to rest covering the ring and several rows of seats.

Looking up at their new goddess they see her raise her eyebrows as she graces them with one more instruction.

“Get to cleaning bugs. Use your tongues if you have to. Now if you fail to clean my hand properly I’ll crush one of you without a second thought.” Bianca said coldly.

That was all the inspiration they needed. They all split up with two women to each finger and the remaining ones focusing on her palm. Jessamyn Duke and Marina Shafir were working away at her pinky finger. Both of them rubbing her nail as hard as they can to remove dirt.

Dakota Kai and Tegan Nox are on her ring finger. These two were the ones who were crying every time Bianca did something so they were going all out. Both of them were licking every inch o skin they could get their tongues on. Tears streaming down their faces as they work.

Io Shirai And Mia Yim were on middle finger duty. Neither had cried or reacts strongly either way when the giantess Bianca showed up. The two however barely put any work into cleaning the finger, both barely even rubbing it.

Candace LeRae and Taynara Conti meanwhile were working hard on cleaning Bianca’s index finger. Candace had been mildly sobbing when Bianca showed up and as such was licking and rubbing the dirt off of the gist appendage. Taynara Conti meanwhile was scared shitless of the 500ft EST. She as a black belt was using strategic strikes and kicks to massage Bianca’s finger, hopefully this would please their goddess.

The war games captains Rhea Ripley and Shayna Baszler were cleaning the thumb. Both of these proud women had swallowed their pride and were obediently cleaning under the finger nail of her thumb. Both hated that they were reduced to slaves and were wondering how she managed to grow so big...

Finally the rest of the NXT women’s division were cleaning her palm and the back of her hand. After about 30 minutes Bianca called a halt to the cleaning and pampering and lifted her humongous hand to see how her division had gotten on. Everyone stood in silence awaiting the judgement of their goddess.

After a minute Bianca decided they...
1553332233322222333122211321.title: Wiping The Slate Clean

15533322333222223331222113213.content:
The entire NXT women’s division stood silently awaiting the kernel new goddesses verdict on their work. They had been tasked with cleaning the 500ft Bianca Belair’s hand. The reason for this was because she had just ended poor Sara Amato’s life with it and this needed them to clean and pamper it to her liking.

The EST of NXT spend the next 5 minutes looking over ever single inch of her hand. She was looking for any trace of the had trainers blood or guts on there while also checking on the general cleanliness of her hand.

The women wrestlers below all waited impatiently. The suspense was killing them, they’d rather Bianca tell them immediately that they had done a bad job and get it over with. They all knew what would happen of they displeased the 500ft EST.

Finally after what felt like an eternity Bianca finally set her hand down by her side and leaned in so her face filled the entire arena. Everyone waited with baited breath just what this monstrous woman was about to decree.

To everyone’s surprise they saw for the first time that Bianca was smiling! Yes impossible as it seemed she was grinning from ear to ear.

“Well done on my fingers ladies! They are absolutely spotless! I must give special credit to my ring finger! It feels especially clean!” Bianca beamed.

At this Dakota and Tegan exchanged a relieved look. They along with Candace LeRae had shown the most fear of the towering giantess. With her giving them praise they hoped this meant she wouldn’t end their lives any time soon.

“Now can everyone who worked on my palm and the bald of my hand please step into the ring. Those who didn’t please sit in the stands. And be honest I’ll know who’s lying.” Bianca ordered.

The ones who had worked exclusively on Bianca’s hand all filed into the ring, whereas the finger and thumb group of Rhea Ripley, Shayna Baszler, Jessamyn Duke, Marina Shafir, Dakota Kai, Tegan Nox, Io Shirai, Mia Yim, Candice LeRae and Taynara Conti all headed to the stands.

The ones who remained in the ring were Vanessa Borne, Aliyah, Xia Li and Deonna Purazzo all remained in the ring. They all assumed they had done the best job and as such were especially smug.

Bianca leaned in close so she could see them all. Once or was clear who was on the ring and who wasn’t she continued her speech.

“Good now those of you in the stands did a perfect job. The same can’t be said of those in the ring.” Belair said ominously.

The mood in the ring suddenly changed. What was once confidence had now changed to fear. Vanessa Borne being the mourners of the lot decided she would chirp in her two cents.

“Erm you said before that we all did a great job on your hand. What did you change your mind or something?” Vanessa said angrily.

Bianca looked down at the ring and the person who had spoke out against her. Without saying a word Bianca stuck her massive hand into the arena. She then used her nail and brought it down suddenly...right where Vanessa Borne was...

Vanessa exploded into bits under Bianca’s immense Nail as half the women let out screams. Those in the stands were stunned whereas those in the ring were frozen with fear.

Bianca twisted her finger nail into the ring canvas a little bit leaving a a decent sized dent filled with the blood of Vanessa Borne.

“Before I was rudely interrupted. O said the job on my fingers was great. My palm on the other hand still had speaks of blood on it!” Bianca added.

Lifting her finger up she surveyed the damage and saw that a bit of her still remained on her nail. Shrugging she stuck it in her mouth and liked for the contents of the finger.

“Mmmmmm not bad...wonder what I’d be like fresh!” Bianca boomed.

Looking down at the terrified women in the ring, a big smile spread across her face.

“And I think I have just the volunteers.”

With that said she reached down and picked up the entire ring! The women on it were too high up to jump off as they clinged to the ropes for safety. Little good it would do them as they came face to face with the EST.

Everyone screamed and begged but it was no good as Bianca tipped the contents of the ring upside down so everyone was free falling towards her cavernous mouth!

The three remaining women all screamed as they passed by her lips and into the dark abyss. Feeling the hit the roof of her mouth Bianca straightened her head and began to chew.

Her mouth feel silent instantly as she chewed and grinded up the most useless of her women’s division. She chewed for a minute or o before swallowing their pitiful remains down her throat.

Satisfied with her snake Bianca lowered the ring back into the arena. She then looked at her top 10 women. They were all silent and still. This was good. They all fully grasped the pecking order now. But what good was a pecking order without a second in command?

That’s when she got a bright idea, the remaining women would compete in a match where the winner would become her head slave! It was genius.

Only question was what match would she make them compete in?

Since the remaining 10 women were the most featured female wrestlers in NXT, it only seemed fitting to hold a match to decide he head slave.

Now since she was 500ft tall Bianca could fit the ring comfortably in the palm of her hand with some space either side so that those who fell out of the ring wouldn’t fall to their deaths. However just to see sure they didn’t Bianca adjusted her belt.

Within seconds Bianca started to grow even bigger! Those in the ring all stood in awe as their giant goddess got even bigger! After a few seconds Bianca stopped when she was 1000 ft tall!

Now there was plenty of space for people to get eliminated form the match without falling off her hand! As she had made sure not to grow too big so she could still feel the little bugs on her hand. Just.

Once the ring was level with Bianca’s Face she leaned in close so she could see all her competitors. The women all cowered as the gigantic pupil of Bianca Belair looked right at them. The women were all tiny mites to her now. Even smaller than ants now. Satisfied she gave the order to start the match.

“DING-DING!!!” she boomed.

And the action was on. The Women pounced on each other with the hopes of eliminating one another. After several minutes the final 3/4 in the ring were...

Get the rest of the division in order
1553332233322222333122211321312.content:
The now 1000ft tall Bianca Belair held the tiny ring in the palm of her hand. In the ring were the wrestlers who would be competing for the honor of being her second in command or head slave if you will.

With the wrestlers ready on her palm Bianca announced that the match was ready to begin.

“DING-DING!!!” Bianca boomed.

With that the match was on as the women all ran at each other ready for a fight. First thing that happened was Rhea Ripley grabbed a cowering Dakota Kai by her hair and immediately tossed her from the ring. The New Zealand native hit the palm with a soft thud as Bianca felt someone hit her exposed skin.

Leaning in she sees who it has fallen and announces the elimination like an announcer would.

“AND FIRST OUT IS DAKOTA KAI.” Belair boomed.

She then placed her other hand next to the one holding the ring.

“ALL LOSERS STEP ONTO MY OTHER HAND.”

Dakota didn’t need to be told twice as she clambered over in hand onto the other at top speed. Bianca then turned her attention back to the ring.

Shayna Baszler And her Four horsewomen partners all worked together and lifted up Candice LeRae and dumped her out of the ring. They then all come face to face with Rhea Ripley who wasn’t one to back down from a challenge.

Ripley charged the three and knocked over the two stooges as she stood toe to toe with Shayna. After a quick brawl Rhea managed to clothesline the NXT women’s champion over the top rope!

Rhea taunted Shayna from inside but this would be her undoing as Jessamyn and Marina snook up on her and eliminated her as well!

On the other side of the ring Mia Yim low bridged a charging Io Shirai who fell over the top and out of the ring. However Taynara Conti immediately pounces and uplifts her out of the ring!

As the losers all made their way over to Bianca’s other hand, the 1000ft tall goddess made another announcement.

“AND WE’RE DOWN TO THE FINAL 4!!! JESSAMYN DUKE, MARINA SHAFIR, TAYNARA CONTI AND....OH WOW TEGAN NOX!!!” Belair booms.

Everyone was surprised that Tegan Nox had lasted all the way to the final 4. This was mainly due to Tegan cowering in the corner scared to do anything that would piss off Bianca.

Now that there was only 4 left Marina and Jessamyn smiled as they knew with two of them they would be able to eliminate the either two with ease.

Marina stepped up first ready to strike when out of nowhere Jessamyn grabbed her from behind and threw her from the ring! Marina landed on the hard skin of Bianca completely shocked as her best friend had betrayed her!

On the other side of the ring though somehow Tegan had stepped out of the way of a charging Taynara as the beauty hit the turnbuckle and was stunned! Jessamyn then ran over and delivered a ,associate big boot that sent Taynara tumbling over the top rope and to the ground!

“AND WE’RE DOWN TO TWO!!! IN ONE CORNER JESSAMYN DUKE AND IN THE OTHER TEGAN NOX!!!” Bianca boomed as Marina and Taynara joined the losers.

Jessamyn started running around the ring with her arms raised in excitement! Tegan clutching her jaw climbed onto Bianca’s waiting hand.

With the winner in one hand and the losers on another Bianca decided it was time to give her winner her reward. First things first though Bianca was wayyyyyy to big to do anything right now. So adjusting her belt she turns the dial and begins to gradually shrink until she’s back to her former 500ft tall self.

Satisfied Bianca lowers her hand and dumps the losers in the stands and carefully places the ring back in the arena. Bianca then whips out a small object from her pocket and lowers her hand and drops the device in front of Jessamyn.

“Congrats Jessamyn you’ve won the right to be my second command. As such you have earned my spare growth belt. Put it on and rise to heights like you’ve never seen before.” Bianca says to her.

Jessamyn within seconds has the belt on and turns the dial left as the growth overcomes her. Jessamyn grows until she’s 500ft tall, the same size as Bianca! However when Jessamyn turns to look her goddess in the eyes she finds herself looking at her crotch!

Jessamyn stood back in disbelief as her massive boot crushed the ring she had just vacated! The women in the stands all panicked and climbed the stands to get away from the giantesses!

Meanwhile Bianca was now towering over Jessamyn and everything as she was now once again 1000ft tall! Bianca meanwhile smiled down at Jessamyn who was looking up at her stunned.

“Oh my little Head Slave, you didn’t really think I’d give you the peer to grow bigger than me did you? No that’s my backup and I’ve adjusted it so there no matter how big you grow I’ll always be double your size! And if you don’t believe me watch what mine can do!” Bianca bellowed.

Bianca then turns her dial to the right and shrinks down, and st the same time Jessamyn shrinks down as well! Bianca stops as she reaches her 500ft size again and Jessamyn reaches a nice 250ft height.

“Now that the demonstration is over let’s move onto your first job as my head slave...I want you to...

15533322333222223331222113213121.content:
The entire wrestling world just gained another problem. Another huge problem! The towering giantess Bianca Belair who had a device enabling her to grow to unbelievable heights was now joined by another giantess whom she had gifted a similar growth device to.

Now along with Bianca Belair we had the MMA specialist and Four horsewoman member Jessamyn Duke! Now Duke had always been one of the tallest women in NXT standing at an impressive 6ft tall. But now thanks to winning the head slave battle royal she had been gifted with a size belt just like Bianca’s, however this belt would only ever allow her to be half the size of Bianca whenever the belts were in use.

Regardless Bianca was now her usual 500ft tall and Jessamyn was an impressive 250ft tall. And now both women were towering over the arena and its inhabitants like true goddesses.

Down below Shayna Baszler And Marina Shafir were looking up at their now giantess friend with smiles on their faces. Surely being friends with the head slave would mean they would receive favorable treatment too?

This question was soon answered as Bianca bent down on one knee and whispered something into Jessamyn’s ear. The giant mma fighter was stone faced as Belair finished talking to her.

“Ok now get to it Jessy.” Bianca ordered.

Jessamyn not wanting to displease her goddess looked down at the stands were all the women’s wrestlers were. They were all looking up to her in fear of her now giantess status.

Wanting to get a better view she drops down to one knee and leans down so her face is hovering over the women. Her eyes scanned the stands until they arrived at her target. Exactly where Shayna and Marina were standing.

Marina and Shayna look up delighted at their giantess friend, amazed by her magnified features. One of her eyes was the slightly bigger than them showing the massive size difference.

“Hey girl! Congrats in winning the battle royal!” Marina shouted up.

“Yeah and once we figure out the kinks we can find a way to get rid of Bianca and then we can all grow to unstoppable giantesses!!!” Shayna chimed in.

The tiny horsewomen were so ecstatic and excited that they didn’t notice the cold stare Jessamyn was giving them. Slowly she reached out a massive hand and brought it down towards her friends.

Marina and Shayna presumed that Jessamyn wanted them close so they could discuss strategies. However at the last second Jessamyn take shed huge thumb and brings to down fast and hard...right on top of Marina Shafir.

Marinas body exploded in a gorey mess of blood and guts as they splashed and rained over a stunned Shayna! The queen of spades wiped some of Marina off of her face and looked at her shaking hands as she registered what Jessamyn just did!

Terrified she tried to climb the stands in a desperate attempt to escape the giantess. Jessamyn simply reached out with her hand and plucked the struggling Shayna between her thumb and forefinger.

Looking down at her former leader with no emotion on her face, Jessamyn squeezed her two fingers together and watched as Shayna’s body popped just like Marinas as her blood and guys splatter over her fingers.

The women in the stand were all silently terrified. They had just seen Jessamyn kill her two best friends like the were nothing. If she was willing to do that to them then what would she do to them!

Jessamyn then stood up and walked over to the edge of the arena where Bianca was on her knees looking down at the gore her head slave had just caused. Jessamyn then held up her hand and showed it to Bianca with a sinister smile on her face.

“Satisfied goddess?” Jessamyn asked.

Bianca clapped and laughed as she clearly approved of her head slaves actions. She then patted her on the head before poking her head into the arena so she could address the remaining 7 women.

“Well as you just saw my head slave doesn’t play favorites and doesn’t tolerate insubordination. Now as long as you do what she says then everything should be ok for you!” Bianca said.

The women in the stands all nodded their understanding as their was still a level of unease amongst them.

Now that the pecking order had been updated the next thing that happened was...
15533322333222223331222113213121.title: Jessamyn’s Crushing Decision

155333223332222233312221132131211.content:
Bianca Belair looked down onto the arena that she towered over at 500ft tall. Inside it was her new head slave and fellow giantess at 250ft tall, the MMA expert Jessamyn Duke.

Jessamyn was standing inside the arena as she could still fit, although her upper body was poking out of it. Finally in the stands were 7 remaining NXT women’s wresters who had all accepted their fates as the two women’s slaves.

Jessamyn Duke looked down at the all the tiny women, who until minutes ago, she was the same size as! But now she was huge giantess now that she had proved her loyalty by crushing her former friends like bugs, she was ready to abuse her new size.

“Hey Bianca I’ve got a great idea. Since we’re both so big I think that our tired feet need to be attended to..,yano so we don’t get too worn out!” Jessamyn suggested.

The goddess Bianca looked down at her smaller head slate who came up to her crotch. After a few moments a big smile spread across her face.

“Oooh great idea Jessy! I like it! Go ahead let the little bugs know their job!” Bianca boomed.

Jessamyn smiled menacingly as she crouched down so she could see her cowering slaves. The remaining women were terrified of Jessamyn now, even the tough ones like Rhea and Io were scared, and Jessamyn loved this!

“Ok bugs you heard the boss, you tinies are gonna massage our feet and you won’t be allowed to stop until we tell ya to. Got it?” Jessamyn growled.

The women all shouted out that they understood and all made their way down from the stands and into the area where the ring used to be. They all flashed upon seeing the splintered remains of the ring they had all competed in minutes ago.

Jessamyn then took off her boots and showed off her long feet and toes. The women all stopped back as they saw they huge unlimited toes before them. They then heard a massive rumble as Bianca above them had wiped off her boots and released her huge feet.

Depositing her boots on a nearby apartment building...that was half demolished by the weight of them, Bianca flexed her toes excitedly. Jessamyn then took a step forward as the tiny wrestlers let out a squad of horror at the approaching feet. Nowhere before Jessamyn could give her order she was interrupted by Bianca.

“Hold up Jessy. Do me a favor and shrink down a little would ya? I can’t fit my feet in their with you so big right now.” Bianca said.

Jessamyn hated what was being asked of her, but she didn’t want to risk upsetting the giantess so she just smiled and nodded as she turned the dial on her belt to shrink. After s few seconds she had shrank until she was 100ft tall. Satisfied Bianca then places one humongous foot into the arena. Right next to jessamyn.

The women on the ground all gasped at the sheer size of the feet before them. The 100ft Jessamyn’s feet were big enough, but one of her feet was equal to one toe of the 500ft tall Bianca!

Jessamyn decided to take a seat, so she flopped her ass down on the stands and crushed most of them as she lay back and lifted up her feet so that the toes were facing the sky. Bianca being so big had to be satisfied with having her foot flat for this.

The two giantesses then wiggled their toes as the tiny wrestlers all gaped at the massive appendages. They were only snapped out of their stupor when Jessamyn spoke.

“Well get to work on our feet now.”

The women remained still, not sure whose feet to work on first. However they had no time to think as the massive booming voice of Jessamyn shouted down at them.

“I SAID NOW!!!”

That was the motivation they needed as 3 women, Tegan Nox, Candice LeRae And Taynara Conti headed to Jessamyn’s feet. Whilst Rhea Ripley, Dakota Kai, Io Shirai and Mia Yim ran to Bianca’s.

Within seconds all 7 women were rubbing, massaging and worshiping the feet of Jessamyn and the toes of Bianca. All the women were putting 110% into it as the giantesses above loved the sight and feeling their feet being attended to.

This went on for a good 30 minutes as the women became tired. Jessamyn’s feet were easier to deal with they were smaller and could be accessed via the stands. Bianca’s however were mid more difficult as a single tie was worth one of Jessamyn’s feet, so they had to climb up and work on each toe individually.

Finally after another 10 minutes the goddess Bianca called a halt to the foot massaging. Leaning down she simply wiped the resuming women off of her feet as she checked her handy work.

Jessamyn meanwhile lowered her feet and stood up to her full terrifying height as the women at her feet screamed snd ten out of the way of her approaching feet. Walking up to her goddess she found out that Bianca was happy with the women’s job.

But despite doing a good job, Bianca wasn’t done with jobs yet. In fact she wanted to...
155333223332222233312221132131211.title: Big and Bigger Foot Rubs!

1553332233322222333122211321312111.content:
Suddenly Bianca was struck by inspiration! She clapped her hands together in excitement and leaned down and picked up a stunned Jessamyn Duke. Since Jessamyn had shrunken down so Bianca could fit her foot in the arena she was only 100ft tall, she was the size of a small child compared to the 500ft Bianca!

“Woah what the fuck!” Jessamyn exclaimed as she was lifted up by her armpits and brought to Bianca’s massive smiling face.

Bianca swung her around like she was a mother holding her giggling child. Jessamyn was not giggling. No the massive MMA specialist was screaming as she swung around. Meanwhile the small NXT wrestlers were staring up flabbergasted at the sight before them.

The giantess who’s feet they had struggled to massage and rub earlier was now being picked up like a rag doll by a much higher giantess. Mia and Rhea shared a scared look, the first one either had openly expressed to another person since this began.

After a few more rotations Bianca stopped and looking at the dizzy Jessamyn smiled.

“Jessy! I’ve had a great idea! Now that we’re the undisputed giantesses of this world. We should be interviewed about it!” Bianca said with giddiness.

“Erm that’s cool and all Bianca but er...why would we need to do that?” Jessamyn answered a little unsure.

“Because my little Jessy. We need to let people know that we are here and that we’re in charge. And what better way than a tell all interview from the undisputed Goddess herself and her giantess head slave!” Bianca said beaming.

Jessamyn Underwood why Bianca wanted to do this. For so long she had been overlooked in NXT. Always a runner up. Always the bridesmaid and never the bride. But at them same time she felt s tiny bit of resentment every time Bianca referred to her as the head slave. Sure she knew there was hierarchy, but head slave was so demeaning.

However Jessamyn had to bite her tongue and wait for the perfect opportunity to take all of Bianca’s power for herself. So putting on a fake smile she said in a weirdly girlish voice.

“Oh my god Bianca you’re so right! An interview would be awesome! But Er who are you gonna get to do it?” Jessamyn asked.

“Hmm what are my options?” Bianca asked.

“Well there’s Charly Caruso.”

“No, her boobs are too big!” The rather flat chested Bianca said immediately.

“Er then there’s Jojo.”

“No way, her butts too big!” Bianca said, which was odd as her best feature was her rather large derrière. But compared to Jojo it was rather minuscule.

“Well I guess that leaves Cathy Kelly.”

“Cathy...ooooh cathy is a brilliant idea! Plain Cathy!” Bianca said happily.

“Well now that that’s decided..,how is she gonna interview us if she’s so small? And I’m pretty sure today is her day off so she said not even here...” Jessamyn asked.

At this Bianca smiled and slowly deposited her smaller head slave back into the arena. Jessamyn landed in her feet which still shook the ground causing Dakota Kai and Candice LeRae to fall flat on their asses. Bianca tone stood bad up to her full height outside the arena and smiled down at everyone.

“You just leave that me little Jessy. Now I’m just gonna pop out for a bit. You stay here and do whatever you want with the bugs. Ok see ya later!” Bianca said.

As the goddess turned to leave she turned her growth dial and quickly doubled in size until she was 1000ft tall again! With that she stomped off towards the city, leaving a trail of destruction in her wake.

With their goddess gone, Jessamyn looked down at the tiny women by her feet. She really wanted to throw her weight around and make the tiny women serve her...but she also wanted to win them over so they could potentially help her overthrow Bianca. So Jessamyn decided a different approach.

“Ok guys take 5 and go and rest in the stands. We don’t know how long Bianca will be so relish this rest while you can.” the 100ft Bianca said in a nicer voice.

Surprised but in no mad mind to argue, the wrestlers all made their way to the stand where some of them fell asleep immediately, whereas some just put their feet up and rested.

2 hours later

The women were all awoken by the booming footsteps of their goddess returning. To their surprise all they could see was a massive shadow. See Bianca had grown to an unspeakable 5000ft tall! She had done this so she could travel back at a much faster pace.

Jessamyn saw the gigantic form of Bianca towering over her snd realized she could use her belt to grow to at least half of this height! However just as she turned the dial Bianca shrunk down to her usual 500ft stature. Disappointed she only grew to 250ft.

“Hello my little bugs! Did you miss your goddess?” Bianca boomed.

Everyone cheered accordingly. With that Bianca pulled out of her pocket Cathy Kelly! Setting her down carefully by Jessamyn’s foot everyone noticed something strange, she was wearing a similar growth belt to Bianca and Jessamyn.

That’s when Cathy smiled and turned the dial as she grew to...

15533322333222223331222113213121113.content:
The arena fell silent. The seven NXT women who remained were all stunned as they watched their goddess Bianca Belair return. The 500ft tall EST stared down smiling at her tiny subjects and her head Slave, the currently 250ft tall Jessamyn Duke.

However Bianca wasn’t alone. From her pocket she produced wwe backstage reporter Cathy Kelly. Bianca lowered her down and placed her by Jessamyn’s feet. The mma specialist looked down loathsomely at the tony reporter. However to the astonishment of Jessamyn and the rest of the women wrestlers they saw Cathy was wearing a similar belt to that of Bianca and Jessamyn.

With a smile on her face she turned the dial on her belt and started to grow! Everyone gasped as they saw the minuscule reporter shoot up from her regular 5”7 height to 10ft, 50ft, 100ft!

Jessamyn stepped back as she watched Cathy reach her height of 250ft tall! She saw her shoot her a smile as she continued to grow right past her! Now Jessamyn had to look up and crane her neck as Cathy shot further and further towards the sky and Bianca.

Cathy was getting so tall that she had to set foot outside of the arena next to Bianca who was smiling mischievously. Finally Cathy stopped growing once she was the same size as Bianca Belair at a mighty 500ft tall.

Clapping her hands together Bianca stepped over and hugged the giant reporter who reciprocated happily. The women below couldn’t believe what they were seeing as they saw the two giantesses hug. However none was more surprised than the head Slave Jessamyn Duke who was furious that Bianca would allow a lowly reporter to grow to the same size as her, and worse bigger than her!

“Hey Bianca! How come her growth belt lets her grow to the same size as you? Mine only lets me grow to half your height!” Jessamyn yelled.

Bianca stopped hugging Cathy and looked down at her head slave with a look of annoyance on her face. Crouching down in her knees she looked into the arena so she was eye level with Jessamyn. The mma specialist gulped at this as she looked down coyly at her feet.

“Now let’s get on thing straight little slave. I don’t have to explain shit to you. Question me like that again in front of my tinier slaves and I’ll crush you like a bug.” Bianca said menacingly.

Jessamyn cowered and muttered an apology as Bianca stood back up with a smile plastered on her face.

“But since I’m such a nice giantess I’ll explain everything! Cathy has agreed to be my interviewer. But as such it would be foolish for me to shrink down to conduct it. So we compromised and i slowed her to use one of my extra growth belts. So now she can grow to the same as Me!” Bianca said beaming.

Cathy smiled as she put an arm around Bianca.

“Well you were quite convincing Bianca!” Cathy replied happily.

Bianca then had a quick flashback to an hour ago as she had stomped through town until she had located the hotel Cathy was staying at. So Bianca had decided to go all King Kong and stick her hand through the window and pull out the screaming journalist!

Snapping back into reality she just smiled shyly patted her interviewer on the back.

“However it does have a failsafe. In her growth belt is a chip that allows me to shrink her to any size whenever I want. So if she tries to betray me so i have to do is push this button and she will end up a bit to everyone!” Bianca said with a smile.

Cathy smiled awkwardly, she hated the fact Bianca had all this power over her. She had only agreed to this so she wouldn’t be crushed and also so she could perhaps save the rest of the women.

With that in mind Cathy had to choose he her move carefully. That’s when...

155333223332222233312221132131211131.content:
The outside world stood still. All they could see right now was a massive terrifying sight of two 500ft tall women casting a shadow over them. Most of the citizens had no idea who these giantesses were. But the few who did knew they were the EST of NXT Bianca Belair and the backstage reporter Cathy Kelly.

The two towering women were about to conduct an interview that would let the rest of the world know who the new ruler was. However there were a few variables or consider. One was that one of the giantesses wasn’t on the saw page with the other. Two was that there was a third sallee giantess known as Jessamyn Duke who was half of their size at 250ft tall. Three was that there was a resistance of NXT women left who wanted to stop all three of three.

However for the time being the world watched the giantesses standing by the arena ready to talk.

“Ok Cathy I’m ready when you are!” Bianca said happily.

“Woah hold up a second Bianca. I know you said we wouldn’t need a Camera, but wouldn’t it be much easier to be heard of we were bigger?” Cathy asked.

“Oh my god yes you’re so right! We should grow much bigger if we want to get my point across!” Ok let’s do it!”

“You go ahead Bianca, you set the height and I’ll grow once you’re done.” Cathy says.

Bianca nods and at once turns the growth dial. Instantly she shoots up words the sky. The est grows and grows, within seconds she is easily 10 x her precious size at an almighty 5000ft tall!

In her growth Bianca has upturned and crushed buildings along with countless lives! The giantess looks down at all the tiny buildings that can’t reach past her waist. She is truly the ultimate goddess.

Meanwhile in the arena Jessamyn watched amazed at the giantess size of Bianca as hunger spread across her eyes. Cathy saw this and leaned into the arena to talk to the 250ft tall mma specialist.

Say you can grow to half of her height right? What are you waiting for?” Cathy teases.

A grin spreads on Jessamyn’s face as she quickly turns her growth dial, she shoots up in height as she steps out of the arena and grows until She’s half the size of Bianca at 2500ft tall!

Jessamyn looks around at her not surroundings and laughs as she raises a foot and crushes a few vehicles to show dominance. Now with the two giantesses grown to incredible heights. Cathy pokes her face into the arena and addresses the 7 remaining NXT women.

“Ok we don’t have much time! I want to take down Bianca and Jessamyn and save the world and you! So I’ll place my foot into the Arena and you lot all climb in and hide. I’ll grow and you’ll all be safe whilst I distract Bianca with an interview.” Cathy explains to the women.

She then raises her huge foot and places it into the arena

Not wanting to argue or question her decisions the women all nod and head over to Cathy’s open toed heels where they all climb in and hide amongst her toes. Feeling the small NXT women Cathy turns her growth dial and grows until she’s the same height as Bianca!

Towering over everything and Jessamyn, Cathy takes to all in as a sense of power comes over her.

With that out of the way what happens next?

1553332233322222333122213.content:
Bianca Belair happened to walk into the NXT Women's locker room at the wrong time.

Best friends and mortal enemies of the women's division, Aliyah and Vanessa Borne were planning to gain an upper hand on the competition by using a shrink ray on the next person to walk into the locker room.

And unfortunately, that person was none other than the EST of NXT herself, Bianca Belair.

Belair couldn't even blink upon entering before being hit with a beam, shrinking her down to the size of a smartphone.

"Well, well, well... If it isn't mi-" Borne started, before being interrupted by the shocked Belair.

"What the hell are you guys doing?!" She yelled out.

And that was the last thing she said before Aliyah had to leave for her matchup with Shayna Baszler.

155333223332222233312222.content: Set after Survivor Series 2019. The three champions face off
155333223332222233312222.title: New Storyline

1553332233322222333122221.content:
(After Survivor Series 2019)

It was the night of Survivor Series. For the first time in history it was Raw vs Smackdown vs NXT. Raw, trying to show why they are the standard flag bearer in all of WWE. Smackdown, trying to prove that with their move to Fox that they will no longer be the Second Brand. And NXT, trying to show the world what the critics have been saying. That NXT is something else.

Every Man and Woman that wrestled today had something to prove, and that goes for the three Woman Champions as well.

With the night down and the crew packing up for the evening, the fans already left. Each champion walked through the building. Thoughts going into their minds as they have to stay and wait to leave. Thoughts through their mind as what happened.

For Becky Lynch, she was having mixed feelings. Sitting on a bench and resting she thought about the night. On one side, Raw no doubt lost this night. They only got one win and that wasn’t even hers. The woman’s 5 on 5 and the woman’s championship match. Raw lost both.

Becky wasn’t shocked about the first part, it was being led by Charlotte. Who hasn’t been able to step out of the spotlight. She saw what happened with Asuka, and she found it hilarious.

Bayley tapped out in her own match, so Baszler won. Then what happened net made her smile. Laying Baszler out and standing tall. She defiantly pissed of the Queen of Spades, and this makes her so excited. Ready to lay down another MMA wannabe who came into her division. She was the man after all.

For Bayley, it was the worst night it could of been. Walking through the hallway, grasping her neck as she can still feel the chokehold. Smackdown came in second, and the woman’s didn’t win a single one. At the start of the night, she had to watch her best friend Sasha Banks get so close, but lose it to NXT.

Then in the main event, she was treated like an afterthought by Becky and Shayna, and sad thing is that was how it was. She even ended up tapping out. Shayna won the match, Becky stood tall and Bayley got nothing.

This pissed her off to no end. She was suppose to be a different Bayley right now! She changed, it was suppose change her career. It didn’t though, and she still feels like the same loser who couldn’t win before.

For Shayna Baszler, pissed it the best was to describe her. In the construction set, throwing chairs around. How dare Becky! Messing with her, attacking her after she won the match. If it wasn’t such a cheap shot, she would of laid her ass out right there. ‘The Man’. What a stupid nickname she thought. Clearly Becky wasn’t a man cause she didn’t have the balls to Face Shayna like one.

Still it wasn’t the worst night. NXT no doubt won. Rhea won her match, and beat Raw and Smackdown. As much as Shayna doesn’t like that girl, she has to admit she knows how to kickass. Shayna felt that in War-games. Shayna won her match too, tapping out Bayley.

Shayna scoffed to herself. Bayley, she was so loved in NXT. And now look where she was, getting tapped out by the NXT champion. The thought just made her smile.

What didn’t make her smile was Becky, that-

“Damn, you look pissed!” A voice said with an Irish accent. Shayna turned and looked. Standing across from her, was Becky. Coming out from a door and smirking. Her stupid title over her shoulder. “Don’t like getting your ass kicked. Do you Shane.”

Shayna went over and grabbed her own title. Throwing the NXT Woman’s Championship over her shoulder “That was cheep shot you gave me before. So i suggest you leave right now, before i break all the bones in your hand.”

“Nah, i don’t think i’m gonna do that.” Becky said with a massive smirk “What i am gonna do, is walk past you. Get to my car, drive home and relax. You know, like a winner.”

“I won the damn match!” Shayna barked as Becky just smirked.

“Yeah, but we both know... i won the night.” Becky said, so much confidence.

The two looked at each other a fight approaching.

“Oh man...” A voice behind. They both turned around, seeing Bayley there still grabbing her neck. Her title over shoulder.

“Sup Bayley.” Becky said, seeing her.

“Don’t worry.” Shayna added seeing the effect. “I could of done a lot worse.”

“Look i’m just trying to go home. Let you two girls fight and leave.” Bayley said as she expected them to move out of the way, but they didn’t.

Shayna, was in the middle. So she was in the most danger. She needed to strike first. She moved up and dropped her title, running over to Becky as she started laying hits into her. Becky ready fired back, a brawl happening as the two champions fight. Throwing each other around and making a whole mess of the area.

Shayna was winning, due to her experience and training she was winning. Until she felt an attack from behind. Bayley, joining the fight and beating on Shayna.

“Just leaving my arse.” Becky said breathing a bit seeing the fight. Bayley has always been a fighter, but now she was attacking from behind more than before. She saw Bayley beat down Shayna and as much as she wanted to get Shayna down, Bayley was always in the fight.   And Becky wanted to show who the true champion was. She plunged over, tackling into Bayley as she started to lay hits.

The three woman fighting in the area, up in the air about who will win.

What they didn’t know though, was that there was something in one of the crates nearby. Something that can change sizes, and that will make the woman the true undeniable champion.

As they fight on, one of the woman get’s thrown into a crate. Landing on something interesting. Who was it?
1553332233322222333122221.title: The Three Champions

choices: Freaking out, going to her hotel and getting her sense together
Gonna look for Sasha, she would know what to do.
Smirking wildly, aiming the gun at herself ready to grow
15533322333222223331222212.content:
The brawl continued on for a little bit longer, until it was clear who was winning. With a knee to Becky and an elbow to Bayley. Shayna was standing up proud. Standing up powerful as she looked over at the weaker woman. Shayna grew a giant smirk as she went over and grabbed Bayley. Speaking into her ear.

“You’re a fucking joke Bayley. You were useless when you were a face, and useless when your a heel. Get out of my sight!” She said as she then grabbed Bayley. Tossing her straight into the crate. Not over it, but straight into it. Bayley fell over in pain as she laughed.

Shayna walked over and opened the lid. Grabbing Bayley and throwing her in. Throwing her in and shutting the lid. “Now stay out of this, you bitch.” Shayna said as she turned to Becky.

The woman from Ireland back up and ushering Shayna over, ready for a fight. Inside Bayley was hating this. Hating she wasn’t good enough to win, and hated that she literally was getting treated like an afterthought. She is the champion! A good champion too, and now she was being tossed.

Bayley got up, moving out as she looked over. She is not going to fight a losing fight. She was going to leave. She lifted it and took a look out.

Just in time for Becky to get laid out on the ground. A rough knee from Shayna. She turned around and saw Bayley peeking out.

“I fucking told you!” Shayna said as she ran over to Bayley. Her Heel instincts kicked in as she ducked down, trying to hold it down.

Shayna was much stronger though, as she lifted it up and started laying hits into Bayley. The former hugger trying to block the hits. Didn’t get much though.

“I threw you in there, and i’m gonna drag you out.” Shayna said as she stopped the hits. Grabbing Bayley and pulling her out.

Bayley panicked and tried to grab the bottle. She did not though as the thing she grabbed was out.

Shayna dragged Bayley out and wanted to put her out quick. Getting onto the ground, Shayna locked Bayley into her finisher the Clutch. The move that has made many woman pass out and Bayley tapped out to before.

Bayley struggled at first, trying to get out, but all her flailing did was lock herself in. Shayna making sure there was no escape.
 Bayley then did the next thing in her instincts. She started moving and tapping the arms. Doing it over and over again in hopes that she would stop.
 This was making Shayna lock it in more. That this kind of girl was a champion. A hugger or a coward. She has been a loser her entire life, and now Shayna was treating her like one.

Bayley was running out of air. She was running out of air quick, what will she do. What can she do? Suddenly she remembered something. Something within her hands.

It was an object! One that she could use! Well, if she was being honest it looks like a toy gun. Not that hard, like plastic. That didn’t stop her though, as she moved around and hit Shayna in the head with the hilt. Hitting hard as she did this a couple of times.

Shayna responded, by locking it in even more. Making her lose her air. Hitting her won’t help, so she went to shoot her with the toy gun. The most last ditch effort as she was about to pass out.
 She aimed it behind her and shot the gun. She shot the gun and it got Shayna to let go! Which was good cause Bayley was so out of it, she didn’t realise the certain effect the gun was having. Not even when she was laying on the ground, not on Shayna. Which was weird considering the position they were in. She shifted around for a while, getting onto her knees and grasping her still sore neck. At least she was out. She has got to leave, she has got to move. She has got to escape from this fight.

As she was about to move though, she looked down. Right where her head was laying, and she was left beyond shocked. Her eyes wide open as she sees Shayna. Unconscious.

Not only unconscious, but small. Very small. Only a couple of inches tall! Almost like a doll. She was out, and Bayley only had one reason. It was... the gun?

“What the fuck...” Bayley said to herself catching her breath and freaking out a bit. She just... shrank her. This must be like a size gun or something! Looking over it, she became concerned about what was happening.

“Where!” A voice said as Becky got up, wiping the sweat and blood from her nose “Where the fuck is Shayna!” Becky looked around for a bit, until her eyes landed on Bayley. Walking over she pointed “Where is she Bayley! Tell me right now!”

“Fuck! Stay away!” Bayley panicked as she did what she probably shouldn’t. She shot Becky. A blue beam coming out and hitting Becky. The girl going down to size, around the same as Shayna. Maybe an inch taller. This also had a similar effect on Becky. She fell down onto the ground, out of it as Bayley was the last woman standing.

“What the fuck!” Bayley said dropping the gun. She stood tall and looked at the tiny girls. She moved over, running over and lifting the crate. Digging in for anything that she can find to help her figure this shit out. Eventually she found a piece of paper. Pulling it out.

‘To Stephanie McMahon, the size ray that you ordered from us has been perfected. After years or work, it is fully functional. First effect will knock the victim unconscious, but repeated exposure will make the effect less dazing. May you grow into the goddess we all know you are.’

“Holy fuck...” Bayley said as she took a while. A long while to think, as she moved over and grabbed the two tiny girls. Then the gun in the other hand. Bayley was _________________
15533322333222223331222212.title: Bayley Wins The Brawl

155333223332222233312222122.content:
Sasha Banks was sat on the couch in the locker room with a bag of ice pressed against her neck, still bitter over her loss to NXT earlier in the night. Suddenly the locker room door burst open, revealing Bayley.

"Sasha! Sasha!" Bayley panted as she burst into the locker room, luckily finding her best friend as the only occupant.

"What is it Bay?" Sasha arched her eyebrows in concern. She'd never seen her friend look so panicked, and she looked like she'd been sprinting all around the arena.

"I...I...I did something. I didn't mean to, it just sort of happened and I-" Bayley babbled, unclear of how to explain the situation. She might be far more mentally tough and ruthless than she'd ever been, but she was still in a state of shock.

"Bayley, BAYLEY!" Sasha shouted to snap her friend out of it as she grabbed hold of her hands and gently pulled her to sit down beside her. "Take a deep breath, and explain to me what happened."

Bayley did so, and explained the events that had just taken place. How she'd walked into a fight with both Becky and Shayna. Shayna tossing her into a crate, finding a toy gun. Only it wasn't a toy gun; it was a shrink ray! She'd accidentally shrunk Shayna, and then Becky. And it was supposed to be intended for Stephanie McMahon's use for, presumably, evil intentions.

When Bayley had finished her tale, Sasha burst out laughing. "HAHA, wow Bayley, did you come up with that tonight, or have you been working on that for a while?"

The SmackDown Women's Champion frowned. Clearly Sasha didn't believe her. "I'm telling you the truth, I swear!"

"Oh yeah? Well show me them then," Sasha retorted, an amused expression on her face.

That expression turned to surprise after Bayley reached into her pocket and pulled out two tiny versions of Shayna Baszler and Becky Lynch. Each two inches tall, and certainly lifelike.

"I didn't know they made action figures that small," Sasha spoke up.

"I'm telling you, it's actually them."

To test Bayley, Sasha reached forward and rubbed her finger along the limp form of both the tiny forms in Bayley's hand. She gasped as she felt skin beneath her fingertip, not plastic. Bayley had been telling the truth.

A gleeful grin crossed Sasha's face, her eyes shining with eagerness to play with and torment the two shrunken women for everything they'd done to her.

Shayna, for attacking her multiple times in the weeks prior, and for being part of NXT, whose team had defeated her unfairly earlier in the night.

Becky, for walking out the better woman the previous month at Hell in a Cell, and because she'd always secretly admired the Irish woman's body in their long history together. Now she could use that body to serve hers.

What happens next?

1553332233322222333122222221.content:
It was news to be sure. Cathy Kelly, NXT Correspondent and interviewer leaving WWE and going on to pursue newer ventures. The interesting part though, was what she was going to do next.

Let’s step back a bit, when Cathy first got hired by WWE, to say she was a bit over her head would be an understatement. Sure she wasn’t new, but she wasn’t talented enough to be on a show. But she learned, and she evolved. She quickly became one of the brands greatest parts, and she wasn’t even part of the NXT roster.

She remembers when she went through the comments for the first time, eager to see what everyone would be saying of her. She was confident that some constructive criticism would come, only for her to find so many comments about how sexy she was. It was a boost to her ego that was for sure. And those comments followed her, her entire career even when she left.

One comment was getting her interest though, and she found it all the time by Giantess Lover229. “Cathy Kelly is my favourite goddess.

After seeing it five times, she looked at Giantess and well, she was hooked. Being the strongest, biggest and a goddess. Well why would she not. It was just a dream but she commented and DM’ed the subscriber.

‘Hey between you and me, thanks for the boost.’

And almost instantly she got a reply. ‘Cathy Kelly OMG Love you! I wish you were giant! Please let me send you something. You will love it!”

She of course would say no, but she listened about it and thought. Why not. Worse she will get is a jizz sock.

The best she would get, is what she actually got. What she actually got, was a growth ray. She didn’t believe it, but after testing it she found that not only did it work, but worked well. She grew a mere pot plant into a tree, and that was only the start.

So that was why she left NXT and WWE, to move onto bigger and better things. She was standing in the middle of the city, a couple of days. She was just dealing with all the things that she felt like ‘Humans’ would do. Cause at this point, she was going to be more. She decided to wear one of her sexy dresses, feeling like it would be best for her to be in that. A Goddess is suppose to be divine and the lust from everyone, even her beauty.

So right now, she was wearing a smile and her favourite dress.

https://i.imgur.com/w0el3VQ.jpg

Sure, she could just grow more later. Oh she is surely going to have so much about it. She breathed in and out, getting her grips together at first, as she finally decided what she wanted

She wanted to be a goddess. She aimed it right at herself, right at her chest. It was a unique gun. It send a beam from the tip, and the longer you hold, the bigger it will get. It doesn’t have a set value so you have to make your best estimate. It grows with the user, which is also nice. She can use it when she is big as well.

Another thing was that it could also work to shrink someone else down. With a simple switch of the toggle. Sure she was never going to use it, but still it was nice.

Regardless, now was the start of her fun, as she told around.

“All of you listen, this is the last you will see of normal Cathy Kelly.” She said, but no one paid her mind. Something that she was going to like though, because when she is bigger the whole world will listen to her.

She could not wait anymore! As she shot herself, and her body grew. Her body grew up, as she felt everything get bigger, and the world get smaller. She was seven foot, and grew up more. She looked around, noticing the world so small! She was 15 feet in no time as she didn’t stop pulling the trigger.

She grew up so many times, and when people finally noticed her she loved it. Everyone was like children now! Even the tallest of men didn’t even come up to half her waist.

Panic was all around her, but it was not the end. Cause right now, more growing was happening! She grew to thirty feet, as they were all children at this point.

She couldn’t say a word, as she was laughing to much. It was a bit ticklish, and seeing everyone’s stunned reactions made her love it.

Even the car’s were stopping right now, marvelling at the size of the thirty feet old sexy woman.

She kept growing though, she kept growing more and more until finally she was fifty feet tall! She stopped for a second.

A smile as she looked around. Everyone’s eyes were on her. She was around the height of most buildings, and the ones that were bigger then her, she can beat in a second. Still she was going to address all the ones so small and so useless to her.

“Listen!” She said with a giggle. “My name is Cathy Kelly. Some of you might know me from NXT, but those that don’t, don’t worry. I am a giantess, and will be your new goddess.”

She heard some confused sounds as she kept it up. “New goddess?”
“Why is she so big?”
“Is that really Cathy Kelly!”

She responded to all this, as she shot herself up again! Growing high into the air more and more. So many times as she ascended into the air. Passing the buildings that were above her before.

With a smile, she brought it off and looked at her new height. So much faster, cause her body is use to it.

“Oh, this is a size to really have fun with.” She said with a massive laugh. “At ______ feet tall, nobody can stop me!”
1553332233322222333122222221.title: Cathy Kelly Becoming A Goddess

choices: She drops them over her body
15533322333222223331222222213.content:
When Cathy let go, she was around 500 feet tall compared to everyone else. It was surreal, seeing the world in a whole new light. Everything around her was like a model, not even being real. Buildings seems like nothing but fool stools to her. She could probably flatten under her boot! She hasn’t even gotten to the humans. All of them looked like bugs to her! Not even worth caring about!

“Oh my god!” She said with shock, only for a smile to then go on it as well. She was truly a goddess. 500 foot might of been too big too fast, but she did not care at the moment. She was loving it. Everyone’s eyes were on her, and for good reason.
 With her smile, she talked to all of them. “Now listen!” She said with a laugh. “You can run, but it doesn’t matter. It’s mine, it is all mine!” She said happily as she looked around. There was a building next to her, only coming around to her knees.

She needs to display her power, her absolute power. With a smile she brought her leg back, everyone seeing the goddess bring her leg back as it was a sight to be sure.

Then, with zero care, she brought her leg forward and kicked. The building exploding like it was filled with TNT. All brought down into rubble as it went flying through the air. Cathy rested her foot onto the rubble heap. Her heel stabbing into the ground as she looked at her handiwork. That building was huge, and now it was nothing. Nothing because of Cathy.

She wore a smile as she looked around to all of them, as she talked to them. A more devious smirk on her face.

“Run.” She echoed through the city as the bugs all went and did just that. She could hear little distant screams as they were all fleeing. The crowd terrified of her, and that was making this even better.

Something great was that while all of them were running, none were getting away. She was far to big.

With a smile, she stepped several steps forward. Heading forward as she lifted her foot up into the air. Before then stomping her heel down onto the fleeing crowd. She killed plenty, a lot crushed under her unstoppable heel.

She held it there as she saw them all panic and run away. Scurrying some more like the bugs they were. She gave out a maniacal laugh as she was bathing in the death she just caused. She loved it, and she was not going to stop.

With laughter above them, the small people looked up to see the heel coming down. Stomp after stomp as more and more die. It was chaos, and within seconds Cathy was a mass murderer. She didn’t care though, because she was a powerful goddess. Above all the gods. Eventually she stopped, seeing the commotion come up and the crowd down. About half of them was left.   Wanting a more intimate situation with the bugs, she put the giant growth ray down onto the building.
 Wasting no time as she gets down onto her knees. Probably killing people under them, but she wouldn’t know. She did not care at this point.

She got down and leaned forward, her eyes on the tiny as she moved her hands around. She moved her hands around and grabbed him, lifting a few into the air. Depositing them onto the palm if her hand as she steals a lot of them. At first, she had trouble on gripping them.

Finding that she was far too strong for these bugs and literally squeezing the life out of them. Normally she would care she was killing, but she was not right now. She considered herself a goddess, and why would a goddess care. A dangerous mind set for sure, but not for her. For all the tinies in her hand.

Once she had enough of them, she moved her ass around, sitting down onto the road. Everyone has pretty much scattered away. Not that she minded.

It would be easy to find them.

As she lowered her ass down onto the ground, she flattened street lamps, cars and traffic lights. Not that it was even feelable to her.

She was that big.

As she lifted her hand, she could see them all squealing around. She had a lot of them, about fifteen.

She tried to hide her smile, but couldn’t. Moving two of her fingers down and grabbing one. It was a big burly man, probably was ripped enough to become a wrestler himself.

That thought she loved. Maybe she will go visit some of the NXT stars. See how they feel knowing the interviewer was unstoppable.

Regardless right now she shifted her gaze back onto the man, talking to him with a smile.

“Aw, you are so cute. Cute and powerless. You are unable to do anything to me and... wait are you trying to fight your way out!” She said leaning in her eye, a big smile on her face as she saw the pathetic attempt he was making. “All this muscles, and they aren’t worth anything.” She said with a laugh and a giggle.

This was not going to be it though, as she moved her fingers closer not to her eyes, but to her mouth.

“Well if you want to be let go. I will!” And with that, she opened her mouth and let him down. Letting him drop right down into her mouth. He screamed as he went by her lips and teeth. Going down under as she felt him hit his tongue, and fall even more.

Falling right down her throat as she swallowed him. The first human she has ever eaten, and most likely the not. Everyone on her hand was scared and frightened, and it got even worse as they watched him shift her eyes right down to them. Meaning they were next.

Cathy was having a debate in her own mind. As the self appointed goddess looked down at all the people in her hand, her mind went to many things. Many things she could do with the small defenceless crowd she had. Drop them down into her dress was one she liked, plucking out their lives one by one with her all powerful finger. Make them worship her, all bowing to her.

All good ideas, but there was one idea that kept coming back. One idea that she really wanted to do.

She brought her hand and lifted it up, a smirk on her face which worried a lot of them. Doesn’t change the fact though, that she was loving it. They were all looking at her, which means she was going to continue.

“Now, I want to hear what you all say. Shower me with praise. Please tell me.” She said, moving her head to the side. Bringing her fingers around and showing off her ear. She probably doesn’t want it, but she would be filled with so much delight to have one of the little ones dive into her ear.

She waited for a long while, until she heard.

“Y-You are beautiful.”

“Giant, A-And powerful!”

“Too powerful, please don’t eat us!”

They were all talking about this, about her. Giving her praise so many times as she was enjoying it. The words were great, and it made her feel more like a divine being then ever before.

She let them shower her with words for a little bit longer until she looked back to them. Some of them jumping just because her giant head turned.

A big smile on her face as she talked down to them. “Well thank you for that! It’s always nice to hear some sweat words. The thing is though, it is not going to save you.”

It was at this point some of their faces turn to horror. “It’s really bad timing for you if i’m being honest. When I am feeling so... hungry.”

She could swear that some of them wanted to run and jump off her hand. She was just not going to let them. With a lift of her hand she had one final look at their terrified faces, as she then opened her mouth and dropped right in.

Dropping them right in and down into her mouth. She heard screams, and loved it as they really went down. Pass her teeth, down her tongue and finally towards her throat. She swallowed all of them, getting them all into her mouth as she finally rested.

She could feel their small and minuscule bodies down her throat as it was a weird feeling to accept.

She just ate some people, like they were nothing but rice. She couldn’t help but love it. So she was going to move on. They most likely won’t be the last people she eats.

In a weird way, she likes being a man eater.

With a smile, and without direction she looked around. Between the grabbing of other people and the eating, people were fleeing. Not one brave soul was looking at what she was doing. She didn’t care though, as she was going to continue.

Taking multiple steps, going forward as she destroyed everything under her feet. She was looking forward, towards all the buildings as she wanted to see something. She quickly went to a building, one that was close to her and tall. Barely up to her waist. She took a couple of steps and bent over, seeing all the frightened office people of the giant building.

Cathy looked at all of them as they were like frozen in a headlight. With a simple wave and a smirk, she brought her hand forward and poked through the glass. It was like it was made of nothing.

She destroyed the inner workings of the building, creating havoc as she waved her hand around. Burying people under desks and computers, ramming into them with her finger and even flicking one woman outside of the window. That would of been a long fall that was for sure. She didn’t care though, this was a test.

Pulling her hand out she moved it down to a lower part of the building. This was going to be a test of strength. With a smile she brought her through the building. Slicing it like butter as she broke the building. The top half falling on the second half as it shuttered. Cathy looking down as the building gets demolished, a surge of pride at her power.

Looking around, she was going to have to go for a long walk to find people in the street, so that is what she was doing. A very chilling and scary. “I’m coming~” Uttered from her voice, one that she was sure would send chills down the cities spine. She walked down the street, having a bit of struggle. First she looked at the ray. She put it on top of another building as she made sure that the trigger was over the ledge. No normal sized human could reach it, let alone pull it.

Satisfied she went and left, looking for more little toys to play with it.

-

She went several blocks, but to her in this toy city, it was a simple walk and a simple move. She found all the other toys, and perfectly they couldn’t drive away. Seems her little outburst had alerted the city and they were all trying to flee VIA car. Problem with that though, the road got blocked up. Some got of their cars, but most were staying down and hiding.

“Wait a second...” She uttered to herself. “I know that car! I’ve seen it at Fullsail!” With a smile she took a couple of steps, stomping on some cars as she reached down.

It was the same car, she was sure of it. Her fingers gripping both sides as she lifted the toy.

It was the car of ______________

It was the car of Bianca Belair! Cathy could not hold back her smile as she frankly could not wish for someone better. She didn’t hate Bianca, but she knew how egotistical the girl was. Sure, she was one hell of an athlete, but she always talked down to Cathy, like she wasn’t good enough.

Oh how things have changed. Cathy made her way forward, taking steps and coming closer as she chased the car. It panicked and tried to go, but Cathy was on it before it could really move. The traffic of course didn’t help.

Her hand dropped down onto it. Her fingers spread out like a claw machine as she brought it up to her eye. Bringing it up high and smiled. It was so small, and so adorable that frankly she couldn’t believe she used to ride in one every day.

She raised it up and rested the car in her hand, denting the car roof but knowing it didn’t matter. Her eye was brought to it as she loved what she was seeing.

“Oh, hi there Bianca! Fancy meeting you once again.” She teased, seeing the young black woman scared and afraid. In casual clothes and of course, her hair in a braid. She made a habit of this.

Montez wasn’t in the car with her, but that didn’t matter to Cathy.

She wanted Bianca. She moved over and lowered her rear down onto the nearest building. She sat down onto the chair, and the building almost cracked. The small people trying to run out and escape, running between the columns that was her feet. Her eyes still not on them, but on Bianca. The woman frantically trying to hide herself from view and locking the doors.

“Bianca, can you come out.” Cathy said sending her a beautiful smile. “I want to talk to you.”

She waited for a long time for any response, but it was not coming. “Bianca, don’t make me come get you.” She said, her eyes open in a scolding manner. She waited for a long while and once again nothing. “Well, alright then.” She said bringing her finger forward and poking the front screen. Which shattered instantly when it came in contact with her nail.

She screamed out loud and fear arose. That finger was too powerful. “I’ll come out! I’ll fucking come out!” She said with a scream and a panic. She understood and brought her finger backwards, bringing it back.

She watched as the small Bianca got out of her car. A little hesitant to step onto the palm,but knowing it was too survive. As soon as she was out of the car, Cathy reached her fingers down and grabbed the car, tossing it aside to the ground, flattening a couple of people. In Cathy’s mind, it was as simple as clearing some room.

“See, now we can talk.” She said loving the little girl freaking out.

“What the fuck is happening! What the fuck happened to you!?” Bianca said panicking at the moment. It makes sense.

“Bianca, you know the rules. No cuss words here.” Cathy said scolding her with a smile. “And you know how it goes. Wanted to be giant and sexy, but I was only sexy. So I got a growth ray and... well look at me. I’m about to rule this entire world. Feels pretty great.”

Bianca couldn’t believe it. This was Cathy Kelly. The woman she flexed in front of to make her feel so little. How the tables have turned.

“Cathy,” Bianca started, looking at her and talking. “Whatever ill will you have towards me, whatever I did. I am so amazingly sorry for it. I am.”

Cathy couldn’t help but chuckle. She was trying to plead for her safety. Cathy was about to take full advantage of this. “Well, bow and all is forgiven. I am a merciful goddess.”

Bianca didn’t want to, but she was smart enough to know she can not do anything to Cathy at this size. She got onto her knees and lowered her body once, and only once. She did this as she waited.

“hehe, i’m just messing with you Bianca. Sure, you were a bit of a bitch sometimes, but then again so is ever girl. Even me, as amazing as that sounds.”

Bianca was left confused, and had to ask. “T-Then why do you have me?”

“To have some fun of course!” Cathy said, as she pointed her and touched into Bianca’s chest. Pushing her back she fell down as Cathy giggled. Of course she was going to mock this rare opportunity.

“Wow Bianca, I’ve never noticed you got small tits. Have they always been that small, or did you get reduction.”

“Cathy...”

“I mea just look at mine. They are so much bigger!” She said leaning forward and bringing her hand close. She let her look right down under as she got her eye onto it. She even grabbed one hand and pushed down onto it, showing it off. “Mine are pretty big though, so maybe yours is just tiny by comparison. What do you think? Are my tits big?”

“Yes, of course they are!” Bianca yelled, a bit confused about how the girl is treating this.

“I know, just wanted to hear you say it.” Cathy said with a chuckle. She brought her finger and pointed, Bianca panicking thinking she was gonna get knocked down again, but instead she pointed over her shoulder. Showing Bianca all the small people on the ground. “Look at them, they are all nothing but bugs to me now. I don’t even see them as equals, I see them as plaything. Playthings I can treat them however I want. Anyway I want.”

It was so weird hearing Cathy say this, but she was so scared of her at the same time. Scared of Cathy kelly? The idea was laughable before, when she was normal size.

“They are all... playthings? W-Wait, what about me?”

Cathy looked at her with a smile "________"

Bianca grew until finally, the building couldn’t take her growing weight. Her foot breaking the ground under her and she felt herself destroy the building under her. She backed up a bit, Cathy satisfied with her work as she stopped the growing. She let Bianca look up and around, her eyes on the now smaller world she was forced to be with. Until her eyes laid on Cathy, and she was still a bit intimidated, but not fully.
 She was around waist height to Cathy. She was smaller than her, but bigger than the entire world. So many ideas went through her mind, so many if she was allowed to do it.

“You don’t have to thank me Bianca.” Cathy said with a smirk. “However, you got to understand, this is mine. No touch.” She said as she thought about it for a second. Should she put it on a building? Wait wasn’t there that button.

Touching a button on the side, the gun reverted to it’s original height. Nothing but a toy to her now. She could barely hold it in her fingers, and it would be difficult to hold it. Although she knows that button will change it back to the user’s height.

“Now Bianca, how about we go have some fun with this world. You wanna show just how strong us woman are?”

15533322333222223331222222221.content:
Backstage life in WWE had changed substantially over the last lot of years. Many had come and go and each one was as expendable and forgettable as the last. Except for one.

WWE’s latest backstage interviewer had gone from simply holding a microphone and asking mundane questions, to becoming the every woman in WWE. And that as woman was Charly Caruso.

Charly was doing it all. She was interviewing superstars, she was hoisting pre shows, she was announcing wwe network shows. The sky was really the limit for this wwe talent.

But things weren’t always gonna stay this way. In fact they were about to change sooner rather than later.

Monday night raw

It was another action packed night in wwe. The crowd was pouring into the arena. It was to be another memorable night. Except it would be memorable for more reasons than you’d think.

Backstage, Charly Caruso had just finished having her makeup done. And boy was she looking good. The stylists and makeup team had outdone themselves, their talent mixed in with Charly’s existing beauty had resulted in ms Caruso looking stunning!

She was wearing a gorgeous red dress that showed off her curvaceous form. Charly knew she looked good and was feeling great about herself, unfortunately there were people who wanted to make her feel insignificant.

Sat in the women’s dressing room, she was making a post for her instagram account when the locker room door flung open. The quiet tranquil locker room was suddenly filed with the sounds of incoherent squawking. And it sounded Australian.

“And then I said, you gotta be joking me!”

“No way Billie that is so Iconic!”

“So Iconic Pey!”

The duo that had just walked in were wwe’s resident Aussies, Billie Kay and Peyton Royce the IIconics! The stunning duo were too busy talking and galavanting that they almost missed Charly completely.

“Oh look who it is Billie!” Peyton said teasingly.

“Well if it isn’t Charly! Man I thought a got a lot fatter!” Billie taunted.

Charly just ignored the two. She was used to these Aussie bitches insulting her and honestly she never let it get to her. But today these two decided to really push their luck.

“Man Charly did a blind peons do your makeup? Or did you just wake up like that?” Peyton said.

“Ooooh good one Pey. And where did she get that dress? It looks like she’s wearing a table cloth!” Billie added.

The two IIconics then laughed their heads off as they began to flick Charlys hair. That was the final straw for her. Slapping away their hands she turned and glared.

“Get your hands off me! Man how can you tow stand the sound of yours own voices, it’s like two pelicans fighting over a fish!” Charly snapped.

Billie and Peyton stopped laughing. The smiles faded from their faces and were replaced with scowls. The two Aussies then grabbed Charly by her hair and threw her to the ground. Charly hit the ground hard as the two Aussies started laughing again.

“Yeah that’s right Charly, on the ground like you belong!” Billie taunted.

“Yeah now stay there whilst the real stars of the show go and do our thing!” Peyton added.

With that the IIconics left laughing. Charly struggling to hold back tears rubbed her knee. She had had enough of being walked over those two. She wanted respect but she didn’t know how she could get it. Until it happened.

A gust of wind suddenly swept through the air as Charly covered her face. When she lowered them she was greeted to the sight of a tall female figure wearing a bright pink robe and a lucha mask. She offered her hand to Charly who took it cautiously.

“Er thanks...” Charly said as she was helped to her feet. Once there she eyed the mysterious figure. This was like something out of a fantasy novel.

Charly was about to leave when the figure spoke.

“Charly. You have been overlook for so long. But that is about to end. Here take this. With this you will get what is coming to you. Use it well. Ajd if you ever need me you need only call me.” the figure spoke in a heavenly voice.

Charly turned but as she did the mysterious figure had vanished and in its place was bottle of clear blue liquid. It had one simply word printed on it.

“Drink”

Cherry eyed it suspiciously. Normally she wouldn’t take drinks from complete strangers, but this day couldn’t get any worse. Shrugging her shoulders she opened the bottle she chugged the contents. A weird tingling sensation overcame Charly.

What happened next?
