155333223332222233312222222211.content:
Having just drank an unknown clear blue liquid, Charly Caruso felt a weird tingling sensation overcame her. Dropping the bottle, she watched in slow motion as it hit the ground and exploded in a wave of shiny shards.

Something was happening to Charly. She felt strange. Not bad, but definitely strange. Her body was reacting to that weird liquid the magical masked stranger gave her, and now she was regretting every decision she had ever made.

Charly headed to the bathroom and pushed open the door. She stumbled to the sink and splashed water in her face. Her hands were clinging to it for support. Looking into the mirror she saw that somehow her makeup hadn’t been ruined.

Confused Charly splashed more water in her face. Once more the makeup didn’t vanish. Startled she licked her thumb and wiped it on her forehead. Nothing happened. In fact Charly didn’t even feel a single drop of makeup on her skin.

Stretching up she held her face in her hands as she tried to grasp what happened to her. She tried to splash her face with more water to wake up, but when she looked in the mirror she wasn’t she wasn’t staring at her reflection. She was looking at a wall.

Startled Charly looked down at her body. She couldn’t believe what she was seeing. Somehow she had grown taller! Taking a step back Charly gazed at her newly grown body. Now Charly was a little on the short side when it came to her size. She was just below average height at 5”2. But the woman that stood in this bathroom was now 7ft tall!

“What the Fuck. What’s happening?” Charly asked.

She must be hallucinating, she couldn’t have just magically grown nearly 2 feet taller! Slashing her face with more water she stumbled out of the bathroom slapping herself. She must be imaging all this, there must have been some LSD in that bottle. It maybe the IIconics had drugged her when they pushed her down earlier. It was all very frightening.

“Don’t right it Charly. Embrace it.”

There it was again. That weird persons voice sleeping through her mind. She must be tripping on something. But part of her wanted to listen to the voice.

“They all think you’re small and weak. You’re not small and weak. You are big and powerful.” the voice ringed out.

Yeah! You’ve been walked over and treated as a small weakling your whole life. No you are big and powerful!

As Charly embraced the voice her body responded to her inner thoughts. Her body began to stretch as she grew in height! This time Charly noticed the growing sensation and smiled as she grew taller and taller. Once she reached 20ft she had to collapse onto her knees as she was too tall for the room she was in.

Miraculously her red dress didn’t Rip or tear. In fact it grew with her as did her heels and accessories. Smiling Charly marveled at her 20ft form. She was big and powerful. And now she wanted to flaunt it.

Crawling to the door she pushed it and to her pleasant surprise it burst right off the hinges! She was powerful now! Grinning she squeezed through the door and began her life as a giantess.

What did Charly do first?

Charly Caruso was well on her way to being on top of the world. She had drank a mysterious liquid that had let her grow to 20ft tall! She could feel the power flowing through her as she crawled through the locker room door and out into the production area.

In the much bigger production area Charly was able to sit up a little bit more with her incredible 20ft stature. On her knees With her hands on her hips she looked down at all the small crates of equipment, down the tight corridor and across at the doors that barely reached her hips, she felt powerful.

But the question was what was she going to do now that she had this mysterious power. That’s when she remembered what happened before she had her growth spurt.

She was being bullied and berated by the IIconics! Those Aussie bitches had the audacity to put their hands on her! Who the hell did they think they were? What because they were tall and pretty it meant they could push around smaller women like her? Well like she used to be!

With revenge on her mind and payback fueling her every action, Charly smiled as she crawled her way over to the IIconics locker room.

Meanwhile

In a private locker room with easy access to the parking lot for a quick and efficient exit, two self centered Australian women sat across from one another talking at a speed no Human would be able to comprehend.

Billie Kay and Peyton Royce were two beautiful young women, both had among bodies with Supple breasts and bountiful asses, and both had legs that stretched for days. Both of them were fairly tall for women at 5’7 and 5’8 and once they had on their platform heels they were over 6ft tall!

The two then hugged as they were suddenly interrupted by a knock at the door.

“Oh my god! We said we didn’t want to be disturbed until our match!” Billie groaned.

“It’s Charly Caruso!!!” a voice rang through the door.

Peyton and Billie smiled at each other. This was perfect, their victim had actually come to their locker room. Once she was inside they could bully her freely until their match!

Heading to the door Billie opened it ready to grab Charleys hand and pull her in. However when she opened the door she found herself not looking at Charly’s face but at her tits.

Billie Kay was stunned as the humongous body of Charly took up the entire doorframe, she was huge! Lost for words she was soon joined by Peyton who was equally stunned. The shorter woman from earlier was now a 20ft giantess smiling down at them!

“Awww hey guys what’s wrong? Cat got your tongue?” Charly grinned.

Not waiting for an answer Charly took her hand and flicked Billie with her finger, the Aussie was thrown right into Peyton as the two of them were thrown onto the locker room floor.

Charly let out a huge laugh as she reveled in the power she had.

“Wow you guys are so small and weak now! Man you’re like dolls to me now, in fact let’s play dolls!” Charly teased.

With that she reached into the locker room with a massive hand, Peyton and Billie screamed as they scrambled away from the approaching hand. They backed up against the wall and were relived to see her reach didn’t extend all the way.

Charly was loving this, the IIconics were terrified of her, now she could easily crawl in and get to the IIconics but then something echoed in the back of her head.

“Make them feel small” that familiar masked woman’s voice said.

This voice was letting Charly know something. A strange feeling flowed over her, similar to the one she had when she had first grown.

Stretching her fingers and hand out, she pointed it at the IIconics and it happened. A strange colorless vibration escaped her hand and struck the Aussies. That’s when they started to shrink.

“Oh my god Billie What the Fuck is going on!”

“I don’t know everything is getting bigger!!!”

The IIconics world was getting a lot bigger, all they could do was hold each other in their panic listening to the booming laughter of the giantess Charly Caruso.

How small did they get?
1553332233322222333122222222111.title: Cutting the IIconics down to size

15533322333222223331222222221111.content:
Charly Caruso was only just beginning to understand the scope of her new abilities. Until now she had only been able to grow herself to an impressive 20ft height.

Now she had unlocked her power to alter the sizes of others. She used her newfound talent to shrink the IIconics to a size much more suiting. She watched with glee as the leggy gals shrank further and further until they were only 5 inches tall. The size of dolls.

Peyton and Billie held each other as tears spilled down their faces. They were already small compared to the giantess Charly, but now they were small compared to everyone!

Their surroundings were all huge, the locker room benches towered over the like buildings, their bags were now the size of buses and now their shoes were Bed size. Suffice to say they were now indeed cut down to size.

“Billie everything’s huge!”

“Pey we’re so tiny now!” the IIconics cried.

Charly laughed at the doll sized women, who were cowering under a bench now, still out of reach of the massive woman. She could squeeze her way into the room to torture the two but a thought occurred to her, now that the IIconics were this size it meant that everyone was bigger than them. The possibilities were endless.

“Hihi my my. You guys sure did get small huh! I’d say you guys are bug size compared to me, but for all the regular size people you’re doll sized. Now as much as I’d love to come in and play with you both. I’m afraid I’m much too big for dolls!” Charly boasted.

Billie and Peyton still cowered under the bench as Charly’s booming voice washed over them. Luckily the giant woman was satisfied with the mental torture she had imposed upon them.

“Well I gotta run guys. Enjoy your new lives. Hopefully the girls around her have grown out of playing with dolls haha!” Charly laughed.

And with that Charly loses the door as Billie and Peyton realized what had just happened.

“No don’t leave us like this!” Peyton screamed.

“We’re sorry! Please make us bigger!!!” Billie cried.

They got up and ran without thought into the middle of the room. It was too late thought as the door slammed shut. Collapsing onto their knees the IIconics continued to cry.

Outside Charly was filled with joy at what might occur to the tiny IIconics. She turned to leave but realized that the corridor was too much of a tight squeeze at her 20ft Statute.

That’s when Charly had an idea. She had been able to change the size of herself and others at will. Smiling she held out her hand as the same power that flowed through them for the IIconics came again and was unleashed onto the wall.

Within seconds the whole corridor began to expand, the walls stretched and the ceiling rose higher and higher, after a few seconds Charly stopped and rose to her full height. Smiling Charly was delighted to see that her head was a full 5 feet from the ceiling.

Turns out her size changing power wasn’t limited to organic beings. She could make anything she wanted change size. Her power was infinite.

Suddenly Charly heard some voices approaching from the other end of the corridor. Stepping behind a production crate she used her powers to grow it until it hid her from sight. She then waited to see just who was approaching.

“Is it just me or does this corridor look bigger?” A woman’s voice said.

“Nah there’s now way the building could just grow without us knowing! Now c’mon I want to freshen up, hopefully this room is free.”

Charly watched as the two women passed her hiding place and right into the IIconics locker room! She smiled as she couldn’t wait to see how these women reacted to finding the doll sized aussies.

She figured she could kill some time seeing how this played out, she may even interfere and make things more fun if she feels the need.

Meanwhile in the locker room the IIconics were still crying on the floor. That’s when the door swung open, the doll sized women were terrified to see that________ and_________ had entered.

Who were they?
15533322333222223331222222221111.title: Too Big For Dolls

choices: Alexa asks the IIconics how they became small
The moment of Bliss guest bursts in
Goddess Charly plays around with the girls heights
155333223332222233312222222211111.content:
Billie and Peyton had been reduced to only 5 inches in height by the giantess Charly Caruso. Now they were sat crying in the center of the room. Unfortunately they had forgotten that Charly wasn’t the only giantess now...

The door of the locker room swung open, Billie and Peyton stopped crying and froze. Two people who they didn’t like had just entered. They could do nothing but stay perfectly still as the giantesses took a few booming footsteps into the room, it was none other than Alexa Bliss and Nikki Cross.

“Great looks like no ones in here, we can relax in peace!” Alexa said as she dropped her bag.

“Yeah now we can focus on our interview for later on, who is it that’s on a moment of bliss tonight?” Nikki asked as she picked up Alexa’s bag so she could put it on the bench.

“Oh just some NXT girl.” Alexa answered.

Nikki then started walking forward right in the path of the tiny IIconics! The Aussie duo were frozen in fear as Nikki came closer and closer, her footsteps causing the ground to shake.

Finally she was close enough where she was about to step on them! They instinctively let out a scream of terror as Nikki’s foot came to a halt inches from the IIconics.

“Huh What the hell was that?” Nikki said aloud.

Looking under her boot she was shocked at what she saw. There below her was the IIconics except they were tiny! The three women stared at each other until finally Nikki let out a squeal of excitement, clapping her hands together in the process.

“Oh my god they’re so cute! Come to Nikki, come to Nikki!” The Scottish woman yelped.

The IIconics immediately snapped out of their stupor and turned tail ready to run, the pair had gotten only a few feet (inches in reality) before a shadow loomed over them. The giant hands of Nikki swooped down and picked them up.

Nikki had one IIconic in each hand and was delighted. Now stuck in the fists of Nikki, Billie and Peyton pounded on the stubby fingers hoping somehow this would stop the huge woman.

“Let us go Nikki!” Billie yelled.

“Stop squeezing us so tight!” Peyton gasped.

It was no good as Nikki Carried them over to Alexa who was now sat down on the bench messing around on her phone.

“Lexi! Lexi! Look I’ve got the IIconics!” Nikki rhymed.

“Yes those are cool action figures Nikki.” Alexa answers not looking up from her phone.

“No look they’re real!” Nikki said unrelenting.

She then shoved Billie Kay right in front of Alexa’s face. Once more a giantess stared right at a shrunken IIconic in silence for 30 seconds until...

“HOLY SHIT THEY’RE REAL!!!” Alexa blurted out.

The goddess then snatched Billie roughly from Nikki’s hand as held the doll sized woman in her own. She started poking and prodding at the tiny woman, making sure she was the real deal.

Nikki meanwhile was on the floor by Alexa’s feet literally playing with Peyton like she was a doll! Bouncing her off the ground like she was simulating walking.

All while this was happening the women had no idea, they were being watched betray closely by a true goddess.

After a few minutes of messing with the IIconics, Alexa finally decides to address the situation.

What happens next?
155333223332222233312222222211111.title: Alexa and Nikki’s New Toys

1553332233322222333122222222111113.content:
Things had taken quite the turn for the wwe women’s division. Unbeknownst to them there was someone pulling all the strings. A newly born goddess had been released onto the unsuspecting roster, although soon it wouldn’t just be the women’s division but the whole world that would succumb to goddess Charly’s whim.

Right now she secretly watched through a small crack in the locker room door. The 20ft goddess was amused to see the normal sized Alexa and Nikki play around with the 5 inch tall IIconics. Seeing the smaller women have their ways with the once tall Aussies filled goddess Charly with immense happiness.

But her fun was far from over. With that in mind she decided she would play a few games with these women. Staring with...

Inside the locker room Alexa and Nikki were enjoying their size advantage over the smaller IIconics. Nikki being Nikki was playing with Peyton Royce like she was an actual doll. She acted like she was completely motionless and ignored the tiny woman’s cries and complaints.

“Nikki put me down!!!” Peyton screamed.

“Playtime playtime! Dolly! Dolly!” Nikki replied in a singsong tone.

She then held Peyton high above her head like she was a rocket ship. Peyton then held on tightly to the scots hand as she was thrown through the air. The small Aussie struggled to hold down her lunch as the speed of her trajectory.

Alexa meanwhile was a little bit more cruel with her IIconic. Poor Billie Kay had to endure a ton of verbal abuse as the self proclaimed goddess held her tightly in her fist.

“Awww look how the mighty have fallen. Big bad Billie is no longer so big. Now you’re just a tiny doll that I could break at any time!” Alexa boasted.

The short woman then squeezed the tiny Billie between her fingers. The tiny Aussie let out a cry of pain as the tears began to fall down her face.

“P-please! Let me go!” Billie cried.

It was to no Avail as Alexa’s former dark side started to come out in full effect. She kept the pressure on and squeezed harder, Billies tiny screams were drowned out by Alexa’s immense booming laughter.

As this was happening Goddess Charly tutted her disapproval. Sure she was glad that smaller women had a chance to tower over the once tall and mighty. But to succumb to thief ways was something different. She couldn’t tolerate someone else becoming a tall bitch.

Smiling she knew what she must do. Time for a little game. Pointing her finger at Alexa she let her Size changing power seep out. Within seconds the power hit Alexa who was still laughing at Billie. She had failed to notice her grip on the Aussie was getting more and more difficult.

Alexa laughed and laughed as Billie became heavier and heavier. Finally the weight became too much that she slipped from her hand Alexa actually had to open her eyes. She was shocked to see Billie was now Half her height!

“What the...” Alexa started.

However before she could finish her sentence a booming footsteps shook the ground and caused her to lose her footing. Looking up the former goddess gasped as saw the towering form of her tag partner Nikki cross, stomping about with her new toy!

“N-n-Nikki?” Alexa whispered feebly.

Alexa had somehow shrunken to only 10 inches tall! Billie Kay was now only half her height as her best friend was now a towering goddess.

Before Alexa could get her friends attention however, Goddess Charly intervened.

“No, we can’t have that. The game wouldn’t be fun then!” she giggled.

With that she pointed her whole hand at Nikki and let her power hit her full force.

Alexa meanwhile tried to get her friends attention by hitting her boot, but as she took a step closer she saw the boot was getting bigger! Freezing Alexa looked up terrified to see her friend growing!

Nikki was completely unaware as she continued to play with Peyton. However as the playtime went on she felt Peyton slipping through her fingers!

Nikki was surprised by this as she thought she’d dripped her, when in reality she actually had slipped down her fingers and was dangling from them for dear life!

“Huh? Why is my dolly smaller?” Nikki said out loud.

But alas her doll wasn’t getting smaller. She was getting bigger! How big did Nikki grow?
1553332233322222333122222222111113.title: Goddess Charly’s Games

choices: She decides to join and play with Nikki
15533322333222223331222222221111131.content:
Goddess Charly let her power flow through her fingertips and hit Nikki Cross full force. The Scottish woman soon found herself growing bigger and bigger, whilst the tiny women around her seemed to get smaller and smaller to her!

“Huh? Why is my dolly smaller?” Nikki said out loud.

Nikki stretched higher to the ceiling as she grew bigger and bigger. Meanwhile on the floor, the 10 inch tall Alexa Bliss and 5 inch tall Billie Kay had to run and jump out of the way of Nikki’s growing feet!

Her big boots almost knocked Alexa Bliss over, who was getting out of dodge as she watched her best friend grow bigger. However Nikki Kay wasn’t as lucky, the clumsy Aussie tripped over nothing and screamed as Nikki’s boots inched towards her.

Just as they were about to crush her, the tiny IIconic found herself being picked up by her waist and hoisted over the shoulder of Alexa Bliss!

“Alexa thank you!!!” Billie cried.

“Shut up! I’m not doing this for you! I just didn’t want Nikki to have to scrape you off her boot!” Alexa yelled back.

The two ran until they made it to the safest possible place, under the locker room benches. Alexa dumped Billie onto the ground rather unceremoniously. They then watched as the scot finished off her tremendous growth spurt.

Nikki meanwhile was grinning from ear to ear. She loved how tall she was getting, everything was getting smaller! The usually small woman was delighted to be so big.

“Oooooooh Nikki is getting so big! Hahahaha this is awesome!” Nikki boomed.

The Scot continued growing until her head hit the ceiling of the locker room. Satisfied Charly stopped growing her. She estimated Nikki Cross to be around 10ft tall now, half the size of herself...for now.

Nikki looked around the now cramped locker room and smiled wildly. However there was something she had completely forgotten. Before she had started to grow she was holding a certain 5 inch tall IIconic in Peyton Royce.

However as she had grown Peyton had slipped out of her grip and fell down her arm and was now dangling onto her shirt right in front of her massive tits. The tiny Aussie was crying as she was struggling to hold onto the fabric.

Now that her growth had stopped, Alexa with Billie following slowly behind walked out and stood stunned by Nikki’s tremendous height.

“Holy shit she’s huge!” Billie exclaimed.

Alexa meanwhile was more concerned with being found, she and been shrunken and Nikki had been grown, something weird was going on.

Throwing caution to the wind Alexa walked out and screamed up to Nikki, after several attempts she finally got Nikki’s attention who looked down confused. Her confusion turned to joy as she spotted her tiny bestie and immediately for down to her knees.

Billie Kay and Peyton Royce screamed at the same time as the behemoths massive knees struck the ground causing Billie to fall over. Peyton meanwhile was thrown up and landed right in between Nikki’s tits!

Her screams became muffled as she sank deeper into the depths of the scots cleavage. Nikki meanwhile saw Alexa and was smiling happily at her tiny doll sized friend now.

“ALEXA!!! You’re so tiny! And Nikki is so big! It’s so fun! It’s so fun!” Nikki boomed.

Alexa tried to calm her giant bestie down but it was no use as the giantess reached over and grabbed her and a crying Billie in her hands!

All while goddess Charly was watching with glee. However she was getting a little tired of being an observer. That’s when the devious goddess decided to...

info.brief_description: Women in the WWE find a shrink ray, you decide what happens next
info.description:
A member of the WWE locker room finds a shrink ray.

Does she shrink herself or someone else? Aware or unaware?

You decide what happens.

Anything goes.

Add and enjoy!
